XXbsa075_u:3: avyāhataṃ yo jagadekabandhuḥ sa jñāyate sarvavidatra nirmalam //
XXbsa075_u:4: iha hi dharmajñādaparama navaśeṣajñamanicchannapi kumārilo dharmajña eva kevale pratiṣiddhe vedamupādeyamabhimanyamānaḥ paṭhati dharmajñatvaniṣedhastu kevalo 'tropayujyate /
XXbsa075_u:9: yaḥ pramāṇamasāviṣṭo na tu sarvasya vedakaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:16: yathoktābhyāsasahitacetoguṇāśvāmī caturāryasatyaviṣayā ākārā iti svabhāvo hetuḥ /
XXbsa075_u:18: saṃkalparūḍhānāṃ caturāryasatyākārāṇāṃ cetoguṇatvamātrasya ca hetoḥ pratyātmavedyatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:22: asyāścāsaṃbhāvanā nāma kiṃ (1) bhāvyasya saṃkalpārūḍhatvāsaṃbhavāt (2) anarthitvāt (3) heyarūpāniścayāt (4) heyasya nityatvāt (5) tasyāhetutvāt (6) taddhetornityatvāt (7)heyahetvaparijñānāt
XXbsa075_u:23: (8) tadbādhakābhāvāt (9) bādhakāparijñānāt (10) cittasya doṣātmakatvāt (11) tasya vyavasthitaguṇatvāt (12) bhavāntarābhāvāt (13)
XXbsa075_u:32: saṃkṣepataḥ kathitaṃ sākṣādduḥkhaprakṛti narakaṃ pretatiryakkharūpaṃ martye śarma kvacana tadapi grastamevāsukhena /
XXbsa075_u:33: devānāṃ ca kṣayamupagate puṇyapātheyapiṇḍe caṇḍajvālāvyatikaramuco hanta bhogāsta eva //iti
XXbsa075_u:41: tataḥ śeṣaḥ kleśastata udayinaḥ karmavisarādvisārī saṃsāraḥ śaraṇarahito dāruṇataraḥ //
XXbsa075_u:54: yo hi yatsvabhāvastasmin svabhāve vyavasthito na saṃskāramapekṣate /
XXbsa075_u:57: pratiṣedhyasya tatsvabhāvatvasya yadvyāpakaṃ saṃskāranirapekṣatvaṃ tadviruddhaṃ tadapekṣatvamiti cittasya doṣātmakatvakṣatiḥ //
XXbsa075_u:78: tathāpī dṛśo 'bhyāso na kasya cid dṝśyata iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:86: abhyāsasahitaceto guṇasphuṭapratibhāsayoḥ kāryakāraṇayorghaṭakumbhakārayoriva sarvopasaṃhāreṇa pratyakṣānupalambhataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhāvabhyāsasahitacetoguṇatvasya sādhanasya sphuṭapratibhāsakaraṇayogyatayā vyāptisiddheḥ /
XXbsa075_u:87: tathā hi vyāptyadhikaraṇe kāmāturavartini yuvatyākāre sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsasahitacetoguṇāt pūrvamanupalabdhiḥ sphuṭābhasya /
XXbsa075_u:92: tasya parokṣatvena tatpratibaddhaliṅgāniścayāt ( Nibandh 4.) kiṃ ca sarvajñasattāsādhane
XXbsa075_u:97: api ca abhyāsāt kāraṇātkāryasya sphuṭābhasya pratītau nāvaśyaṃ kāraṇāni kāryavanti bhavantītyanaikāntikatā
XXbsa075_u:108: tathāpi kaḥ prastāvaḥ sarvajñavivāde sādhanamārabdhavataḥ sphuṭatvaṃ cetasaḥ sādhayitum //
XXbsa075_u:109: kiṃ ca prasiddhānumāne bhūtalasya dharmiṇaḥ kumbhakāraghaṭayorapi dharmayoḥ pratītatvāt kāryakāraṇabhāvo grahītuṃ śakyata eva /
XXbsa075_u:110: prastute tu kāmāturasantānavartino yuvatyākārasya dharmiṇastatpragatābhyāsasphuṭatvayorapi dharmayoḥ parokṣatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:112: yathā ca naiyāyikaṃ prati yuṣmābhirucyate pratyakṣato na kāryamātraṃ puruṣavyāptaṃ sidhyati
XXbsa075_u:113: kiṃ tvavāntarameva ghaṭajātīyaṃ kāryamiti tathā nākāramātramabhyāsapūrvakaṃ sidhyati /
XXbsa075_u:117: kiṃ ca sarvavido 'pi yadi caturāryasatyaparijñānataḥ sarvajñatāsthitiḥ,
XXbsa075_u:119: api ca jñānavān mṛgyate kaścit taduktapratipattaye /
XXbsa075_u:128: kintu caturāryasatyākārasvarūpe dharmiṇi sphuṭābhatvasya sādhyasyāyogavyavacchedārthaṃ parvate 'gnimātrāyogavyavacchedavat /
XXbsa075_u:132: yathoktam ityabhyāsabalāt parisphuṭadaśākoṭiḥ sphurat saṃbhavī heyādeyatadaṅgalakṣaṇaguṇaḥ sarvajñatā saiva naḥ // iti /
XXbsa075_u:133: tadatrābhyāsasahitacaturāryasatyākāraḥ samagro dharmī sāmagryamabhyāsaviśiṣṭacetoguṇatvamātraṃ hetuḥ sphuṭībhāvayogyatāsādhyam /
XXbsa075_u:134: yathā sāgnitvānagnitvasandehe ( Nibandh 5.) parvatātmā pramāṇapratīto dharmī /
XXbsa075_u:136: tasmāt sphuṭābhatvena sādhyena dṛṣṭānte vyāptisiddherastyeva tatpratibaddhaliṅganiścayaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:141: iyaṃ ca na gamayatu nāmaikāntataḥ kāryasattvam /
XXbsa075_u:143: tadā bhāvini kārye sandehe 'pi kāraṇayogyatā niścīyata eva /
XXbsa075_u:147: atrāpi kāminyākāre bhāvanājātīyasya sphuṭībhāvakaraṇayogyatā dṛṣṭeti samānam /
XXbsa075_u:156: tathā hi kāminyabhyāsasantatisahacāri saṃbhramakāyavacodarśanameva kāminyākārasya tadbhāvanāyāśca darśanam /
XXbsa075_u:162: anyathā cityacaityarūparasagandhasparśaparamāṇupuñjādyātmakasya kumbhakāraghaṭapradeśāderapi rūpaikadeśagrāhakaṃ cakṣuḥpratyakṣaṃ na samudāyavyavasthāpakamiti sarvavyāvahārikapramāṇocchedaprasaṅgaḥ tathā bāhyaghaṭakāminyādīnāṃ śaktikṛtasya mahato jātibhedasya saṃbhavādanyajātīyavyāptigrahe 'nyajātīyād buddhimadanumānamayuktam /
XXbsa075_u:163: saṃkalpārūḍhānāṃ tu jalajvalanayuvatyākārādīnāṃ bāhyatvenādhyastānāmapi vijñānaikasvarūpatayaikajātīyatvamastīti bhāvanāsahitākāramātreṇaiva vaiśadyavyāptirastu //
XXbsa075_u:166: dṛśyate hi siddhasādhyā vaiśadyajātiranapekṣya viparītabhāvanāṃ nidrāvicchede vicchidyamānā
XXbsa075_u:167: bhāvanābhāvinī tu na vinā vipakṣābhyāsaṃ jāgrato 'pi
XXbsa075_u:170: svapne 'pi sphuṭatā tathaiva na tathāpyekatvamevānayor a prākārasamatvameva samatāṃ jāteḥ samāmaṃgati /
XXbsa075_u:171: anyannidhanirodhabādhyamitaradbādhyaṃ prayatnaiḥ punar vaiśadyaṃ viparītabhāvanabalān nairghṛṇyabhede yathā // iti //
XXbsa075_u:173: tatrāpi ghaṭādiprakṛtāśeṣavedane 'pi bhayaṃ bhavād dhīyet yadi ko doṣaḥ so 'pi sarvajñatāṃ vrajet /
XXbsa075_u:174: saṃsāraduḥkhamokṣāya spṛhayanto vayaṃ punar bhajema tadupāyajñaṃ sthātuṃ tadgītavartmani //
XXbsa075_u:176: tathā sattāmātre vipratipannān prati sattaiva kevalā prasādhitā /
XXbsa075_u:177: viśeṣajijñāsāyāṃ tu pramāṇopapannakṣaṇikanairātmyavādina eva sugatasya bhagavataḥ sarvajñatā
XXbsa075_u:178: ata etadapi nirastaṃ yadāha bhaṭṭaḥ sugato yadi sarvajñaḥ kapilo neti kā pramā /
XXbsa075_u:179: athobhāvapi sarvajñau matabhedaḥ kathaṃ tayoḥ // iti //
XXbsa075_u:180: tasmāt uktakrameṇa munirājanaye pramāyāḥ śaktirvyanakti gatimapramitāṃ kṛpāṃ ca /
XXbsa075_u:181: anyatra tu dvayamudastamado 'stamāne tenaika eva śaraṇaṃ sa nirātmavādī //
XXbsa075_u:182: iti viśeṣasiddhirapyanavadyeti sarvamanākulamākulādhayaḥ pare na pratipadyante /
XXbsa075_u:184: bādhakapramāṇasadbhāvāt sarvajñasyāsadvyavahāro yuktaḥ sadvyavahārapratiṣedho vā prasādhakapramāṇābhāvādveti
XXbsa075_u:185: atra vicāryate kiṃ punarasya bhagavato bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ śabdādikaṃ veti vikalpāḥ //
XXbsa075_u:187: pratyakṣaṃ hi kevalapradeśādau pravartamānaṃ svapravṛttiyogyameva tatra vastu pratiṣedhati
XXbsa075_u:193: na vayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pravartamānamabhāvaṃ sādhayatīti brūmaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:196: tathā hi yatra vastuni pratyakṣasya nivṛttistasyāsadbhāvaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:198: yatra tu pratyakṣasya pravṝttistasya sadbhāvo yathā ghaṭādeḥ /
XXbsa075_u:203: kiṃ pratyakṣasya yā nivṛttistato 'bhāvasiddhiḥ, nivṛttisahitādvā pratyakṣāt,
XXbsa075_u:211: tathā hi nivṛttāt pratyakṣādabhāvasiddhirityasataḥ pratyakṣādityuktaṃ bhavati /
XXbsa075_u:214: na hi tacca nāsti tena ca pratipattiriti nyāyyam /
XXbsa075_u:220: na ca dṛśyānupalambhaḥ tatprabhedo vā kāryānupalabdhyādiryogyānupalambho vā parābhimato 'tra pramāṇam /
XXbsa075_u:223: tathā hi tatkāraṇamindriyavijñānaṃ vā mānasaṃ vā bhāvanābalajaṃ vā /
XXbsa075_u:224: bhāvanābalajamapi cākṣuṣaṃ vā, mānasaṃ veti vikalpāḥ /
XXbsa075_u:232: nūnaṃ sa cakṣuṣā sarvān rasādīn pratipadyate //
XXbsa075_u:252: yadi nāmaikaikenendriyeṇa tajjñānena vā sarvasyāgrahaṇaṃ tathāpi pañcabhirindriyaistajjñānairvā svasvaviṣayapravṛttairevātiśayaprāptairbhaviṣyatīti /
XXbsa075_u:256: tadevamindriyamindriyavijñānaṃ vā nāśeṣagrāhīti na prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ
XXbsa075_u:258: tathā hi yadyapi tanmānasaṃ sarvārthaviṣayaṃ tathāpi na tasya svātantryeṇārthagrahaṇe vyāpāro 'sti /
XXbsa075_u:262: pāratantrye cendriyajñānaparigṛhītārthaviṣayatvādatītānāgatadūrasūkṣmavyavahitaparacittāderarthasyendriyaparijñānāgocarasya manasā paricchedo na prāpnotīti kathaṃ sarvajñatā //
XXbsa075_u:263: na ca bhāvanābalajaṃ sarvārthagrāhīti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:264: tathā hi tadbhāvanābalajamapi yadīndriyāśritamiti caturthaḥ pakṣaḥ, tadā so 'saṅgataḥ /
XXbsa075_u:266: atha bhāvanābalena tathāvidhamutpannaṃ manovijñānaṃ sarvārthagrāhīti pañcamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:267: tadānvarthatvāt pratyakṣaśabdasya tasya ca bhāvanābalāvalambino 'pyanakṣajatvāt nārthasākṣātkāritvamastīti pratipādanīyam /
XXbsa075_u:275: prājño 'pi ca naraḥ sūkṣmānarthān draṣṭuṃ kṣamo 'pi san /
XXbsa075_u:295: pratyakṣasūtre tu kāśikākāraḥ paramatamāśaṅkyāha, tanna, avagataviṣayatvād bhāvanāyāḥ /
XXbsa075_u:307: dhyeya ātmā prabhuryo 'sau hṛdi dīpa iva sthitaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:313: te ca tata eva siddhe ( Nibandh 10.) iti vyarthā bhāvanā /
XXbsa075_u:316: atha vipralambhabhūyiṣṭhatvādāgamānāṃ pramāṇamāgamo na veti vicikitsamāno bhāvanayā jijñāsate
XXbsa075_u:321: yathā hi tairevoktam tasmād bhūtamabhūtaṃ vā yad yadevābhibhāvyate /
XXbsa075_u:325: yāvadeva hi gṛhītaṃ tāvadeva bhāvanayā viṣayīkriyate /
XXbsa075_u:339: tadviṣayaśca samastavastunairātmyamiti tadbhāvanāprakarṣaḥ samastavastunairātmyaṃ viśadayan samastavastuviśadatāmantareṇa tadanupapatteḥ samastavastuvaiśadyamāvahatītyuktam /
XXbsa075_u:342: tathā hi nāgamānumānagocaratvaṃ nirātmanāṃ vastubhedānāṃ paramārthasatām /
XXbsa075_u:345: tadagrāhyamapi svalakṣaṇaṃ tadadhyavaseyatayā tadviṣaya iti tadyonirapi bhāvanā tadviṣayeti tatprakarṣastadvaiśadyaheturiti cet /
XXbsa075_u:348: tathā hi yadanumānena gṛhyate yaccādhyavasīyate te dve apyanyanivṛttī, na vastunī /
XXbsa075_u:354: karikumbhakaṭhorakucakalaśahāriṇi hariṇaśāvalolalocane campakadalāvadātagātralate lāvaṇyasarasi nirantaralagnalalitadoḥkandalīmūla māliṅganamaṅgane preyasitare prayaccha /
XXbsa075_u:356: asti ca vikalpāvikalpayoḥ kathañcit samānaviṣayateti nātiprasaṅga iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:363: vijñānasvalakṣaṇaikatvābhyupagame ca tannityamekamadvitīyaṃ brahmābhyasanīyamiti kṣaṇikanairātmyābhyāsābhyupagamo dattajalāñjaliḥ prasajyeta /
XXbsa075_u:369: tato dhūmānubhavastato dahana vikalpaḥ, tataścānumānamutpannamiti pāramparyeṇa vahnipratibandhāt prāpakaṃ ca vahnerdāhapākakāriṇaḥ tathedamapi anumānajanitabhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajaṃ pāramparyeṇārthaprasūta tayā
XXbsa075_u:371: tat kimanumānena vahniṃ vyavasthāpya bhāvayato yadvahniviṣayamativiśadavijñānaṃ tatpramāṇamiti
XXbsa075_u:372: omiti brubāṇasya parvatanitambārohaṇe satīndriyasannikarṣajanmano dahanavijñānasya bhāvanādhipatya viśadābhavijñānena saha saṃvādaniyamaprasaṅgaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:374: lakṣaṇayogini ca vyabhicārasaṃbhave tallakṣaṇameva bādhitamiti viśadābhamapi prātibhamiva saṃśayākrāntamapramāṇam /
XXbsa075_u:375: tadbhāvanāyā bhūtārthatvaṃ na tajjaviśadābha vijñānaprāmāṇyahetuḥ, vyabhicārāt /
XXbsa075_u:378: tathā ca tadutpatteḥ tadavyabhicāraniyama iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:383: na khalvindhanaviśeṣo dhūmaheturiti vināpi dahanaṃ sahasreṇāpi saṃskārairdhūbhamādhate /
XXbsa075_u:385: bhāvanāyāśca bhūtārthāyā arthānapekṣāyā eva viśadavijñānajananasāmarthyamupalabdha kāmāturādivartinyā iti bhūtārthāpi tannirapekṣaiva samartheti nārthasyālambanapratyayatvaṃ śakyāvagamam /
XXbsa075_u:386: api ca ālambanapratyayā api ta evāsya kṣaṇā yujyante, ye tasya purastāttanā
XXbsa075_u:387: avyavadhānāstathā ca ta evāsya grāhyā na punaḥ pūrvatarāḥ /
XXbsa075_u:389: atha dṛśyamānā dhātutrayaparyāpannāḥ prāṇabhṛto janmāntaraparivartopāttātītānāgataskandhakadambakopādānopādeyātmāna iti taddarśanaṃ dṛśyamānatādātmyena tadviśeṣaṇatayātītānāgatamapi gocarayati /
XXbsa075_u:391: tasya ca bhagavato nirmṛṣṭanikhilakleśopakleśamalaṃ vijñānamanāvaraṇaṃ paritaḥ pradyotamāna mālambanapratyayaṃ sarvākāraṃ gocarayet /
XXbsa075_u:392: tasya ca sākṣāt paramparayā ca kathañcit sarveṇa saṃbandhād deśkālaviprakīrṇavastumātraviśiṣṭasvabhāvatayā tathaiva gocarayet /
XXbsa075_u:393: na caitat sarvagrahaṇamantareṇeti sarvaviṣayamasya vijñānamanāvaraṇaṃ siddham
XXbsa075_u:396: tathā hīyamālambanapratyayasya sarvaviśiṣṭātmatā bhāvikī na vā /
XXbsa075_u:402: tathā ca na saṃbandha iti na tadgrahaṇe sarvagrahaṇam /
XXbsa075_u:403: vikalpāropitatayā tvavikalpakaṃ samastavastuviṣayaṃ sarvatra pratīyata iti subhāṣitam /
XXbsa075_u:408: atha katipayavastvālambanānubhavasya kutastya eṣa mahimā yataḥ samastavastvavasāya iti /
XXbsa075_u:413: tattvāvarakatā hi sulabhamalānāṃ kleśādīnāṃ na punarvikalpanirmāṇapratibandhatā /
XXbsa075_u:415: bhāvanāprakarṣamātrajatvāt, arthāvyabhicāraniyamābhāvāt, viśadābhamapi saṃśayākrāntatvādapramāṇamapratyakṣaṃ ceti sāmpratam //
XXbsa075_u:419: anumitabhāvitavahniviṣayaviśadābhajñāna prāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt tadvidhasya kvacid bādhadarśanādaprāmāṇyamihāpi samānam /
XXbsa075_u:421: tadiha yadi viśadābhavijñānahetutvaṃ bhāvanāyā viśeṣaṇatrayayogena sādhyate,
XXbsa075_u:428: atha pratyakṣavijñānahetutā bhāvanāyāḥ paraṃ pratyasiddhā sādhyate, tathā ca sati sādhyaviparyayavyāpterviruddhatā
XXbsa075_u:442: yayā samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitā doṣā na punarudbhaviṣyanti /
XXbsa075_u:468: kiṃ tu tadākṣiptamanā vividhaviṣayabhedatṛṣṇādiparipluto na śaknoti bbāvayitumiti bhāvanādaramātra eva tadvirahopayogaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:469: asti cehāpi śiśirabharasaṃbhṛta jaḍimamantharatarakāyakāṇḍasyānumitavahnibhāvanābhiyoga iti na hetu bhedataḥ pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:473: kāraṇasāmarthyaprakrameṇa ca pārthivāvayavini kārye jāyata iti avadātam /
XXbsa075_u:491: api ca pramāṇapariśuddhamārgavādo śākyaḥ pramāṇaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ san satvākhyaliṅgajaṃ vikalpaṃ brūyāt
XXbsa075_u:494: tasmiṃśca bhāvyamāne sattve bhāvakasya vikalpakasya bhāvanopahite viśadābhatve śabdasaṃsṛṣṭagrāhyanimittaṃ vikalpakatvaṃ nivartate /
XXbsa075_u:497: yattu pāramārthikaṃ vastvātmakaṃ na ( Nibandh 15.) tatpramāṇapariśuddham /
XXbsa075_u:500: na cānyasmin śabdasaṃsṛṣṭe bhāvyamāne sphuṭamanyadrūpaṃ bhavati /
XXbsa075_u:502: kṣaṇikatve bhāvye samāropite vāstavaṃ kṣaṇikatvameva yogivijñānapratibhāsīti cet /
XXbsa075_u:507: tasmādabhūtaviṣayābhyāsaṃ nirvikalpakamapi saṃvādānna pramāṇamiti na sarvajñasiddhiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:508: api ca bhāvyasya vastunaḥ punaḥ punaścetasi niveśanamabhyāsaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:509: sa ca brahmacaryeṇa tapasā sādaraṃ dīrghakālaṃ nirantaramāsevito dṛḍhabhūmirasphuṭākārasya vikalpasya sphuṭābhatvajanana iṣṭaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:511: tathā hi bhāvyagrāhī yādṛśo vikalpa utpannastādṛśa eva niranvayaṃ nirudhyate /
XXbsa075_u:512: tasmiṃśca niruddhe punaḥ punarutpadyamānaḥ pratyayastādṛśa evāpūrva utpadyate /
XXbsa075_u:513: tadanena paryāyeṇa kalpasahasre 'pi apūrvotpatteraviśeṣānna tajjanyaḥ saṃskāro
XXbsa075_u:516: niranvayaniruddhaṃ hi pūrvapūrvavijñānaṃ kathamuttarottarāvasthāntaraṃ viśiṣṭaṃ janayet /
XXbsa075_u:517: sarvathā kramabhāvibhiḥ pratyayairavasthitameva rūpaṃ śakyaṃ saṃskartum /
XXbsa075_u:519: tasmāt pratyāvṛttibhāvyavastupratyayajaḥ saṃskāro vyutthānapratyayasaṃskāravirodhī yasyāsti tasyaivātmanaḥ prakṛṣṭo 'pi
XXbsa075_u:524: tathā hi yadi sākāraṃ vikalpavijñānaṃ svapratibhāsaniyatatvāt ekāgrameva tat kathaṃ vikṣipyate
XXbsa075_u:525: atha nirākāraṃ tathāpi vikalpakaṃ prati vikalpyaṃ bhinnameva /
XXbsa075_u:527: tato nirākāramapi vijñānaṃ niyatālambanatvādekāgrameva, na vikṣiptam /
XXbsa075_u:528: sarvathā nāsti kṣaṇikavādināmekamanekārthamavasthitaṃ cittaṃ yadekāgraṃ kartumiṣyate /
XXbsa075_u:529: tadevamabhyāsānupapatterasarvajñavatyāṃ cittasantatau na ca vijñānaviśeṣaḥ sarvajñaḥ sidhyatīti
XXbsa075_u:531: sarvajñānānāṃ nirālambanatve saṃvedanamātratve ca yogītarapratyayayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:535: na hi svātmamātravedanena caturāryasatyādikaṃ sākṣātkṛtamiti yuktamatiprasaṅgāt
XXbsa075_u:541: dṛṣṭaśrutānumitākāraśca yadi bhāvanābalataḥ spaṣṭa evāvabhāti, tathā ca satibhrāntameva yogipratyakṣaṃ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:559: pratyakṣeṇāpi cakṣurdahanādikaṃ gṛhītvā bhāvanāprakarṣaparyante jātaṃ sthirataraṃ tadākāravijñānaṃ syāt, yāvanna viparīta bhāvanābhiyogaparyantaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:560: astaṃ gataśca tadviṣayo 'vasthāntaraprāpto veti kathaṃ pramāṇopanītavastugocaratve 'pi saṃvādāśvāsaḥ
XXbsa075_u:561: api ca yadā hālika eva havyāśanamanumāya bhāvanayā sphuṭayet, tadā na tadyogijñānaṃ
XXbsa075_u:564: abhedapakṣe na yogijñānaṃ nāma pratyakṣeṇa bhinnamindriyajñānenaiva saṃgrahāt /
XXbsa075_u:574: tāmantareṇāpi sākṣāt kriyālābhe ca bhāvanāvaiyarthyamiti kāraṇābhāvādeva sarvajñapratihatiḥ
XXbsa075_u:576: yattāvat sarvapadārthasaṃvedanasya kāraṇaṃ kimindriyajñānamityādi valgitaṃ tatra bhāvanābalajaṃ manovijñānameva sarvapadārthagrāhīti pañcama evāsmākaṃ pakṣaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:579: dūṣaṇamuktam, anarthatvātpratyakṣaśabdasya, tasya ca bhāvanābalābalambinopya nakṣajatvānnārthasākṣātkāritvamastīti,
XXbsa075_u:581: tathā hi pratyakṣaśabdasya tāvadakṣāśritatvaṃ vyutpattinimittamarthasākṣātkāritvaṃ tu pravṛttinimittamiti pratipāditam /
XXbsa075_u:584: yathā hi cakṣrurindriyaṃ svasāmarthyānatikrameṇa yogyadeśasthamarthamapekṣya svavijñānajanane pravartate, tathā sarvāvidyāparipanthibhūtārthabhāvanāsahitaṃ mana indriyamapi yogyadeśasthamarthaṃ prāpya svavijñānajanane pravartiṣyate /
XXbsa075_u:588: pṛthagjanasya tu na tādṛśī śaktiḥ, yato netraśrotravanmano 'pi tādṛṅmaryādayā yogyadeśasthamarthasahakāriṇamāsādya vedanamutpādayet, sarvāvidyonmūlakasya bhāvanāviśeṣasya sahakāriṇo
XXbsa075_u:593: yāvattena śakyamadhigantuṃ svākārārpaṇasamartha sahakāri vastu tāvaditarajanāsādhāraṇaṃ truṭyadrūpatayā tasya gocarībhavatīti /
XXbsa075_u:594: ata evārthākāro vastuto na bhāvanāmātrajanita iti na visaṃvādaśaṅkāpi /
XXbsa075_u:595: bhāvanayā punastadīyasantāne netra ivāñjanaviśeṣeṇa śaktiratiśayavatī kācidarpitā yatparajanāsādhāraṇadarśanamasya
XXbsa075_u:601: api ca, arthasya hi ālambanapratyayatvamindriyāpekṣatvena vyāptam /
XXbsa075_u:603: na khalvindhanaviśeṣo dhūmaheturiti vināpi dahanaṃ sahasreṇāpi saṃskārairdhūmamādhatte /
XXbsa075_u:605: na ca bhāvanābalena kasyacidatīndriyadarśitvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ vā dṛṣṭamiti cet /
XXbsa075_u:622: sati ca vyāptiśaithilye śaṅkāpi nyāyādāpatantī kena pratihanyate /
XXbsa075_u:627: ataḥ kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ kāśikākārasya vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiśca vācaspateḥ sandigdhavyatirekitvādanaikāntikī
XXbsa075_u:630: prasiddhānumānasya ca na kṣatirdṛśyatvopādherdhūmādeḥ pratyakṣānupalambhato vyāptigrahaṇāvirodhāt
XXbsa075_u:634: na catīndriyadarśitvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ vādarśane 'pi niṣeddhuṃ śakyate, adṛśyānupalambhato niṣedhāyogāt
XXbsa075_u:636: kāraṇābhāvo 'pi adarśanamātrato na sidhyatīti tadavasthaḥ paribhavaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:637: yadapi kāśikākāreṇābhihitam, atha pramāṇāntarāvagataṃ bhāvyate, ki
XXbsa075_u:641: na ca caturāryasatyasvarūpe vastutattve niścite sākṣātkāramantareṇa kleśajñeyāvaraṇakṣatiriti svārthamapi tāvad bhāvanā yuktimatī /
XXbsa075_u:642: tattvasākṣātkāriṇi ca cittasantāne sati śakyasākṣātkriyamidamityanye 'pi niścayānantaraṃ sākṣātkriyāyai pravartyante, tadupadiṣṭa svargasādhanaṃ cārthabhāvanayānusarantīti
XXbsa075_u:644: anyathā tattvāsākṣātkāriṇo lokānatikrāntasya vacanamanādeyameva syāditi kva parārthavārtāpi
XXbsa075_u:645: yacca kiṃ ca tatpramāṇamityādyārabhya tasmād bhūtamabhūtaṃ veti etatparyantena dharmādharmayoranumānāpravartanamuktam,
XXbsa075_u:647: yadi kṣaṇikanirātmakavastu tattvam, tadā tasya pratyakṣeṇāniścaye 'pi yathā viparyaye bādhakapramāṇabalena vyāptisaṃvedanaṃ tathā kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhanāvasare vyavasthāpitam /
XXbsa075_u:648: atha vastūnāṃ svargādisādhanatvamabhipretam, tadā tadviṣayaparijñānāprasādhane 'pi nāsmākaṃ kācit kṣatiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:651: yadapi, api ca bhāvanābalajaṃ gṛhītagrahaṇādapramāṇamityuktam, tatra gṛhītaṃ nāma pratyakṣeṇānumānena vā /
XXbsa075_u:653: na tāvat pratyakṣaṃ kṣaṇikatvādāvarvācīnasya ( Nibandh 19.) kasyacidasti /
XXbsa075_u:654: anumānena caikavyāvṛttiviśiṣṭe vastutattve 'vasite 'pi sarvātmanā spaṣṭavastutattvasākṣātkāri pratyakṣaṃ na gṛhītagrāhi, anumānena vastutattvāsparśanāt /
XXbsa075_u:655: na ca taduttarakālamityādi tu kāraṇānupalabdhidūṣaṇaprastāve prativyūḍhamiti /
XXbsa075_u:656: yadapi vācaspatinā satyamityādinā punaḥ punaruttarottaramāśaṅkaya tat kimanumānena vahni vyavasthāpyetyādinā
XXbsa075_u:660: tathā hyayaṃ vahniviṣayenumānapūrvakabhāvanābalataḥ spaṣṭavahnipratyayaḥ kiṃ vahnerapyutpannaḥ, tathābhūtabhāvanāmātrādeva vā /
XXbsa075_u:661: prathamapakṣe visaṃvādaśca bahulamupalabhyate iti yaduktaṃ taddurbhāṣitam
XXbsa075_u:663: dvitīyapakṣe tu bhāvanāprakarṣamātrajasyārthādanutpannasya bahulaṃ visaṃvādopalambhe 'pi bhāvanārthābhyāṃ sākṣādutpannasya yogipratyakṣasyāpi
XXbsa075_u:665: nanu yadīndriyaṃ vināpi bhāvanārthābhyāṃ yogijñānamutpadyate, tarhi parvate bhāvanāvahnibhyāṃ vahnijñānamutpadyatāmavisaṃvādi /
XXbsa075_u:670: na hi vayaṃ pramāṇadṛṣṭavastubhāvanāsahitaṃ manaindriyamarthasvarūpagrāhijñānaṃ janayatīti brūmaḥ, api tvasaddṛṣṭilakṣaṇāvidyāparipanthikṣaṇikanairātmyalakṣaṇasarvavastutattvabhāvanāsahitam na ca vahnitvaṃ sarvavastutattvam, kiṃ tu kṣaṇikanairātmyameveti
XXbsa075_u:678: purastāttu bhāvite parisphurati tadarthāpekṣayā bhrāntiḥ prāsarpakasyevetyādyupahāsyamapyasya kṣatātmano durnītipūtigavībhakṣaṇādhmātajaradgomāyorudgāra iva satāmasahyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:685: cālambanapratyayā api ta eva yujyanta ityādirna punarvikalpanirmāṇapratibandhateti paryanto vyarthaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:688: viśadābhamapi saṃśayākrāntatvāt, apramāṇamapratyakṣaṃ ceti sāmpratamityupasaṃhāro 'pi dhikkāraḥ
XXbsa075_u:695: 'pyapratyakṣatve 'pi sphuṭābhatvasya sādhyadharmasāmānyasya saṃbhavāt na viruddho hetuḥ /
XXbsa075_u:711: bhavatu vā, tathāpi yogijñānasya tena saha tulyahetutvamasiddham /
XXbsa075_u:713: yogijñānaṃ tu avidyāpratipakṣasarvavastutattvabhāvanāviṣayābhyāmutpannamiti mahāntamapi viśeṣamasau durmatiprapātapatito nāvagāhata ityupekṣaṇīyaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:714: nyāyaprakīrṇe tu mārgastāvat pramāṇapariśuddho na bhavatītyuktaṃ yat, tat tatprasādhakapramāṇenaiva pratyuktam /
XXbsa075_u:715: yaccāpi cetyādyārabhya yogijñānaṃ nirviṣayaṃ prasaktamityuktam tatra keyaṃ nirviṣayatā nāma
XXbsa075_u:725: tayoścaikatvenādhyavasāyād bāhya eva pravṛttinivṛttī, vyāvahārikasya sphuṭībhāvo 'pi bahirabhimatasya paryante vikalpopādeyakṣaṇasyaiva
XXbsa075_u:727: tāvataiva sa ( Nibandh 21.) viṣayastena sākṣātkṛta iti
XXbsa075_u:732: tadbhāvanaiva cārthabhāvanā, tatsphuṭībhāva eva bāhuasphuṭībhāvaḥ, prakārāntareṇa bāhyasparśāyogāt
XXbsa075_u:733: etena yat pāramārthikamityādi na sarvajñasiddhiritiparyantaṃ pratyuktam /
XXbsa075_u:734: yaccāpi cetyādi na yuktaṃ paśyāma itiparyantena dūṣaṇamuktam,
XXbsa075_u:736: tathā hi yādṛśa eva bhāvyagrāhī pratyayaḥ prathamo niranvayo niruddhastādṛśa evāpara utpadyata iti niyamaniścayakāraṇaṃ na kiñcidasti caṇḍadevatāsparśādanyat, kṣaṇikatvāditi cet /
XXbsa075_u:737: nanu kṣaṇikatvaṃ sthāyitayā virudhyate na visadṛśotpādena, taddhi prācīnaṃ niranvayanirodhe
XXbsa075_u:738: yathā sadṛśakṣaṇāntaramārabhate tathā svahetugatasāmarthyayogāt kāryotpādānumeyād yadi viśeṣaleśaviśiṣṭaṃ kṣaṇāntaramutpādayati, tadā na kācit kṣatiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:739: na hi bhavata iva bhāvasyāpi kṣaṇikatāyāṃ pradveṣo nāma /
XXbsa075_u:745: atha ca tattvasākṣātkriyālābhāt grāhakākārāvagraha saṃbhavāt(ca) vyāvahārikamapi vikṣiptamasti cittam /
XXbsa075_u:752: yaccoktam tathāpyatītānāgataviṣayatvaṃ katham, na hyasataḥ kaścidākāro 'stīti,
XXbsa075_u:760: tathā hi caturāryasatyasākṣātkāraprāptau nirāvaraṇāntaḥ karaṇasya kāruṇyātiśayāt sarvākāraparārthaparatayā sakalagocaracāriṇi cetasi ciravirūḍhotsāhasya tādṛgupāyaviśeṣādhigamo bhaviṣyati, yamanutiṣṭhatastadutpattimantareṇāpi devatādhipatyāt satyasvapnavat /
XXbsa075_u:761: pratiparamāṇusarvaviṣayaṃ yathā deśakālākārapratyavasthānukāri sphuṭataraṃ jñānamudiyāt, tadā na tāvadvastuvyabhicārakṛtaṃ visaṃvāditvam, vastūnāmeva pratibhāsanāt /
XXbsa075_u:768: bhāvibhūtayostarhi yadi svarūpasya sphuraṇam, vartamānataiva syāt /
XXbsa075_u:769: atha svarūpasannihitaṃ jñānameva tadākāramiti nirālambanaṃ niyamena /
XXbsa075_u:774: yad bhāṣyam yathā sa dṛṣṭaḥ śaradādikālayukta stathā tasya na bādhitatvam /
XXbsa075_u:775: tatkālayuktastu na tena dṛṣṭa stathāpratītāvapi nāsti doṣaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:776: jñānamātrasya tu tattvataḥ sphuraṇācca na vartamānatāprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
XXbsa075_u:784: yadi yogijñānasyārthādutpattiḥ, pramāṇapūrvakatvāpekṣayā na kiñcatprayojanamiti ceta /
XXbsa075_u:785: na deśakālavastuviśeṣamapāsya sāmānyena sarvadikkālavartivastumātraṃ kṣaṇikanirātmakamityaniścaye mahāprayāsasādhyapuruṣāyuṣavyāpinyāṃ bhāvanāyāmeva pravṛtterabhāvāt /
XXbsa075_u:786: na ca hāliko havyāśanamanumāya sphuṭīkarotiyena pratyakṣāntaratvaprasaṅgaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:792: sādhyatayaiva tādṝgdaśāviśeṣasya lokātikrāntātiśayasya paramapuruṣārtharūpasya sādhanaviśeṣapratipādanāya pṛthagjanasādhāraṇendriyajñānād bhedena nirdeśāt /
XXbsa075_u:793: paramapuruṣārthaviṣayatvābhāvādeva ca rasāyanādisaṃskārajasyāpi jñānasya na pratyakṣāntaratā
XXbsa075_u:795: indriyajñānenāpi vastu ( Nibandh 23.) sarvātmanā gṛhṇatā truṭyadrūpasyaiva grahaṇāt /
XXbsa075_u:796: adhyavasāyo hi pūrvaṃ durllabhaḥ idānīṃ tu bhāvanābalanirdalitāvidye cittasantāne so
XXbsa075_u:798: nanu yogino manovijñānendriyajñānābhyāṃ paśyata ākāradvayasphuraṇaprasaṅga iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:802: atastāvākārāvapratimau kayā gatyā spharata iti ko nirṇetuṃ kṣamaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:804: sarvathā tu na yogijñānasya kṣatiriti siddham /
XXbsa075_u:806: nanu yadi nāma yuṣmadabhimatasyānumānasya na bādhakam,
XXbsa075_u:813: nihantuṃ hetavaḥ śaktāḥ ko nu taṃ kalpayiṣyati //
XXbsa075_u:815: sadbhāvavāraṇe śaktaṃ ko nu taṃ kalpayiṣyati //
XXbsa075_u:817: kimete jñeyatvādayaḥ sarvajñatvena sākṣādviruddhāḥ paramparayā vā /
XXbsa075_u:819: sa ca sākṣād virodha parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇo vā, bhāvābhāvavat; sahānavasthānalakṣaṇo
XXbsa075_u:828: yasya hyavikalakāraṇasya bhavato yatsannidhānādabhāvastayoreva sahānavasthānalakṣaṇo virodhaḥ
XXbsa075_u:829: na ca sarvajñatvaṃ prāk pravṛttamavikalakāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yena paścājjñeyatvādisadbhāve nivartata iti syāt /
XXbsa075_u:830: tathātve sati deśādiniṣedya eva bhavenna tu sarvathoccheda iti /
XXbsa075_u:832: sa hi bhavan niṣedhyasya sarvajñatvasya vyāpakaviruddhatvāt, kāraṇaviruddhatvāt, kāryaviruddhatvāt,
XXbsa075_u:845: yathā māyākāro nirmitāśvādiviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ nirviṣayatvena niścinvannabhrāntaḥ,
XXbsa075_u:846: tadanyasmācca śreṣṭhaḥ, tathā bhagavānapi śuddhalaukikavikalpasammukhībhāve 'pi na bhrānto nāpi pṛthagjanasamāna iti /
XXbsa075_u:848: etenaidapi nirastam yadāha kāśikākāraḥ, samādhervyutthāyopadekṣyata iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:869: viśvāsaśca na tāsu syātkenaitāḥ kīrtitā iti //
XXbsa075_u:870: kinnu buddhapraṇītāḥ syuḥ kiṃ vā brāhyaṇavañcakaiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:876: atha vā yathā cakrasyoparate 'pi daṇḍapreraṇāvyāpāre pūrvāvegavaśād bhramaṇam /
XXbsa075_u:877: evaṃ bhagavati pratyastamitasamastavikalpajāle 'pi sthite yadi pūrvapraṇidhānāhitasatatānābhogavāhinī deśanā syāttadā ko virodhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:882: tasmād yathā pūrvābhyāsato jhaṭiti prabodhitasyāriṇā prahārādidānenānurūpa eva prakramaḥ śastroddharaṇādikaḥ, tathā sarvavedinopi sakalāḥ kalāḥ ityanākulam /
XXbsa075_u:885: yatpunaruktam piśācādikṛtaśaṅkayā nātrāśvāsaḥ satāṃ yukta iti /
XXbsa075_u:895: taccet krīḍanaśīlānāṃ rakṣasāṃ vā vaco bhavet /
XXbsa075_u:904: tadviruddhaṃ ca rāgādiyogitvam, tatkāryaṃ ca vacanam /
XXbsa075_u:905: tadetad vyāpakaviruddhakāryabhūtaṃ vacanaṃ sarvajñābhāvaṃ sādhayati paramparayā viruddhatvāditi cet /
XXbsa075_u:909: rāgādikāryam, yo rāgeṇaiva janitaḥ, vacanamātraṃ vā /
XXbsa075_u:917: tataśca viśiṣṭavyavahārasya sāṃkaryeṇa na tatraikāntena rāgānumānaṃ yujyate /
XXbsa075_u:919: asaṃmukhībhūtarāgādayo 'pi hi svābhimatadevatāstutividhāne mātrādigurujanasaṃbhāṣaṇādau ca vacanamātramuccārayantaḥ samupalabhyante /
XXbsa075_u:920: na ca yadyadabhāve bhavati tasya tatkāryatocyate, atiprasaṅgāt /
XXbsa075_u:921: rāgādiyogyatā tarhi vacasaḥ kāraṇam, tayā vinopalakhaṇḍalādau vacanasyādarśanāditi cenna
XXbsa075_u:924: yadi kāraṇaguṇādisakalatadanyakāraṇabhāve 'pi rāgādi yogyatābhāvānnotpadyate vacanamiti sidhyettasyāḥ kāraṇatvam /
XXbsa075_u:928: iṣṭatvānna kiñcid bādhitaṃ syāt, nāmni vivādābhāvāt /
XXbsa075_u:940: kāruṇikasyāpi niṣphalārambho na yukta iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:945: nanu nirvikalpasya bhagavataḥ kathaṃ tasyāmavasthāyāṃ karuṇāsaṃbhavaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:947: tataśca kāraṇābhāvāt kathaṃ kāryasaṃbhava iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:951: yadāhurguravaḥ sattāropakṛto 'pi bhāvanavaśāt kāṭhinyamāpattathā śaithilye 'pi yathāsya duḥkhahataye sāndrastathaiva śramaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:952: utpāde tu phalasya hetuniyamo no tu prabandhasthitau tasmād duḥkhadṛśaḥ kṣaye 'pi vilasanmaitryādaye 'smai namaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:953: etenaitadapi nirastaṃ yadāha kārikāyām rāgādirahite cāsmin nirvyāpāre vyavasthite /
XXbsa075_u:955: nanu yadi nāmaivaṃ vaktṛtvaṃ sarvajñatvena sahāviruddhaṃ dehendriyabuddhyādiyogitvaṃ tu viruddhameva
XXbsa075_u:959: dehādīnāṃ hetutve 'pi naiṣāṃ kevalānāṃ sahakārimātrāṇāmātmābhiniveśalakṣaṇopādānakāraṇavikalānāṃ rāgādijanakatvamityagamakā eva dehādayaḥ sarvajñābhāvasya /
XXbsa075_u:962: tathā hi yadyapi teṣāṃ sati prāmāṇye 'numāna evāntarbhāvaḥ, anantarbhāve cāprāmāṇyameveti
XXbsa075_u:965: na ca vaidikaṃ kiñcidvacanaṃ sarvanarāsarvajñatvapratipādaka mupalabhyate /
XXbsa075_u:966: pratyuta nimittanāmni śākhāntare sphuṭatarameva sarvajñaḥ pratipāditaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:967: tathā hi sa vetti viśvaṃ na ca tasya vettā ityādinā ca sarvajño vede pratipāditaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:969: tathā hi smaryamāṇameva gavādivastu purovartigavayādisādṛśyopādhi gavādyupādhi vā sādṛśyamupamānena pratīyata iti sthitiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:970: na ca sarvajñasantānavartīni cetāṃsi kenacit sarvajñenānubhūtāni yataḥ smaraṇena viṣayīkriyeran,
XXbsa075_u:972: yat punaruktaṃ kumārilena narān dṛṣṭvā tvasarvajñān sarvānevādhunātanān /
XXbsa075_u:977: yato dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho 'nyathā nopapadyata iti adṛṣṭārthaṃparikalpanamarthāpattirucyate
XXbsa075_u:978: na cāsarvajñatvamantareṇa sarvanareṣu kaścidartho dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā nopapadyate yatastadarthāpattyā parikalpyeta /
XXbsa075_u:980: tacca na sarvajñena jñāyate, tajjñānāvadheḥ parastādasattve 'nāditākṣatiprasaṅgāt, tadanyathānupapadyamānaṃ sarvabhāvānāmanāditvaṃ sarvajñābhāvaṃ sādhayatīti cet /
XXbsa075_u:986: tathā hi yathā saṃsārasyānāditve pūrvapūrvavastusattāyā anavadhitvaṃ tathā sarvajñajñānasyāpi pūrvapūrvavastusattāvyāpakatvenānavadhiprasaratā iti /
XXbsa075_u:992: tatra nivṛttiriti prasajyavṛttyā pramāṇānutpattimātramabhipretam, atha vā paryudāsavṛttyā
XXbsa075_u:993: vastvantaram, vastvantaramapi jaḍarūpaṃ jñānarūpaṃ vā, jñānamapi
XXbsa075_u:997: yacca na kiñcit tatkathaṃ prameyaṃ paricchindyāt, tadviṣayaṃ vā vijñānaṃ janayet, pratītaṃ vā tatkathamiti
XXbsa075_u:1001: nāpi vastvantaratāpakṣe jaḍarūpaḥ pramāṇābhāvaḥ saṃgacchate, tasya prameyaparicchedāyogāt
XXbsa075_u:1011: kiṃ ca, kaḥ punarayaṃ pramāṇābhāvo 'bhimato bhavatām /
XXbsa075_u:1020: nanu tathāpi sadvyavahārārthaṃ sādhakamapyasya na vidyate /
XXbsa075_u:1021: tathā hi sarvavido 'tīndriyatvāt na tāvadasmadādipratyakṣamasya sādhakam /
XXbsa075_u:1025: yathā hi kālatvādidānīntanakālavaditi anenānumānena nirākartuṃ śakyate, na tathā sādhayitum
XXbsa075_u:1032: kiṃ ca sarvajñasattāsādhane sarvo hetuḥ trayīṃ doṣajātiṃ nātivartate asiddhatvaṃ viruddhatvamanaikāntikatvaṃ ceti /
XXbsa075_u:1033: tathā hi sarvajñe dharmiṇi kriyamāṇe na taddharmo hetuḥ siddhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1041: kārikā dṛṣṭo na caikadeśo 'sti liṅgaṃ yo vānumāpayet /
XXbsa075_u:1045: tatra pauruṣeyopyāgamaḥ tadīyo vā tatra pramāṇam, narāntarapraṇīto vā /
XXbsa075_u:1052: kiṃ ca sarvajñapraṇītādvacanāt sarvajñasiddhau kimaparāddhaṃ svavacanena yenāto 'pyasau na gamyeta /
XXbsa075_u:1053: nāpi nityāgamagamyaḥ sarvajñaḥ, tathāvidhasya sarvajñapratipādakasya nityāgamasyābhāvāt /
XXbsa075_u:1056: kiṃ ca yadyaṅgīkṛto nityāgamaḥ, kiṃ sarvajñakalpanayā, nitya evāgamo dharme pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
XXbsa075_u:1059: na cāpyevaṃ paro nityaḥ śakyo labdhumihāgamaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1061: āgamasya ca nityatve siddhe tatkalpanā vṛthā /
XXbsa075_u:1070: kārikā sarvajñasadṛśaṃ kañcid yadi paśyema samprati /
XXbsa075_u:1075: na cātra pramāṇapratītaṃ kiñcid vastvasti yatsarvajñamantareṇānupapadyamānaṃ tatsattāmupanayet
XXbsa075_u:1080: yadapīdaṃ kārikābṛhaṭṭīkayorekaṣaṣṭyā ślokaiḥ sarvajñasiddhaye bauddhasya sādhanamāśaṅkaya dūṣitaṃ tadapi ghṛṇākaramiti granthavistarabhayānna likhitam /
XXbsa075_u:1082: tathā hyetāni kila saugataiḥ sarvajñasādhanāya sādhanānyabhidhīyante sarvajño 'stīti satyam,
XXbsa075_u:1087: tasmāt sthitametat nātīndriyadarśī sākṣādasti, api tu nityavacanadvāreṇaiva tasya darśanamiti
XXbsa075_u:1088: tadevaṃ sarvathā sarvajñasādhakapramāṇāsabhavādayukto bauddhānāṃ sarvajñe sadvyavahāra iti atrocyate /
XXbsa075_u:1102: na cānaikāntikaḥ, vacanamātrasya saṃśayaviparyāsapūrvakatve 'pi pramāṇaniścitārthavacanasya sākṣātpāramparyeṇa tadarthasākṣātkārijñānapūrvakatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:1104: ayaṃ ca bhāṣyakārīyaḥ sarvasarvajñaprasādhakaprayogaḥ paṇḍitajitāribhiḥ prapañcita iti tata eva pracayato 'badhārya iti /
XXbsa075_u:1105: daurvāraprativādivikramamanādṛtya pramāprauḍhitaḥ sarvajño jagadekacakṣurudagādeṣa prabhāvo 'tra ca /
XXbsa075_u:1118: vidveṣiṇi viṣajvālā kiñcijjñe tu na kiñcana //
XXbsa075_u:1119: ihaite naiyāyikādayo vivādapadasya kṣitidharādeḥ svarūpopādānopakaraṇasaṃpradānaprayojanavibhāgapravīṇaṃ sarvajñatādiguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ puruṣaviśeṣamicchanti /
XXbsa075_u:1120: yadāhuḥ eko vibhuḥ sarvavidekabuddhisamāśrayaḥ śāśvata īśvarākhyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1122: sa ca kathaṃ sidhyatīti paryanuyuktāḥ sādhanamidamācakṣate /
XXbsa075_u:1134: sa ca saṃkṣepato vibhajyamāno dvidhā vyavatiṣṭhate /
XXbsa075_u:1136: satyapi cāśraye pramāṇena saṃbandhāsiddherasiddho ( Nibandh 33.) yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ
XXbsa075_u:1139: kṣmāruhādau dharmiṇi pramāṇasamadhigate kāryatvasya sādhanasya pramāṇapratītatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:1140: cirotpannaparvatādau ca dharmiṇi kāryatvaṃ sāvayavatvena hetunā boddhavyam /
XXbsa075_u:1147: nanu sāvayavatvena hetunā dravyāṇāmeva kāryatvaṃ sidhyati /
XXbsa075_u:1154: yo yaḥ kāryaguṇādiḥ sa sarvastathā, yathā ghaṭādirūpādiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1158: kāryatvaṃ ca na svakāraṇasamavāyaḥ, sāmānyaviśeṣo vā boddhavyaḥ, yenāsya pradhvaṃsāvyāpakatvād bhāgāsiddhatā syāt, kiṃ tu kāraṇādhīnasvarūpamātram
XXbsa075_u:1159: / tacca śabdādiṣviva pradhvaṃsādāvapi pratyakṣeṇādhigatamiti na tāvadayamasiddho hetuḥ
XXbsa075_u:1161: tathā hi yo vipakṣa eva vartate sa khalu sādhyaviparyayavyāpteḥ sādhyaviruddhaṃ sādhayan viruddho
XXbsa075_u:1167: abhimataṃ hi pareṣāmapi karmajatvaṃ kāryajātasya, karmaṇaśca cetanātmakatvāt, cetanāhetukatvādvā
XXbsa075_u:1169: sarvajñapūrvakatve tu sādhye vyāptiḥ svapne 'pi nopalabddhā /
XXbsa075_u:1171: viruddhatā ca hetorasarvajñapūrvakatvenaiva kumbhādau kāryatvasya vyāpterupalabdheḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1173: tadviśeṣasya tu sarvajñapūrvakatvasyātadviṣayasyāpi tataḥ siddhiriti sāmpratam /
XXbsa075_u:1174: tathā hi yadyasau viśeṣo na sādhanaviṣayaḥ
XXbsa075_u:1175: kathamatastatsiddhiḥ, siddhaṃ vā kathamaviṣayaḥ, viṣayaścet kathamananvayadoṣaṃ na spṛśediti cet /
XXbsa075_u:1177: sāmānyamātravyāptāvapi antarbhāvitaviśeṣasya sāmānyasya pakṣadharmatāvaśena sādhyadharmiṇyanumānāt viśeṣaviṣayamanumānaṃ bhavatyeva /
XXbsa075_u:1179: ( Nibandh 34.) tathā hi vahnayanumānamapi na sāmānyamātraviṣayam, tasya prāgeva siddhatvāt
XXbsa075_u:1181: itarathā gotvasamavāyādiva gāvaḥ śābaleyādayaḥ parvato 'pi vahnitvasamavāyād vahniḥ prasajyeta
XXbsa075_u:1182: astyeva girervahnitvena saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ saṃbandha iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:1183: tarhi nāpratipadya parvatasaṃyuktaṃ vahniviśeṣamasau śakyapratipattiriti vahniviśeṣasyāpyananumānam
XXbsa075_u:1187: tathā hi tatrāpi nendriyakaraṇikā kācit kriyopalabdhā /
XXbsa075_u:1190: na ca vraścanādisādhanā saṃbhavati rūpādiparicchittilakṣaṇā kriyā /
XXbsa075_u:1193: anyathā sāmānyasyāpi vyāpakābhimatasya na siddhiḥ syāt,
XXbsa075_u:1196: nanūpādānādyabhijñakartṛ mātreṇevāsarvajñatvadehitvādibhirapi vyāptiraśakyaparihārā, vyabhicārādarśanasya samānatvāditi cet /
XXbsa075_u:1198: na hi sārvajñyaṃ kartṛṇāṃ yogyatāmupasthāpayati, asarvajñebhyaḥ kumbhakārādibhyaḥ kumbhādīnāmaprasavaprasaṅgāt
XXbsa075_u:1200: tathā na dehitvaṃ kāryotpattāvupayogi kumbhakārādeva keyūrādīnāmutpattiprasaṅgāt /nādehitvaṃ
XXbsa075_u:1204: tena yadyapi buddhimatpūrvakatvamātraṃ vyāptiviṣayastathāpi tadviśeṣasya sarvajñatvasya pakṣadharmatābalāt pratilambha iti viśeṣaviṣayamanumānam /
XXbsa075_u:1207: etena yaduktaṃ kaṇikāyāṃ yadi kulālādīnāṃ katipayopakaraṇādijñānaṃ, na
XXbsa075_u:1208: samastopakaraṇādijñatā, tarhi tenaiva nidarśanena īśvarasyāpi tadupakaraṇādimātrajñānam /
XXbsa075_u:1214: na ca kulālādayo nidarśanam na vālādaya ityatra niyamaheturastīti tannirastam //
XXbsa075_u:1215: īśvarasya hi katipayātīndriyopakaraṇādijñāne tatkāraṇasya sarvatra samānatvādaśeṣopakaraṇādijñatāyā durvāratvāt /
XXbsa075_u:1216: kāraṇaṃ ca tajjñāne sattāmantareṇa nānyat, dharmādharmādīnāṃ laukikapratyāsattihetūnāṃ tatrāsaṃbhavāt /
XXbsa075_u:1219: yathā hi kulālādistulyadarśanasāmagrīkeṣu nākiñcijjñāḥ tathātīndriyopakaraṇādiṣvapīśvaraḥ, sāmarthyasyāviśeṣāt /
XXbsa075_u:1226: yadabhihitam - nityau cet kimīśvarasya jñānena cikīrṣāprayatnopayoginā,
XXbsa075_u:1230: jñānaṃ hi yatra cikīrṣāprayatnāvanityau tatra tāvupasthāpayadupakaraṇādikamupadarśayati /
XXbsa075_u:1231: yatra tu tau nityau tatropakaraṇādikamupadarśayadapi saphalam /
XXbsa075_u:1233: ata eva ca so 'yamīdṛśo viśeṣo vicārāsahaḥ kathaṃ pakṣadharmatābalādapi sādhyadharmiṇyupasaṃhriyata ityādirapi pralāpa eva /
XXbsa075_u:1241: vicitrā hi puruṣamātrasya cetovṛttiḥ prāgeva viśvasya kartuḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1244: pratyuta pituḥ putragaṇḍapāṭanavṛttirivālpaduḥkhadānena prabhūtadāruṇaduḥkhāpanayanāt karuṇātiśayameva gamayati /
XXbsa075_u:1246: yaccedamudīritam - yadi hi sarvakāryāṇāmekaḥ kartā syāt tato 'jñasya ( Nibandh 36.) tattvānupapatteḥ sarvajñatā syāt /
XXbsa075_u:1247: atha punarekaikaṃ kāryamekaikena kartrā janyata iti yo yajjanayati sa tatkāraṇamātrajña eva na tu sarvajña iti /
XXbsa075_u:1255: ekatve tu na pramāṇāntaramanveṣṭavyam, ekasya karturabhāve bahūnāṃ
XXbsa075_u:1256: vyāhatamanasāṃ svātantreṇa parasparavirodhena mithaḥ svānukūlābhiprāyānavabodhena yugapatkāryānutpatiḥ, utpannasya vā vilopādiprasaṅgaḥ syāditi /
XXbsa075_u:1261: na ca buddheranityatāyāstatra tatropalabdherīśvarabuddherapi tathātvaṃ yuktam, rūpādīnāmapyanityānāṃ tatra tatropalabdhestoyādiparamāṇusamavetānāmapi
XXbsa075_u:1265: saṃyuktāḥ khalvīśvareṇa paramāṇavaḥ, taiśca kṣetrajñāḥ, tatsamavetau ca dharmādharmāviti
XXbsa075_u:1268: tadevamabhimatasyaiva sarvajñatālakṣaṇasya viśeṣasya siddhernaiṣa viśeṣaviruddho hetuḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1271: sa hi bhavannasādhāraṇo vā syāt, yathā nityā pṛthvī
XXbsa075_u:1272: gandhavatvāditi; anupasaṃhāryo vā, yathā sarvaṃ nityaṃ prameyatvāditi;
XXbsa075_u:1273: sādhāraṇo vā yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ, asparśavattvāditi /
XXbsa075_u:1274: tatra na tāvadādimau pakṣau, sapakṣasadbhāvadarśanena pratikṣiptatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:1276: nanu puruṣavyāpāramantareṇa tṛṇādīnudayamānānavalokayan lokaḥ kāryamātraṃ puruṣapūrvakamiti vyāptimeva na pratipadyata iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:1278: tatrāpi hi vyāptipratītikāla eva vyāghrādiparyākulātidurgapradeśe vahnivyāpāramantareṇa dhūmaṃ puruṣavyāpāraṃ vinā pūrvaṃ siddhaṃ ghaṭaṃ vā vilokayan loko dhūmamātraṃ vahnipūrvakaṃ ghaṭamātraṃ vā puruṣapūervakamiti vyāptimeva na pratipadyata iti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:1281: yadyevaṃ tṛṇādāvapi puruṣasya svabhāvaviprakṛṣṭatvādapratikṣepa iti sarvaṃ samānamanyatrābhiniveśāt
XXbsa075_u:1283: sā ca puruṣasyādṛśyatvādasattvād vā na pratīyatām, kimanena vicāritena /
XXbsa075_u:1284: sarvathā kiñcitkāryamapūrvapuruṣapūrvakamapaśyanna vyāptiṃ kāryamātrasya puruṣeṇa kaścit cetanāvānavagacchatīti cet /
XXbsa075_u:1285: yadyevaṃ vahnimātrapūrvakatā tāvanna pratīyate dhūmasya, puruṣamātrapūrvakatā ca ghaṭasya
XXbsa075_u:1286: sā ca vahnerdeśaviprakṛṣṭatvādasattvād vā puruṣasya kālaviprakṛṣṭatvādasattvād vā na pratīyatām, kimanena vicāritena /
XXbsa075_u:1287: sarvathā dhūmamātraṃ vahnivyāpārapūrvakamapaśyan ghaṭamātraṃ vā puruṣapūrvakamapaśyannavyāptimeva dhūmasya vahnimātreṇa ghaṭasya puruṣamātreṇa vā kaściccetanāvānadhigacchatītyapyucyamānaṃ na vaktraṃ vakrīkaroti /
XXbsa075_u:1296: kāryaviśeṣasyaiva tadutpādasiddhirna kāryasāmānyasya, yathā dhūmādivartino vastutvādernānalādijanyatvaniścaya iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:1300: yathā hi kāryaṃ vastrādyupādānavad dṛṣṭam, kāryāntaramapyadṛṣṭopādānamupādānavat kāryatvādyupasthāpyate tathā tadeva kāryaṃ vastrādi
XXbsa075_u:1304: tasmād yathā kāryaṃ ca syānnirupādānaṃ ceti na śakyamāśaṅkitum,
XXbsa075_u:1305: kāryamātrasyopādānamātrādutpādasiddheḥ tathā kāryaṃ ca bhavedakartṛkaṃ ceti nāśaṅkanīyam, kāryamātrasya kartṛmātrādutpādasiddheraviśeṣāt //
XXbsa075_u:1307: tathāpi na kāryamātrād buddhimadanumānam, api tu kāryaviśeṣādeva /
XXbsa075_u:1313: api ca kā punariyaṃ kṛtabuddhiḥ, kimapekṣitaparavyāpārāvasāyo 'tha
XXbsa075_u:1316: yadyādyaḥ pakṣaḥ sa kathaṃ kṣityādiṣu nāsti,
XXbsa075_u:1318: / atha puruṣeṇa kṛtamiti pauruṣeyatvaniścayaḥ kṛtabuddhirabhimatā, tadāpi tādṛśī kṛtabuddhiḥ kasya nāstīti vaktavyam /
XXbsa075_u:1322: atha tadviparītasya sādhyabuddhirna bhavatīti kṛtabuddhihetukatvamavanitanumahīruhādiṣu nāstīti buddhimato 'numānaṃ pratikṣipyate /
XXbsa075_u:1328: na ca kāryatvena hetunā saha mṛddhikārasya samakakṣatā /
XXbsa075_u:1329: tasya svasādhyena dṛśyakumbhakāreṇa saha vyabhicārasya śataśo darśanāt /
XXbsa075_u:1330: kāryatvasya tu dṛśyādṛśyasādhāraṇena buddhimanmātreṇa tadyogāditi nāyamanaikāntikaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1346: āgamaviruddhaḥ, śuci na(ra) śiraḥ kapālaṃ prāṇyaṅgatvāditi /
XXbsa075_u:1347: tatra na tāvadayaṃ pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ, sādhyaviparyayasya pratyakṣāviṣayatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:1355: sahasraśīrṣā puruṣaḥ ityādinā tatra kartureva pratipādanāt /
XXbsa075_u:1416: iha khalu buddhimatkāryamātrayoḥ sādhyasādhanayoḥ sarvopasaṃhāravatī vyāptistāvadavaśyaṃ grahītavyā
XXbsa075_u:1418: sā ca gṛhyamāṇā kiṃ kāraṇakāryamātrayoriva viparyayabādhakapramāṇabalād grāhyā /
XXbsa075_u:1421: āhosvit sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ sakṛddarśanādarśanābhyāṃ jñātavyeti catvāro vikalpāḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1425: tathā hīdaṃ kāryatvaṃ yathā buddhimatā vyāptamiṣyate tathā
XXbsa075_u:1428: sa ca deśādi niyamaḥ kādācitkakāraṇasannidhiḥ sāmagrī vā buddhimatpūrvikā siddhā /
XXbsa075_u:1429: yadi punaracetanāni cetanānadhiṣṭhitāni kāryaṃ kuryuḥ tato patra kvacanāvasthitāni janayeyuriti na deśakālasvabhāvaniyataprasavaṃ kāryamupalabhyeta /
XXbsa075_u:1430: hetusamavadhānajanmatayā na kāryaṃ pratyekaṃ kāraṇairjanyata iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:1434: no khalu kvacidavasthitāni ( Nibandh 41.) daṇḍādīni vinā kumbhakāraprayatnamadṛṣṭaviśeṣavaśādeva parasparaṃ sannidhīyante /
XXbsa075_u:1435: sannihitāni vā kāryāya prabhavantīti buddhimatā deśakālasvabhāvaniyamasya kādācitkakāraṇasannidheḥ sāmagryāśca vyāptisiddhiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1436: buddhimadabhāve caiṣāṃ vyāpakānāṃ nivṛttau nivartamānaṃ kāryatvaṃ buddhimatpūrvakatvena vyāpyata iti pratibandhasiddhaye vyāpakānupalambhatrayamupanyastam /
XXbsa075_u:1437: tathā ca na kāryaṃ buddhimatparityāgāt ahetukameva bhavatīti saṃbhāvyam,
XXbsa075_u:1442: tathā buddhimantamantareṇācetanena karaṇe sarvadā kriyāyā avirāmaprasaṅgaścetyapi viparyayabādhakamatiprasaṅgacatuṣṭayaṃ vyāptiprasādhakamiti kāryatvasya hetupūrvakatvamiva
XXbsa075_u:1445: sidhyatyevedaṃ manorājyaṃ yadi deśakālasvabhāvaniyamasya kādācitkakāraṇasannidheḥ sāmagryāśca buddhimatpūrvakatvena vyāptiḥ sidhyati /
XXbsa075_u:1456: kādācitkakāraṇasannidhiśca, sāmagrī ca buddhimatpūrvikā dṛṣṭā ityaparopi deśakālasvabhāvaniyamādistathaiveti cet /
XXbsa075_u:1457: yadyevaṃ ghaṭādikamapi kāryaṃ bahuśo buddhimatpūrvakamupalabdhamiti sarvameva kāryaṃ tathāstu, kimanena vyāpakānu (pa)lambhopanyāsaduarvyasanena /
XXbsa075_u:1461: astu tadā pratyakṣameva sarvatra vyāptigrāhakamiti cet /
XXbsa075_u:1464: tathā siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve dhūmasyāhetukotpatāvanyasmādevo tpattāvanyasmādapyutpattau saṃbhāvyamānāyāṃ deśādiniyamābhāva (klṛptahetu)
XXbsa075_u:1466: prastute tu buddhimatkāryamātrayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo nādyāpi siddhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1468: na cācetanasya kartṛtve kriyāyā ( Nibandh 42.) avirāmaprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1469: na hyacetanamityeva sarvadā sāmarthyayogi, tasyāpi svahetuparamparāpratibaddhasāmarthyatvādityacetanakāraṇaviśeṣaparamparāsaṃbhāvanāyāṃ nāvaśyaṃ buddhimadākṣepa iti svamatavyālopaviklavavikrośitamātramevedaṃ na punaratra nyāyagandho 'pi /
XXbsa075_u:1473: sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatvaṃ nāma hetudoṣa eva na bhavati /
XXbsa075_u:1475: tathā hi ya eva vipakṣe dṛṣṭo hetuḥ sa eva prameyatvādivadabhimataṃ na sādhayet /
XXbsa075_u:1477: 'sapakṣe nopalakṣitaḥ sa kathaṃ sādhyaṃ na sādhayet /
XXbsa075_u:1479: iti tu datāvakāśā laukikamaryādātikrameṇa saṃśayapiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstoti nāyaṃ kvacitpravarteta /
XXbsa075_u:1483: tasmāt prāmāṇikalokayātrāmanupālayatā yathādarśanaṃ śaṅkanīyam, na tvadṛṣṭamapi /
XXbsa075_u:1490: sa sarvavyavahāreṣu saṃśayātmā kṣayaṃ vrajet // iti //
XXbsa075_u:1492: na hi mahatāpi prayatnena vipakṣe mṛgyamāṇasya hetoradarśanamātreṇa vyatirekaḥ sidhyati /
XXbsa075_u:1493: tathā hi vipakṣe heturnopalabhyata ityanena tadupalambhakapramāṇanivṛttirucyate /
XXbsa075_u:1494: pramāṇaṃ ca prameyasya kāryam, nākāraṇaṃ viṣaya iti nyāyāt /
XXbsa075_u:1497: yadi punaḥ pramāṇasattayā prameyasattā vyāptā syāt, tadā yuktametat /
XXbsa075_u:1505: yaccoktam - saṃśayapiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstīti na kvacit
XXbsa075_u:1512: tathā hi arthasandeho 'narthasandeho veti nāyaṃ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1513: kintvarthonmukhaḥ sandeho 'rthasandehaḥ, anarthonmukhaḥ sandeho 'nartha sandeha iti śākapārthivādivanmadhyapadalopī samāsaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1514: evaṃ sati snigdhānnapānādāvarthasandeha eva, tajjātīyasya svaparasantāne dṛṣṭipuṣṭyādyarthasya koṭiśaḥ karaṇadarśanāt, maraṇāderanarthasya kvacit kadāciddarśanāt /
XXbsa075_u:1516: tasmāt pramāṇādivārthasaṃśayādapi prekṣāvatāṃ tatra tatra pravṛttirdurvāraiva //
XXbsa075_u:1517: yadapīdaṃ lapitaṃ yathādarśanaṃ śaṅkanīyaṃ nādṛṣṭapūrvamapi viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣo hi saṃśaya ityādi
XXbsa075_u:1523: evaṃ ca sati tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇapratibandhaviyogitvena sādhāraṇena dharmeṇa prameyatvadhūmatvakāryatvādīnāṃ tvanmatena sajātīyatvāt prameyatvavyabhicāradarśanameva śaṅkāmupasthāpayatīti yathādarśanamevedamāśaṅkitam yaśca kumārilasya sākṣitvenopanyāsaḥ sa khalu dadhibhāṇḍe viḍālaḥ sākṣīti pravādaṃ nātipatatīti kimatra vaktavyam /
XXbsa075_u:1527: ata evāsyopanyāso 'doṣodbhāvanaṃ nāma nigrahasthānamiti yadanenāveditaṃ tadapi sāvadyam
XXbsa075_u:1528: pratyutāsmin hetoḥ saddūṣaṇe parihartavye nāyaṃ hetudoṣo 'to na parihartavyo 'sya copanyāso
XXbsa075_u:1529: 'doṣodbhāvanaṃ nāma nigrahasthānamiti bruvannayameva tapasvī svamatena niranuyojyānuyogalakṣaṇena nigrahasthānena nigṛhyata iti kṛpāmarhati /
XXbsa075_u:1533: kiṃ dṛśyaśarīropādhinā buddhimanmātreṇa vyāptirgṛhyate, āhosvit dṛśyaśarīropādhiviśureṇa dṛśyādṛśyasādhāraṇeneti ( Nibandh 44.) vikalpau /
XXbsa075_u:1534: yadyādyaḥ pakṣaḥ, tadā tathābhūtasādhyamantareṇāpyutpadyamāne viṭapādau kāryatvadarśanāt prameyatvādivat sādhāraṇānaikāntiko hetuḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1541: tatra prasiddhakartṛke ghaṭādau pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptimādāya sandehapade kṣmāruhādau kāryatvamupasaṃhṛtya buddhimānanumīyate /
XXbsa075_u:1545: na hi vyabhicāraviṣaya eva pakṣe bhavitumarhati,
XXbsa075_u:1546: sandigdhe hetuvacanād vyasto hetoranāśrayaḥ iti nyāyāt /
XXbsa075_u:1547: vyabhicāraviṣayatā ca dṛśyaśarīropādherbuddhimanmātrasya tṛṇādyutpattau dṛśyānupalambhena pratikṣiptatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:1548: tataśca kṣmādharādireva sandigdhakartṛkaḥ pakṣīkartumucitaḥ kṣmāruhādistvacetanakartṛka iti caturtho bhāvarāśirneṣṭavyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1549: atha vyabhicāracamatkārāstrividhabhāvarāśivyavasthāpanārthaṃ ca viṭapādau pratyakṣāpratikṣiptena dṛśyādṛśyasādhāraṇena buddhimanmātreṇa vyaptiravagamyata iti dvitīyaḥ saṅkalpaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1550: tadā viṭapādau buddhimanmātrasya saṃbhāvyamānatvāt na sādhāraṇānaikāntikatāṃ brū maḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1551: kiṃ tarhi vyāptigrahaṇakāle dṛśyādṛśyasādhāraṇasya buddhimanmātrasya sādhyasyādṛśyatayā dṛśyānupalambhena vyatirekāsiddhervyāpterabhāvāt sandigdhavyāvṛttikatvamācakṣmahe /
XXbsa075_u:1553: yadā kumbhakāravyāpārātpūrvaṃ kumbhasya vyatirekaḥ pratyetavyastadā na sādhyābhāvakṛto ghaṭavyatirekaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1554: yathā hi viṭapādijanmasamaye buddhimanmātrasyādṛśyatvena niṣeddhumaśakyatvāt sattāsaṃbhāvanā tathā ghaṭādāvapi vyatirekaniścayakāle buddhimanmātrasyādṛśyatvāt sattvasaṃbhāvanāyāṃ sādhyābhāvaprayuktasya sādhanābhāvasyāsiddhatvena vyāpterabhāvāt kathaṃ na sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1555: yathoktam - na ca yathā kāryaṃ ca syānnirupādānaṃ ceti nāśaṅkanīyam, tathā kāryaṃ ca bhavedakartṛkaṃ ceti nāśaṅkanīyamiti, tatrāpi kāryaṃ ca
XXbsa075_u:1556: syānnirupādānaṃ ca bhavediti na vaktavyamiti kenaiva pratārito 'si /
XXbsa075_u:1557: yadi hyatra pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptirgṛhyate tadā kathamupādānapūrvakaṃ kāryamātra sidhyati /
XXbsa075_u:1562: tathā hi yathāṅkurādikaṃ kāryaṃ niyatadeśakālasvabhāvatvena vyāptaṃ tathā śālitvādināpi ( 45.) jātibhedena vyāptamupalabdham /
XXbsa075_u:1563: tataścānupādānapūrvakatvādvipakṣātmanaḥ śālitvādijātibhedasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau nivartamānaṃ kāryatvamupādānapūrvakatve viśrāmyat tena vyāptaṃ sidhyati /
XXbsa075_u:1565: upādānaṃ vinā kṛtānupādānādeva kevalādekajātīyakāraṇāt tadatajjātīyakāryotpattau kāryabhedasyāhetukatvaprasaṅgāt taduktam -
XXbsa075_u:1569: na caivaṃ kāryamātrakartṛtvamātrayorapi vyāptiprasādhakaṃ viparyaye bādhakaṃ
XXbsa075_u:1572: tasmātkāryaṃ ca syāt na ca dhīmatkartṛpūrvakamiti śaṅkāṃ kurvāṇaḥ prativādī vinā caraṇamardanādinā niṣeddhumaśakyaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:1573: nanu yadi dṛśyāgnidhūmasāmānyayoriva dṛśyātmanoreva kāryakāraṇasāmānyayoḥ pratyakṣānupalambhato vyāptistadā paracittānumānakṣatiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1574: svaparasantānasādhāraṇena dṛśyādṛśyena cinmātreṇa pratyakṣato dṛśyaviṣayād vyāptigrahaṇāyogādityapi na vācyam /
XXbsa075_u:1575: bāhyārthasthitau hi svaparasantānasādhāraṇasya cinmātrasya svarūpeṇādṛśyatve 'pi dṛśyaśarīreṇa sahaikasāmagrīpratibandhādavinirbhāgavartitvamastyeva /
XXbsa075_u:1576: tato yathā ghaṭaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ rūpaikadeśapravṛttamapyavyabhicārāt samudāyopasthāpakam tathā dehagrāhakameva pratyakṣaṃ dehāvinirbhāgavarti svaparasantānasādhāraṇaṃ cinmātraṃ kampādervyāpakamadhigacchati tadevaṃ dṛśyātmano dṛśyāvinirbhāgavartino vā padārthasya vyāvahārikapaṭupratyakṣataḥ siddhirvyāptigrahaśca, na tu tathātvavinākṛtādṛśyasādhāraṇacinmātrasyeti santānāntarānumānamucitam /
XXbsa075_u:1577: tasmād yadi pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptigrahastadā dṛśyenaiva dṛśyasyeti nyāyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1580: kartā ced vyatirekasiddhividhurā vyāptiḥ kathaṃ sidhyati /
XXbsa075_u:1582: tattyāge 'pi tadā tṛṇādikamiti vyaktaṃ vipakṣe kṣaṇam //
XXbsa075_u:1584: nanu bhūyodarśanādarśanābhyāṃ pratibandhaḥ pratīyata iti tṛtīya evāsmākaṃ pakṣaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1585: kevalaṃ sa pratibandho na tadutpattilakṣaṇo grahītavyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1590: na sapakṣāsapakṣayordarśanābhyāṃ kāryatvasya gamakatvamapi tu svābhāvikapratibandhabalāditi brū maḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1591: sa eva tu sapakṣāsapakṣayordarśanādarśanābhyāṃ bakṣyamāṇena krameṇa pratīyata iti tadupakṣepo 'pi yuktaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1592: tena yasyāsau svābhāvikapratibandho niyataḥ siddhaḥ sa eva gamako gamyaścetaraḥ sambandhīti yujyate /
XXbsa075_u:1593: tathā hi dhūmādīnāṃ vahnyādibhiḥ saha sambandhaḥ svābhāviko na tu vahnyādīnāṃ dhūmādibhiḥ
XXbsa075_u:1596: tasmād vahnyādīnāmārdrendhanādyupādhikṛtaḥ sambandho na tu svābhāvikastato na niyataḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1601: na cānupalabhyamāno darśanānarhatayā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvena sandihyamāna upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatvaṃ pratibadhnātīti yuktam /
XXbsa075_u:1606: anyasyānyena sahākāraṇena cet svābhāvikaḥ sambandho bhavet,
XXbsa075_u:1609: athānyaccedanyasya kāryaṃ kasmāt sarvaṃ sarvasmānna bhavati anyatvāviśeṣāt
XXbsa075_u:1612: tasmādanyatvāviśeṣe 'pi kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca kiñciditi /
XXbsa075_u:1619: prācīnānekadarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāye carame darśane cetasi vakāsti dhūmasyāgniniyatasvabhāvatvam, ratnatattvamiva parokṣakasya,
XXbsa075_u:1621: na hyetat sarvamāpātato na pratibhātamiti purastādapi pratibhāsamānamanyathā bhavatīti //
XXbsa075_u:1622: trilocanena punarayamarthaḥ kathitaḥ - bhūyodarśanena bhūyodarśanasahāyena manasā tajjātīyānāṃ saṃbandho gṛhīto bhavati /
XXbsa075_u:1629: vācaspatināpīdamuktam - abhijātamaṇibhedatattvavad bhūyodarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyamindriyameva dhūmādīnā vahnyādibhiḥ svābhāvikasaṃbandhagrāhīti yuktamiti //
XXbsa075_u:1631: bhede sati tadutpatteranyaḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ śabdāsphālanamātramevedam /
XXbsa075_u:1633: tathā hi svābhāvikastu dhūmādīnāṃ vahnyādibhiḥ saṃbandhaḥ tadupādheranupalabhyamānatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:1639: tataśca dhūmasyāpi hutāśena saha sambandhe syādupādhiḥ, na copalakṣyata iti
XXbsa075_u:1642: kathaṃ dhūma ityeva pāvakasatāniyama iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:1645: kiṃ sarvatra dhūme satyavaśyamagniḥ sambhavī na veti kadācidarthāntaramupādhimapekṣya dhūmo 'pi syānnāgniriti kimatra niṣṭaṅkakāraṇam /
XXbsa075_u:1658: na cānarthasandehaḥ sarvatra va rtuṃ śakyate, kvacidarthonmukhatāyā eva darśanāt //
XXbsa075_u:1659: yaccānyatvāviśeṣe 'pi kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca kiñciditi svabhāvo yathā na paryanuyojyastathaiṣa svabhāvānanuyogo 'kāryakāraṇabhūtānāmapi
XXbsa075_u:1660: svabhāvapratibandhe tulya eveti grāmyajanadhandhīkaraṇaṃ prativandīkaraṇamatilāghavamāviskaroti vācaspateḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1661: tathā hi vastutvāviśeṣe 'pyagnirdahati nākāśamityatra yathā nātiprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ
XXbsa075_u:1662: pramāṇasiddhatvādasyārthasya, tathā bhedāviśeṣe 'pi kiñcideva kasyacitkāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca kiñcidityatrāpi nātiprasaṅgāvatāraḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1666: na ca pratijñāsiddhe vastunyatiprasaṅgo nābhidhātavyaḥ, sarveṣāṃ sarvatra tadrūpābhyupagamamātreṇa vijetṛtvaprasaṅgāt /
XXbsa075_u:1673: kiṃ svato bhūtaḥ svahetuto bhūto 'hetuko veti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1675: dvitīyapakṣe tu tadutpattireva saṃbandho mukhāntareṇa svīkṛta iti na kaścidvivādaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1678: gamakatvamapitu svābhāvikasaṃbandhabalāditi brūmaḥ, sa eva tu
XXbsa075_u:1682: tasya coktanyāyenāsiddhau bhūyodarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāye carame cetasi manasi vā tathābhūtaṃ niyatatvaṃ parisphuratīti sadayena vaktumaśakyatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:1683: yacca śabdatattvamiva brāhmaṇatvamiveti dṛṣṭāntīkṛtaṃ taddvayamapyasmān pratyasiddhamiti dṛṣṭāntayitumanucitam
XXbsa075_u:1685: tasya hyupadeśaparamparāto māṇikyavattenāpi kaṣṭenendradhanurākārajyotirādikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ niścitam
XXbsa075_u:1686: na caivaṃ svābhāvikasaṃbandhalakṣaṇaṃ tvayā svakapolaracitamapi pramāṇena niścitam /
XXbsa075_u:1688: kiṃ ca bhavatu tāvadayamanavadhāritarūpaḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ, tathāpi darśanādarśanābhyāmasya grahaṇamatidurlabham /
XXbsa075_u:1689: tathā hi yadi prācīnānekadarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyena caramacetasā dhūmasyāgniniyatatvaṃ grāhyaṃ tadā sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ koṭiśaḥ pravṛttadarśanādarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyena caramacetasā pārthivatvasyāpi
XXbsa075_u:1691: atha pārthivatvasya lohalekhyatvaniyatatvameva nāsti vajre vyābhicāradaerśanāt /
XXbsa075_u:1693: tarhi dhūmasya vahniniyatatvameva nāsti, vyabhicārābhāvasya darśayitumaśakyatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:1698: prathame pakṣe vyabhicāro bhavatu mā vā vyabhicārādarśanādevāvyabhicāra iti niṣṇātaṃ pāṇḍityam
XXbsa075_u:1709: kvacit kadācit kenacid vyabhicāradarśanasāmagryāṃ satyāṃ vyabhicāradarśanāt /
XXbsa075_u:1710: darśanasāmagryabhāve tu pratyayāntaravaikalyāt deśakālāntaravartitvād vā vyabhicārasya sa(rvaṃ)
XXbsa075_u:1713: prakārāntareṇa vā tadutpattilakṣaṇenāvyabhicāre vyabhicārānupalambha ityubhayathāpi vyabhicāropalambhanivṛttirastu
XXbsa075_u:1714: tvayā tu yadavyabhicārapratipattinibandhanaṃ darśanādarśanamupavarṇitaṃ tatpārthivatvādau vyabhicārād dhūme 'pi nāvyabhicāranibandhanamiti dhūmo 'pi tvanmate nāśvāsabhājanamiti prasaktam /
XXbsa075_u:1715: asmanmate tu pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāmekatra kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau na vyabhicāraśaṅkāsaṃbhavaḥ
XXbsa075_u:1716: tadabhāve tu hetumattāṃ vilaṅghayediti nyāyāt na saṃśayapiśācāvasaraḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1718: tarhi sakṛt sapakṣāsapakṣayodarśanārdanābhyāṃ vyāpterniścaya iti caturtha eva pakṣo 'stu /
XXbsa075_u:1719: tathā hi kāryatvasya buddhimanmātrapūrvakatvenānvayo ghaṭādau dṛṣṭaḥ, ākāśādau buddhimatkāraṇanivṛttau kāryatvasya vyatirekaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1720: tataśca sakṛdanvayavyātireka siddhau vyāpteḥ siddhatvāt kuto 'naikāntikatā
XXbsa075_u:1722: yadi buddhimatkāraṇakāryatvayorekatra pratibandhaḥ pramāṇapratītaḥ syāttadā ākāśādau buddhimannivṛttau kāryatvasya nivṛttiriti yuktam /
XXbsa075_u:1723: sa ca pratibandhaḥ tādātmyaṃ tadutpattiḥ svābhāviko
XXbsa075_u:1734: tat kasyābhāvaprayuktaḥ kāryābhāvaḥ pratīyatāṃ yena vyatirekaḥ sidhyati//
XXbsa075_u:1736: yathākāśe buddhimatkāraṇanivṛttistathā kāraṇamātrasyāpi tatra nivṛttirna buddhimatkāraṇavyatirekānuvidhāyitvaṃ kāryatvasya niścetuṃ śakyate /
XXbsa075_u:1737: tathāpi ghaṭādau kāryatvasya buddhimatānyayadarśanādākāśe 'pi buddhimadabhāvaprayuktaḥ kāryatvābhāvaḥ pratīyate /
XXbsa075_u:1743: tat ( Nibandh 50.) ka evaṃ jānātu kiṃ buddhimadbhāve kāryatvasya bhāvo yadvā kaṭakuḍyādibhāve bhāva iti /
XXbsa075_u:1745: na ca pratibandhasādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ svapne 'pyastīti caturtho 'pi pakṣaḥ kṣataḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1746: tadevaṃ buddhimatkāryamātrayorvyāpterasiddhāvadhikaraṇasiddhānta nyāyādyupādānādyabhijñaḥ sarvajñaḥ puruṣaviśeṣaḥ sidhyatīti pratyāśā durāśaiva //
XXbsa075_u:1749: tatra hi rūpajñānānyathānupapattyā siddhasya kāraṇāntarasyaiva cakṣurindriyamiti nāmakaraṇāt
XXbsa075_u:1754: tathaiva yadi tvayāpi buddhimatsāmānyāśrayamātrasya puruṣaviśeṣaḥ iti nāma kriyate, tadā nāsmākaṃ kācidvipratipattiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1755: paramārthato buddhimatsāmānyāśraye sarvajñatvādiviśeṣaścakṣurādiviśeṣavat sidhyatīti tatra vivadāmahe /
XXbsa075_u:1758: dṛśye tu sādhye vyabhicāra eva dṛśyaṃ na cenna vyabhicārasiddhiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1759: sādhāraṇatvādatha vā vipakṣasandehataḥ sādhyamato na sidhyati //
XXbsa075_u:1762: yadetanmerumandaramedinīghaṭapaṭādisādhāraṇaṃ kāryamātraṃ sādhanamupanyastam yāvadasya buddhimadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānamekatra nāvadhāryate tāvad gamakatvamayuktam /
XXbsa075_u:1763: na ca tat svapne 'pi pratyetuṃ śakyam /
XXbsa075_u:1764: tathā hi kumbhakāravyāpāre sati mṛtpiṇḍād ghaṭalakṣaṇaṃ kāryamupalabhyatāṃ nāma /
XXbsa075_u:1765: na tu vyāpārāt pūrvaṃ ghaṭavatkāryamātrasya vyatirekaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyaḥ, kumbhakāravyatireke
XXbsa075_u:1767: na ca yadvinābhūtaṃ yadupalabhyate tattasya kāryamatiprasaṅgāt /
XXbsa075_u:1769: kriyatāṃ buddhimadvyatireke kāryamātravyatirekastvekatrāpi pratipādyatāṃ yena vyāptisiddhau tṛṇādiriva śoṣabhaṅgāderapi buddhimadanumānaṃ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:1771: ākāśādivaidharmyadṛṣṭāntastu pūrvaṃ pratihataḥ, buddhimatpūrvakatvasyeva kāraṇamātrapūrvakatvasyāpi tatra saṃbhavāt kiṃprayuktaḥ kāryatvābhāva
XXbsa075_u:1773: etena yaduktam - na vyabhicāropalambhātprātisvikaviśeṣaparityāgena ghaṭādīnāmabhūtvābhavanādanyarūpaṃ viśeṣamupalakṣayāmo yanniṣṭhaṃ
XXbsa075_u:1775: kumbhakārādyabhāve 'pi mṛtpiṇḍādau śoṣabhaṅgādikāryadarśanādabhūtvā bhāvalakṣaṇasya kāryamātrasya vyatirekāsiddhervyāpterabhāvāt //
XXbsa075_u:1776: nanu yadi kāryatvamātrasya na buddhimatā pratyakṣato vyāptigrahaḥ
XXbsa075_u:1777: vyatirekābhāvāt, tvayāpi tarhi kathaṃ kṛtakatvasyānityatvena vyāptiravadhāryata iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:1780: na ca tvayā viparyayabādhakapramāṇamabhidhātuṃ śakyata iti prāgeva pratipāditam /
XXbsa075_u:1793: yaddṛṣṭerakriyādarśino 'pi kṝtabuddhirutpadyate tatkāryaṃ sakalaprāsādādyanugataṃ bhūdharādivyāvṛttaṃ viśiṣṭamityabhidhīyate /
XXbsa075_u:1796: tathā cāha śaṅkaraḥ - kṛtabuddhiḥ kiṃ sādhyabuddhiḥ kiṃ vā sādhanabuddhiḥ
XXbsa075_u:1801: vācaspatiḥ punaratrāha - idamatra nipuṇataraṃ nirūpayatu bhavān kiṃ buddhimadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1803: yadi pūrvakaḥ kalpaḥ, sa buddhimaddhetukatvaṃ tanubhuvanādīnāmātiṣṭhamānairabhyupeyata eva
XXbsa075_u:1807: ya eva hi ghaṭo 'nena buddhimadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyī dṛṣṭaḥ, sa eva kāryo na tu vipaṇivartī
XXbsa075_u:1810: hantotpattimadghaṭādi buddhimadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyīti anyadapitanubhuvanādikaṃ tathā bhavanna daṇḍena parāṇudyate ghaṭajātīyamutpattimadbuddhimatpūrvakamiti cet /
XXbsa075_u:1815: tat kiṃ kāryajātīyaṃ prāsādādi buddhimaddhetukaṃ na dṛṣṭam yenotpattimattanubhuvanādi tathā na syāt /
XXbsa075_u:1832: sandigdhavyatirekitvaṃ naiyāyikānāṃ niranuyojyānuyogo bauddhānāmadoṣodbhāvanaṃ nigrahasthānamiti tu pratipāditam /
XXbsa075_u:1838: yadi sādhyadṛṣṭāntayorvaidharmyamātrāt sādhyāsiddhiḥ nirvṛttedānīmanumānavārtāpi nikuñjamahānasayorapi dhūmavattve 'pi kathañcid vaidharmyopapatteriti sakalaṃ yatkiñcidetaditi /
XXbsa075_u:1840: yattāvat kāryatvamātraṃ tadevoktena krameṇa pratibandhasiddherbhūdharādiṣu dṛṣṭaṃ puruṣamanumāpayatītyasmākamabhimatasādhyamasiddhirupapannaiveti kimasmākamadhikacintayetyaṅgīkṛtyāpyuktaṃ viśiṣṭakāryatvam /
XXbsa075_u:1841: tadeva tu nāstīti punarvistareṇa pratipāditamiti tadapi sarvamanavadheyameva /
XXbsa075_u:1843: yacca viśiṣṭakāryatvaṃ vikalpya dūṣitaṃ tasyāsmābhiranabhyupagatatvāt taddūṣaṇāya prabandhaḥ prayāsaikaphalaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1848: tatra yadi nāma paṭasya prāsādādibhiḥ saha vastutvasaṃsthānaviśeṣayogitvakāryatvādibhirdharmaiḥ sajātīyatvamasti tathāpi na tān dharmān buddhimatpūrvakānadhigacchati vyāvahārikaṃ
XXbsa075_u:1851: kiṃ tu yasyaiva ghaṭajātīya kāryaṃcakrasya vyatirekasiddhistasya buddhimadvyāptatvaṃ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyatītyuktam /
XXbsa075_u:1853: yadā tu prāsādajātīyakamapi buddhimaddhetukamekatra pṛthagavadhāryate tadā tajjātīyādapi buddhimatsiddhiḥ
XXbsa075_u:1854: evaṃ tattajjātīyasarābodañcanaśakaṭapaṭakeyūraprabhṛteḥ kāryacakrād buddhimatpūrvakatvena pṛthak pṛthagavadhāritād buddhimadanumānamanavadyam
XXbsa075_u:1859: evaṃ ghaṭapaṭaparvatādīnāṃ kāryatvavastutvādibhirdharmaiḥ sajātīyatve 'pi avāntaraṃ ghaṭapaṭaparvatatvādijātibhedamādāya
XXbsa075_u:1860: vyāptigrāhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pravartataṃ iti darśayituṃ saṃvyavahārapragalbhapuruṣabuddhyapekṣayā yaddarśanādakriyādarśino 'pi
XXbsa075_u:1863: tathā hi śāstrasaṃskārarahitasya vyavahārapragalbhasya puruṣasya devakulajātīyakaṃ puruṣapūrvakatayāvadhāritavato nagarādvanaṃ praviṣṭasya parvatadevakulayordarśane tayordvayorapyakriyādarśino 'pi devakule kṛtabuddhirbhavati na parvate /
XXbsa075_u:1864: tadanayordevakulaparvatayoḥ kāryatvādinā ekajātitve 'pi kṛtabuddhibhāvābhāvau na tayoḥ
XXbsa075_u:1866: / jātibhede ca siddhe devakulajātīye vyāptergrahaṇāt na parvatajātīyasya,
XXbsa075_u:1867: na ca prāsādajātīyasya vyāptisiddhiriti na tato buddhimadanumānam /
XXbsa075_u:1868: yadā tu prāsādasyāpi pṛthag vyāptigrahaḥ tadā tajjātīyādapi buddhimadanumānamastu /
XXbsa075_u:1869: na kṣitidharādijātīyasya svapne 'pi vyāptigrahaḥ krīḍāparvatādernāmamātrābhede 'pi parvatādibhirekāntato bhinnasvarūpatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:1872: yaccātroktaṃ sādhyabuddhirapi yadi gṛhītavyāptikasya sā bhavatyeva /
XXbsa075_u:1875: gṛhītavyāptikasyānumānaṃ bhavati, agṛhītavyāptikasya na bhavatītyatrāsmākaṃ na kācidvipratipattiḥ
XXbsa075_u:1876: kevalaṃ gṛhītavyāptikosmin viṣaye na saṃbhavatīti brūmaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1880: yadapyatra nipuṇammanyena vācaspatinā kathitaṃ tat kiṃ kāryajātīyaṃ prāsādādi buddhimaddhetukaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ yenotpattimattanubhuvanādi tathā na syāt, na khalu tajjātīyakatve kaścidviśeṣa iti /
XXbsa075_u:1882: tathā hi bhavatu prāsādaparvatādīnāṃ kāryatvādinā sajātīyatvam /
XXbsa075_u:1883: tattu na vyāvahārikapratyakṣeṇa buddhimadvyāptaṃ pratyetuṃ śakyam,
XXbsa075_u:1888: avāntaraṃ tu ghaṭaprāsādādisādhāraṇaṃ kāryatvamātramasmābhirapi na svīkṛtameva /
XXbsa075_u:1891: nanu vādinā sādhane samupanyaste taddūṣaṇopanyāsamapāsya sādhyasvarūpavikalpanaṃ nāma naiyāyikamate niranuyojyānuyogaḥ, saugatamate tvadoṣodbhāvanaṃ nigrahasthānamiti cet /
XXbsa075_u:1893: tathā hi sādhyasvarūpe 'pariniṣṭhite tadanusāriṇī pakṣasapakṣavipakṣavyavasthā kutaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1894: tadasiddhau cāsiddhatādayo doṣāḥ pakṣadharmatādayaśca guṇā na vyavasthitā ityuktam /
XXbsa075_u:1895: nedānīṃ hetordoṣa guṇakatheti mūkena prativādinā sthātavyam /
XXbsa075_u:1896: tasmāddhetudoṣopanyāsāyaiveyaṃ sādhyaniruktirityayameva vādī svamate niranuyojyānuyogadūṣaṇena nigrahasthānena nigṛhyata iti kimatra nirbandhena /
XXbsa075_u:1897: yadetat kāryatvaṃ sādhanaṃ kimanena viśvasya buddhimanmātrapūrvakatvaṃ sādhyate /
XXbsa075_u:1901: nanu sāmānyena vyāptau pratītāyāmapi pakṣadharmatābalād viśeṣasiddhiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1910: yena hi vinā pakṣasthaṃ sādhanaṃ nopapadyate sa viśeṣaḥ sidhyatu /
XXbsa075_u:1922: evaṃ bhūte buddhimati sādhye kutaḥ siddhasādhanam /
XXbsa075_u:1932: evamataḥ sādhanādupādānādyabhijñakartṛmātraṃ prasādhya tasya sarvajñatvasādhanāya vācaspatireva punarapīdamāha - bhavatu tāvadupādānādyabhijñakartṛmātrasiddhiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1939: no khalu paramāṇubhedān kṣetrajñasamavāyinaśca karmāśayabhedānaparimeyānanyaḥ śakto jñātumṛte tādṛgīśvarāditi /
XXbsa075_u:1941: yāvanti dvayaṇukāni bhinnadeśakālasvabhāvāni kāryāṇi santi teṣu sarveṣveva kimeka eva buddhimān vyāpriyate /
XXbsa075_u:1943: yadvā svasvaviṣayamātropādānādivedinaḥ parasparavyāpārānabhijñā bhinnadeśakālasvabhāvāḥ pratidvayaṇukamanya eva buddhimanto vyāpriyante iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1949: pratyasiddha eva, tasmād yathā mayā nānātvasādhanāya pramāṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ
XXbsa075_u:1953: yadapyuktam - ekatve tu na pramāṇāntaramanveṣṭavyamekasya karturabhāve bahūnāṃ vyāhatamanasāmityādi
XXbsa075_u:1955: bahubhiḥ karaṇe yugapatkāryānutpattiriti kiṃ ( Nibandh 56.) bhinnadeśakālānāṃ kāryāṇāmanutpattirvivakṣitā
XXbsa075_u:1958: tatra ekasminnapi kārye bahubhiḥ karaṇe utpattivirodhi (naṃ) na paśyāmaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1969: tathā coktam ekakarturna siddhau tu sarvajñatvaṃ kimāśrayam /
XXbsa075_u:1972: tṛtīyastu pakṣo yadi bhaved tadā svasvavyāpāraviṣayamātropādānādyabhijñatve 'pi naikaḥ kaścit
XXbsa075_u:1974: na ca jñānaṃ sattāmātreṇa katipayātīndriyadarśanavat sarvārthagrahaṇaṃ yena tadabhedāt prastutaparamāṇūvat sarvasyaivāviśeṣeṇa grahaṇāt sarvajñatā syāt /
XXbsa075_u:1977: na tu jñānasattāmātreṇa prakārāntareṇeti niścaya iti kutaḥ sarvajñatā /
XXbsa075_u:1978: nanvatīndriyaṃ paramāṇvādikaṃ jānato na kathaṃ sārvajñyamiti cet /
XXbsa075_u:1981: hanta yadi nāma nyāyavihastena tvayā īdṛśo hastasamāracitaḥ sarvajñaḥ paribhāvitastathāpyanyeṣāmapāradūradeśakālavartināṃ dvayaṇukādīnāmupādānādiṣu januṣāndhaprakhyasya paramapuruṣārthāvedino vā lokaiḥ prāmāṇikaiśca nāsya sārvajñyamanumanyate //
XXbsa075_u:1983: evaṃ ca karturekatvāsiddhau vyatirekyapi heturasamarthaḥ viśveṣāmekasya karturasiddhau tadupādānādyabhijñabhāvasyā siddhatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:1984: yaśca yanmātrakāraḥ sa tanmātropādānādyabhijño bhavanna sarvajñaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:1992: saugatasya tāvadaniṣṭasiddhiriti cet, na, svābhimatasādhyasādhanenaiva hi parasyāniṣṭamapi sādhanīyam /
XXbsa075_u:2009: asmin vānyadapohyata iti vyutpattyā vijātivyāvṛttaṃ bāhyameva vivakṣitam /
XXbsa075_u:2011: yadi vā apohanamapoha ityanyavyāvṛttimātram iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2016: tathā hi parvatoddeśe vahnirastīti śābdī pratītirvidhirūpamevollikhantī lakṣyate /
XXbsa075_u:2018: yacca pratyakṣabādhitaṃ na tatra sādhanāntarāvakāśaḥ ityatiprasiddham //
XXbsa075_u:2019: atha yadyapi nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemīti na vikalpaḥ tathāpi nivṛttapadārthollekha eva nivṛttyullekhaḥ
XXbsa075_u:2021: tato yathā sāmānyamahaṃ pratyemīti vikalpābhāve 'pi sādhāraṇākāraparisphuraṇād vikalpabuddhiḥ sāmānyabuddhiḥ pareṣām, tathā nivṛttapratyayākṣiptā nivṛtibuddhirapohapratītivyavahāramātanotīti cet /
XXbsa075_u:2024: tato nivṛttimahaṃ pratyemītyevamākārābhāve 'pi nivṛttyākārasphuraṇaṃ yadi syāt
XXbsa075_u:2026: anyathā asati pratibhāse tatpratītivyavahṛtiriti gavākāre 'pi cetasi turagabodha ityastu /
XXbsa075_u:2028: tathāpi yadyagavāpoḍha itīdṛśākāro vikalpastadā viśeṣaṇatayā tadanupraveśo bhavatu kiṃ tu gauriti pratītiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2029: tadā ca sato 'pi nivṛttilakṣaṇasya viśeṣaṇasya tatrānutkalanāt kathaṃ tatpratītivyavasthā
XXbsa075_u:2030: athaivaṃ matiḥ - yad vidhirūpaṃ sphurati tasya parāpoho 'pyastīti
XXbsa075_u:2036: tasmādvidhyākārāvagrahādadhyakṣavad vikalpasyāpi vidhiviṣayatvameva nānyāpohaviṣayatvamiti kathamapohaḥ śabdārtho ghuṣyate /
XXbsa075_u:2042: yattu goḥ pratītau na tadātmāparātmeti sāmarthyādapohaḥ paścānniścīyata iti vidhivādināṃ matam, anyāpohapratītau vā sāmarthyādanyāpoḍho
XXbsa075_u:2046: na hi vidhiṃ pratipadya kaścidarthāpattitaḥ paścādapohamavagacchati /
XXbsa075_u:2051: yathā nīlotpale niveśitādindīvaraśabdānnīlotpalapratītau tatkāla eva nīlimasphuraṇamanivāryaṃ tathā gośabdādapyagavāpoḍhe niveśitād gopratītau tulyakālameva viśeṣaṇatvādago 'pohasphuraṇamanivāryam yathā pratyakṣasya prasajyarūpābhāvāgrahaṇamabhāvavikalpotpādanaśaktireva tathā vidhivikalpānāmapi tadanurūpānuṣṭhānadānaśaktirevābhāvagrahaṇamabhidhīyate /
XXbsa075_u:2053: anyathā yadi śabdādarthapratipattikāle kalito na parāpohaḥ kathamanyaparihāreṇa pravṛttiḥ
XXbsa075_u:2056: yadapyavocad vācaspatiḥ jātimatyo vyaktayo vikalpānāṃ śabdānāṃ ca gocaraḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2057: tāsāṃ ca tadvatīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyaparāvṛttamityatastadavagaterna gāṃ badhāneti codito 'śvādīn badhnāti /
XXbsa075_u:2059: yato jāteradhikāyāḥ prakṣepe 'pi vyaktīnāṃ rūpamatajjātīyaparāvṛttameva cet,
XXbsa075_u:2061: atha na vijātīyavyāvṝttaṃ vyaktirūpaṃ tathāpratītaṃ vā tadā jātiprasāda eṣa iti kathamarthato 'pi tadavagatirityuktaprāyam /
XXbsa075_u:2074: tasmādekapiṇḍadarśanapūrvako yaḥ sarvavyaktisādhāraṇa iva bahiraghyasto vikalpabuddhyākāraḥ tatrāyaṃ gauriti saṃketakaraṇe netaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2081: eṣa panthāḥ śrughnamupatiṣṭhata ityatrāpyapoho gamyata eva /
XXbsa075_u:2084: sārthadūtādivyavacchedena panthā eveti pratipadaṃ vyavacchedasya sulabhatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:2085: tasmādapohadharmaṇo vidhirūpasya śabdādavagatiḥ puṇḍarīkaśabdādiva śvetimaviśiṣṭasya padmasya
XXbsa075_u:2086: yadyevaṃ vidhireva śabdārtho vaktumucitaḥ, kathamapoho gīyata iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:2091: vidhiśabdena ca yathādhyavasāyamatadrūpaparāvṛtto bāhyo 'rthobhimataḥ, yathāpratibhāsaṃ buddhyākāraśca
XXbsa075_u:2101: na hi spaṣṭāspaṣṭe dve rūpe parasparaviruddhe ekasya vastunaḥ staḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2113: etena yadāha vācaspatiḥ - na ca śābdapratyakṣayorvastugocaratve
XXbsa075_u:2119: kiṃ ca svalakṣaṇātmani vastuni vācye sarvātmanā pratipatteḥ vidhiniṣedhayorayogaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2125: tasmāt śābdapratibhāsasya bāhyārthabhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ na tadviṣayatāṃ kṣamate //
XXbsa075_u:2126: yacca vācaspatinā jātimadvyaktivācyatāṃ svavācaiva prastutyāntarameva na ca śabdārthasya jāterbhāvābhāvasādhāraṇyaṃ nopapadyate /
XXbsa075_u:2133: jātau bharaṃ nyasyatā svalakṣaṇavācyatvasya svayaṃ svīkārāt /
XXbsa075_u:2137: vyakteścet pratītisiddhiḥ jātiradhikā pratīyatāṃ mā vā, na tu vyaktipratītidoṣānmuktiḥ
XXbsa075_u:2138: etena yaducyate kaumārilaiḥ sabhāgatvādeva vastuno na sādhāraṇyadoṣaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2144: yaccedam - na ca pratyakṣasyeva śabdānāmarthapratyāyanaprakāro yena taddṛṣṭa ivāstyādiśabdāpekṣā na syāt, vicitraśaktitvāt pramāṇānāmiti /
XXbsa075_u:2147: tato yadi pratyakṣārthapratipādanaṃ śābdena tadvadevāvabhāsaḥ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:2149: nanu vṛkṣaśabdena vṛkṣatvāṃśe codite sattvādyaṃśaniścayanārthamastyādipadaprayoga iti cet
XXbsa075_u:2155: vikalpastu svayaṃ niścayātmako yatra grāhī tatra kimapareṇa /
XXbsa075_u:2158: nanu bhinnā jātyādayo dharmāḥ parasparaṃ dharmiṇaśceti jātilakṣaṇaikadharmadvāreṇa pratīte 'pi śākhini dharmāntaravattayā na
XXbsa075_u:2159: pratītiriti kiṃ na bhinnābhidhānādhīno dharmāntarasya nīlacaloccaistaratvāderavabodhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2167: evaṃ ca yathendriyapratyāsattyā pratyakṣeṇa dharmipratipattau sakalataddharmapratipattistathā śabdaliṅgābhyāmapi vācyavācakādisaṃbandhapratibaddhābhyāṃ dharmipratipattau niravaśeṣataddharmapratipattirbhavet pratyāsatimātrasyāviśeṣāt //
XXbsa075_u:2168: yacca vācaspati, na caikopādhinā sattvena viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte
XXbsa075_u:2171: na tūpādhayo vā viśeṣyatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāva iti /
XXbsa075_u:2175: na cāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva iva svabhāvata eva dharmadharmiṇoḥ pratipattiniyamakalpanamucitam
XXbsa075_u:2182: upakāralakṣaṇaiva ca pratyāsattistadopakārakagrahaṇe samānadeśasyaiva dharmarūpasyaiva copakāryasya grahaṇamāsañjitam /
XXbsa075_u:2183: tatkathaṃ sūryopakāryasya bhinnadeśasya dravyāntarasya vā dṛṣṭavyabhicārasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2184: tasmādekadharmadvāreṇāpi vastusvarūpapratipattau sarvātmapratīteḥ kva śabdāntareṇa vidhiniṣedhāvakāśaḥ
XXbsa075_u:2192: tadeva ca sāsnāśṛṅgādimātramakhilavyaktāvatyantavilakṣaṇamapi svalakṣaṇenaikīkriyamāṇaṃ sāmānyamityucyate tādṛśasya bāhyasyāprāpterbhrāntirevāsau keśapratibhāsavat /
XXbsa075_u:2195: vyaktaya eva vā svajātīyabhedatiraskāreṇānyathā bhāsantāmanubhavavyavadhānāt smṛtipramoṣo vābhidhīyatām /
XXbsa075_u:2200: tadevaṃ na śābde pratyaye jātiḥ pratibhāti /
XXbsa075_u:2204: nāpondriyavadasyāḥ siddhiḥ jñānakāryataḥ kādācitkasyaiva nimittāntarasya siddheḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2205: yadā piṇḍāntare antarāle vā gobuddherabhāvaṃ darśayet tadā śāvaleyādisakalagopiṇḍānāmevābhāvādabhāvo gobuddherupapadyamānaḥ kathamarthāntaramākṣipet /
XXbsa075_u:2208: yadyevaṃ gopiṇḍādeva gotvamanyathā turagatvamapi gotvaṃ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:2210: gopiṇḍo gotvaṃ tu bhavatu mā vā /
XXbsa075_u:2211: nanu sāmānyapratyayajananasāmarthyaṃ yadyekasmāt piṇḍādabhinnaṃ tadā vijātīyavyāvṝttaṃ piṇḍāntaramasamartham
XXbsa075_u:2212: atha bhinnam, tadā tadeva sāmānyam, nāmni paraṃ vivāda iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:2214: yathā tvekaḥ śaktasvabhāvo bhāvastathānyo 'pi bhavan kīdṛśaṃ doṣamāvahati /
XXbsa075_u:2217: tathāsmākaṃ vyaktirapi jātinirapekṣā svarūpeṇaiva bhinnā hetuḥ //
XXbsa075_u:2218: yattu trilocanaḥ - aśvatvagotvādīnāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ svāśraye samavāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ sāmānyamityabhidhānapratyayayornimittamiti
XXbsa075_u:2222: na ca kvacit tadviṣaye tvapekṣā svakalpanāmātramato 'bhyupāyaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:2223: etena seyaṃ pratyayānuvṛttiranuvṛttavastvanuyāyinī kathamatyantabhedinīṣu vyaktiṣu vyāvṛttaviṣayapratyayabhāvānupātinīṣu bhavitumarhatītyūhāpravartanamasya pratyākhyātam /
XXbsa075_u:2225: yat punaranena viparyaye bādhakamuktam, abhidhānapratyayānuvṛttiḥ kutaścinnivṛttya kvacideva bhavantī nimittavatī, na cānyannimittamityādi /
XXbsa075_u:2229: tulye bhede yayā jātiḥ pratyāsattyā prasarpati /
XXbsa075_u:2231: yat punaratra nyāyabhūṣaṇoktaṃ na hyevaṃ bhavati, yayā pratyāsattyā daṇḍasūtrādikaṃ prasarpati kvacinnānyatra saiva pratyāsattiḥ puruṣasphaṭikādiṣu daṇḍisūtritvādivyavahāranibandhanamastu, kiṃ daṇḍasūtrādineti /
XXbsa075_u:2233: daṇḍasūtrayorhi puruṣasphaṭikapratyāsannayoḥ dṛṣṭayo daṇḍisūtritva pratyayahetutvaṃ nāpalapyate
XXbsa075_u:2235: tad yadīdaṃ parikalpanīyaṃ tadā varaṃ pratyāsattireva sāmānyapratyayahetuḥ parikalpyatām, kiṃ gurvyā parikalpanayetyabhiprāyāparijñānāt /
XXbsa075_u:2247: yathā svarūpavān ghaṭaḥ, gotvaṃ sāmānyamiti vā /
XXbsa075_u:2249: svarūpavān ghaṭa ityādivat gotvajātimān piṇḍa iti parikalpitaṃ bhedamupādāya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvasyeṣṭatvādagovyāvṛttānubhavabhāvitvād gaurayamiti vyavahārasya /
XXbsa075_u:2251: bādhakaṃ ca sāmānyaguṇakarmādyupādhicakrasya kevalavyaktigrāhakaṃ paṭupratyakṣaṃ dṛśyānupalambho vā prasiddhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2254: tatra na buddhyākārasya tattvataḥ saṃvṛtyā vā vidhiniṣedhau,
XXbsa075_u:2257: nāpi tattvato bāhyasyāpi vidhiniṣedhau, tasya śābde pratyayepratibhāsanāt /
XXbsa075_u:2261: tadevaṃ nākārasya na bāhyasya tattvato vidhisādhanam /
XXbsa075_u:2262: bahireva hi saṃvṛtyā saṃvṛtyāpi tu nākṛteḥ //
XXbsa075_u:2263: etena yad dharmottaraḥ āropitasya bāhyatvasya vidhiniṣedhāvityalaukikamanāgamamatārkikīyaṃ kathayati, tadapyapahastitam
XXbsa075_u:2264: nanvavyavasāye yadyadhyavaseyaṃ vastu na sphurati tadā tadadhyavasitamiti ko 'rthaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2266: apratibhāsāviśeṣe viṣayāntaraparihāreṇa kathaṃ niyataviṣayā pravṛttiriti cet /
XXbsa075_u:2268: yadyapi viśvamagṛhītaṃ tathāpi vikalpasya niyatasāmagrīprasūtatvena niyatākāratayā, niyataśaktitvāt niyataiva jalādau pravṛttiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2271: niyataviṣayā hi bhāvāḥ pramāṇapariniṣṭhitasvabhāvā na śaktisāṃkaryaparyanuyogabhājaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2274: brūmaḥ, yenākāre bāhyasya bāhye vā ākārasyāropadvāreṇa dūṣaṇābakāśaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2275: kiṃ tarhi svavāsanāvipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva buddhirapaśyantyapi bāhyaṃ bāhye pravṛttimātanotīti viplutaiva /
XXbsa075_u:2277: sa eva cāpohaśabdavācyaḥ śabdānāmarthaḥ pravṛttinivṛttiviṣayaśceti sthitam /
XXbsa075_u:2289: tathā hi śabdānāmadhyavasitavijātivyāvṛttavastumātraviṣayatvamanicchadbhiḥ paraiḥ paramārthato vācyaṃ svalakṣaṇamupādhirupādhiyogaḥ sopādhirastu yadi vā kṛtirastu buddhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2294: tadevaṃ vācyāntarasyābhāvāt viṣayavattvalakṣaṇasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau vipakṣato nivarttamānaṃ vācakatvamadhyavasitabāhyaviṣayatvena vyāpyata iti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2305: hetoḥ parokṣārthapratipādakatvaṃ hetvābhāsatvaśaṅkānirākaraṇamantareṇa na śakyate pratipādayitum
XXbsa075_u:2308: yadi nāma darśane darśane nānāprakāraṃ sattvalakṣaṇamuktamāste, arthakriyākārittvaṃ, sattāsamavāyaḥ,
XXbsa075_u:2311: yadeva hi pramāṇato nirūpyamāṇaṃ kadārthānāṃ sattvamupapannaṃ bhaviṣyati tadeva vayamapi svīkariṣyāmaḥ
XXbsa075_u:2312: kevalaṃ tadetadarthakriyākāritvaṃ sarvajanaprasiddhamāste tat khalvatra sattvaśabdenābhisandhāya sādhanatvenopāttam /
XXbsa075_u:2313: tacca yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣānumānapramāṇaprasiddhasadbhāveṣu bhāveṣu pakṣikṛteṣu pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena pratītamiti na svarūpeṇāśrayadvāreṇa bāsiddhisaṃbhāvanāpi //
XXbsa075_u:2322: saṃbhave vā tenaiva pakṣe 'pi kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddheralaṃ sattvānumāneneti cet /
XXbsa075_u:2325: tathā hi ghaṭo vartamānakṣaṇe tāvadekāmarthakriyāṃ ( Nibandh 68.) karoti /
XXbsa075_u:2326: atītānāgatakṣaṇayorapi ki tāmevārthakriyāṃ kuryāt, anyāṃ vā, na vā kāmapi kriyāmiti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ //
XXbsa075_u:2327: nātra prathamaḥ pakṣo yuktaḥ, kṛtasya karaṇāyogāt /
XXbsa075_u:2329: yadā ghaṭo vartamānakṣaṇabhāvi kāryaṃ karoti tadā kimatītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvinyapi kārye śakto 'śakto vā /
XXbsa075_u:2337: tadaikatra kārye śaktāśaktatvaviruddhadharmādhyāsāt kṣaṇavidhvaṃso ghaṭasya durvāraprasaraḥ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:2339: yadā hi śaktasya padārthasya vilambo 'pyasahyastadā dūrotsāritamakaraṇam /
XXbsa075_u:2341: tasmād yad yadā yajjananavyavahārapātraṃ tattadā tat kuryāt /
XXbsa075_u:2343: tadevamekatra kārye samarthetarasvabhāvatayā pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedād ghaṭasya sapakṣatvamakṣatam
XXbsa075_u:2345: yad yadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tat tadā tajjanayatyeva
XXbsa075_u:2349: asya ca dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇavyavahāragocaratvasya prasaṅgasādhanasya vārtamānikakāryakaraṇakāle sakalakriyātikramakāle ca ghaṭe dharmiṇi parābhyupagamamātrataḥ siddhatvādasiddhistāvadasaṃbhavinī nāpi viruddhatā, sapakṣe 'ntyakāraṇasāmagryāṃ sadbhāvasaṃbhavāt /
XXbsa075_u:2352: kuśūlādyavasthitavījādau vipakṣe samarthavyavahāragocaratvasya sādhanasya darśanāditi cet
XXbsa075_u:2355: tatra yatpāramārthikaṃ jananaprayuktaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ tadiha sādhanatvenopāttam
XXbsa075_u:2356: tasya ca kuśūlādyavasthitabījādau kāraṇakāraṇatvādaupacārikajananavyavahāraviṣayabhūte saṃbhavābhāvāt kutaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikatā /
XXbsa075_u:2359: tathā hīdaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ niyataviṣayatvena vyāptamiti sarvajanānubhavaprasiddham
XXbsa075_u:2363: yadi ca jananamantareṇāpi jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ syāt tadā sarvasya sarvatra jananavyavahāra ityaniyamaḥ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:2365: tato jananābhāve vipakṣe niyataviṣayatvasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau nivartamānaṃ jananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ janana eva viśrāmyatīti vyāptisiddheranavadyo hetuḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2366: na caiṣa ghaṭo varttamānakāryakaraṇakṣaṇe sakalakriyātikramaṇe cātītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvi kārya janayati /
XXbsa075_u:2370: yad yadā yanna karoti na tattadā tatra samarthavyavahārayogyam /
XXbsa075_u:2372: na karoti caiṣā ghaṭo vartamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇakāle sakalakriyātikramakāle cātītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvi kāryamitivyāpakānupalabdhirbhinatti samarthakṣaṇādasamarthakṣaṇam //
XXbsa075_u:2375: na cānaikāntikatā, pūrvoktena nyāyena samarthavyavahāragocaratvajanakatvayorvidhibhūtayoḥ sarvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt //
XXbsa075_u:2376: yat punaratroktam, yad yadā yanna karoti na tattadā tatra samarthamityatra kaḥ karotyarthaḥ
XXbsa075_u:2383: na cātra pakṣe kāraṇatvasāmarthyayoḥ paryāyatvena vyāpakānupalambhasya
XXbsa075_u:2386: tadevaṃ prasaṅgaprasaṅgaviparyayahetudvayabalato ghaṭe dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ siddhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2387: tat kathaṃ sattvādanyadanumānaṃ dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgasādhakaṃ nāstītyucyate /
XXbsa075_u:2393: yo hi pratipattā prativastu yad yadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tattadā tajjanayati ityādikamupanyasitumanalasastasya tata eva kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2394: yastu prativastu tannyāyopanyāsaprayāsabhīruḥ sa khalvekatra dharmiṇi yad yadā yajjananavyavahārayogyaṃ tattadā tajjanayati ityādinyāyena sattvamātramasthairyavyāptamavadhārya sattvādevānyatra kṣaṇikatvamavagacchatīti, kathamapramato vaiyarthyamasyācakṣīta /
XXbsa075_u:2395: tadevamekakāryakāriṇo ghaṭasya dvitīyādikṣaṇa bhāvikāryāpekṣayā samarthetarasvabhāvaviruddhadharmādhyāsād bheda eveti kṣaṇabhaṅgitayā sapakṣatāmāvahati ghaṭe sattvaheturupalabhyamāno na viruddhaḥ na cāyamanaikāntikaḥ, atraiva sādharmyavati dṛṣṭānte sarvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt
XXbsa075_u:2400: tathā hi uktametad vartamānakṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇakāle 'tītānāgatakṣaṇabhāvikārye 'pi ghaṭasya śaktisaṃbhave tadānīmeva tatkaraṇam /
XXbsa075_u:2401: akaraṇe ca śaktāśaktasvabhāvatayā pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda iti kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaiva sā arthakriyāśaktiḥ
XXbsa075_u:2403: vipakṣāt punarekāntena vyāvṛttiriti kuto labhyata iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:2408: anvayarūpā ca kartṛdharmaḥ sādhanadharmavati dharmiṇi sādhyadharmasyāvaśyambhāvo yaḥ,
