XXbsa075_u:2412: tasmād yathā viparyaye bādhakapramāṇabalāt niyamavati vyatireke siddhe 'nvayaviṣayaḥ saṃśayaḥ pūrvaṃ sthito 'pi paścāt parigalati tato 'nvayaprasādhanārthaṃ na pṛthak sādhanamucyate tathā prasaṅgatadviparyayahetudvayabalato niyamavatyanvaye siddhe vyatirekaviṣaye pūrvaṃ sthito 'pi sandehaḥ paścāt parigalatyeva /
XXbsa075_u:2415: sādhane sati sādhyasyāvaśyamanvayo veti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2419: na hi kāraṇabuddhyā kārya gṛhyate, tasya bhāvitvāt /
XXbsa075_u:2422: na ca pūrvāparayoḥ kālayorekaḥ pratisandhātā asti, kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅgaprasaṅgāt /
XXbsa075_u:2425: vāsanā, tayā ca hetūphalāvasāyo vikalpa iti cet tadayuktam /
XXbsa075_u:2434: tathā hi bījādīnāṃ sāmarthyaṃ bījādijñānāt tatkāryādaṅkurādervā niścetavyam /
XXbsa075_u:2439: athānavasthābhayāt paryante kāryāntaraṃ nāpekṣate, tadā tenaiva pūrveṣāmasattvaprasaṅgānnaikasyāpyarthasāmarthya sidhyati /
XXbsa075_u:2440: nanu kāryatvasattvayorbhinnavyāvṛttikatvāt sattāsiddhāvapi kāryatvasiddhau kā kṣatiriti cet
XXbsa075_u:2451: tadasiddhau pūrvasya sāmarthyaṃ na sidhyatīti sandigdhāsiddho hetuḥ //
XXbsa075_u:2453: tathā hi kṣaṇikatve sati na tāvadajātasyānanvayaniruddhasya vā kāryārambhakatvaṃ saṃbhavati
XXbsa075_u:2454: na ca niṣpannasya tāvān kṣaṇo 'sti yamupādāya kasmaicit kāryāya vyāpāryeti /
XXbsa075_u:2456: atha vā vikalpena yadupanīyate tat sarvamavastu /
XXbsa075_u:2459: yadvā sarvasyaiva hetoḥ kṣaṇikatve sādhye viruddhatvaṃ deśakālāntarānanugame sādhyasādhanabhāvābhāvāt
XXbsa075_u:2460: anugame ca nānākālamekamakṣaṇikaṃ kṣaṇikatvena virudhyata iti //
XXbsa075_u:2464: yattāvaduktaṃ sāmarthyaṃ na pratīyata iti, tat kiṃ sarvathaiva
XXbsa075_u:2466: prathamapakṣe sakalakārakajñāpakahetucakrocchedānmukhaspandanamātrasyāpyakaraṇaprasaṅgaḥ anyathā yenaiva vacanena sāmarthyaṃ nāstīti pratipādyate tasyaiva tatpratipādanasāmarthyamavyāhatamāyātam
XXbsa075_u:2468: tadasvīkāre tu na kaścit kvacit pravarteteti nirīhaṃ jagajjāyeta /
XXbsa075_u:2471: sā ca kṣaṇikatve yadi nopapadyate tadā viruddhaṃ vaktumucitam /
XXbsa075_u:2474: tathā hi kāraṇagrāhijñānopādeyabhūtena kāryagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa asya bhāve asya bhāva ityanvayaniścayo janyate /
XXbsa075_u:2475: tathā kāraṇāpekṣayā bhūtalakaivalyagrāhijñānopādeyabhūtena kāryāpekṣayā bhūtalakaivalyagrāhiṇā jñānena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa asyābhāve asyābhāva iti vyatirekaniścayo janyate /
XXbsa075_u:2487: kiṃ tu yatra pramāṇapratītebījādau vastubhūte dharmiṇi pramāṇapratītaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tatra kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhanāya
XXbsa075_u:2493: nāpi kṣaṇikatve sāmarthyakṣatiḥ, yato viruddhatā syāt /
XXbsa075_u:2496: avastuno vastuno vā svākārasya grāhyatvepi adhyavaseyavastvapekṣayaiva sarvatra prāmāṇyapratipādanād vastusvabhāvasyaiva kṣaṇikatvasya siddhiriti kva virodhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2497: yacca gṛhyate yaccādhyavasīyate te dve apyanyanivṛttī na vastunī,
XXbsa075_u:2518: sakalātadrūpaparāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ sākṣādasphuraṇāt pratyakṣasya grāhyo viṣayo mā bhūt, tadekadeśagrahaṇe tu tanmātrayorvyāptiniścāyakavikalpajananādadhyavaseyo viṣayo bhavatyeva /
XXbsa075_u:2522: tathā hi vyāptigrahaḥ sāmānyayoḥ, viśeṣayoḥ, sāmānyaviśiṣṭasvalakṣaṇayoḥ svalakṣaṇa viśiṣṭasāmānyayorveti vikalpāḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2530: antime tu vikalpadvaye sāmānyādhāratayā dṛṣṭa eva viśeṣaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣyo viśeṣaṇaṃ vā karttavyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2535: na ca tṛtīyaḥ, prastutaikaviśeṣadarśane 'pi deśakālāntaravartināṃ viśeṣāṇāmadarśanāt /
XXbsa075_u:2536: atha teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva viśeṣāṇāṃ sadṛśatvāt, sadṛśasāmagrīprasūtatvāt,
XXbsa075_u:2537: sadṛśakāryakāritvāditi pratyāsattyā ekaviśeṣagrāhakaṃ pratyakṣamatadrūpaparāvṛttamātre niścayaṃ janayadatadrūpaparāvṛttaviśeṣamātrasya vyavasthāpakam /
XXbsa075_u:2538: yathaikasāmagrīpratibaddharūpamātragrāhakaṃ pratyakṣaṃṃ ghaṭe niścayaṃ janayad ghaṭagrāhakaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
XXbsa075_u:2542: yadyevamanenaiva krameṇa sarvasya viśeṣasya viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvavat vyāptipratipattirapyastu
XXbsa075_u:2543: tat kimarthaṃ nānākālamekamakṣaṇikamabhyupagantavyaṃ yena kṣaṇikatva sādhanasya viruddhatvaṃ syāditi na kaścidvirodha prabhedaprasaṅgaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:2544: na cāyamanaikāntiko 'pi hetuḥ, pūrvoktakrameṇa sādharmyadṛṣṭānte prasaṅgaviparyayahetubhyāmanvayarūpavyāpteḥ prasādhanāt /
XXbsa075_u:2545: nanu yadi prasaṅgaviparyayahetudvayabalato ghaṭedṛṣṭānte kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ sidhyet tadā sattvasya niyamena kṣaṇikatvena vyāptisiddheranaikāntikatvaṃ nasyāditi yuktam /
XXbsa075_u:2547: tathā hi śakto 'pi ghaṭaḥ kramikasahakāryapekṣayā kramikāryaṃ kariṣyati /
XXbsa075_u:2550: svarūpaṃ ca sarvadāstītyanupakāriṇī sahakāriṇyapekṣā na yujyata iti /
XXbsa075_u:2551: satyapi svarūpeṇa kārakatve sāmarthyābhāvāt kathaṃ karotu /
XXbsa075_u:2554: na ca tayorāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyāṃ tadvataḥ kācit kṣatiḥ, tasya tābhyāmanyatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:2555: tasmādarthaḥ samartho 'pi syāt, na ca karotīti sandigdhavyatirekaḥ prasaṅgahetuḥ //
XXbsa075_u:2561: 'kṣepakriyādharmā svabhāvastādṛśa eva cet prathamakṣaṇe tadā tadāpi
XXbsa075_u:2564: svabhāvaḥ sākalye sati jāto bhāvād bhinna evābhidhātuṃ ( Nibandh 75.)
XXbsa075_u:2567: tasmād yadrūpamādāya svarūpeṇāpi janayatītyucyate tasya prāgapi bhāve kathamajaniḥ kadācit
XXbsa075_u:2568: akṣepakriyāpratyanīkasvabhāvasya vā prācyasya paścādanuvṛttau kathaṃ kadācidapi kāryasaṃbhavaḥ
XXbsa075_u:2569: nanu yadi sa evaikaḥ kartā syād yuktametat /
XXbsa075_u:2571: tataḥ sahakāryantaravirahavelāyāṃ balīyaso 'pi na kāryaprasava iti kimatra viruddham /
XXbsa075_u:2572: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti,
XXbsa075_u:2577: yadā militāḥ santaḥ kāryaṃ kurvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ
XXbsa075_u:2579: militaireva tu tat kāryaṃ karttavyamiti kuto labhyate /
XXbsa075_u:2581: tasmāt sāmagrī janikā, naikaṃ janakamiti sthiravādināṃ manorathasyāpyaviṣayaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2584: kiṃ tu pūrvasthitādeva sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭād bhāvāt kāryotpattiranyasmādeva vā viśiṣṭād bhāvādutpannāditi vivādapadam /
XXbsa075_u:2585: tatra prāgapi saṃbhave sarvadaiva kāryotpattirna vā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya cakṣuṣī nimīlya tata eva kāryotpattidarśanāditi sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhatīti /
XXbsa075_u:2591: vyāptau tu sākṣāt paramparayā kāraṇamātrāpekṣayā kāraṇe vyāpake
XXbsa075_u:2598: nanu yadi pūrvāparakālayorekasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ sarvadā janakatvenājanakatvena vā vyāpta upalabdhaḥ syāt, tadāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ saṃgacchate /
XXbsa075_u:2603: parakālabhāvī janako yaḥ svabhāvo bhāvasya sa eva yadi pūrvakālabhāvī, pūrvakālabhāvī vā yo
XXbsa075_u:2604: 'janakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa eva yadi parakālabhāvī tadopalabdhameva
XXbsa075_u:2606: tathā ca sati siddhayoreva svabhāvayorekatvārope siddhameva jananamajananaṃ vāsajyata iti
XXbsa075_u:2607: nanu kāryameva sahakāriṇamamekṣate, na tu kāryotpattihetuḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2608: yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijamāgantukaṃ na sahakāryantaram, tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi
XXbsa075_u:2609: kramavat sahakārinānātvādapi kramavat kāryanānātvopapatteraśakyaṃ bhāvānāṃ pratikṣaṇamanyānyatvamupapādayitumiti cet /
XXbsa075_u:2612: tathāpi yat prātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇamarthakriyādharmakamavaśya mabhyupagantavyam, tat kiṃ prāgapi paścādeva veti vikalpya yaddūṣaṇamudīritaṃ tatra kimuktamaneneti na pratīmaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2613: yattu kāryeṇaiva sahakāriṇo 'pekṣyanta ityupaskṛtaṃ tadapi nirupayogam /
XXbsa075_u:2614: yadi hi kāryameva svajanmani svatantraṃ syād yuktametat /
XXbsa075_u:2617: tathā ca sati santo hetavaḥ sarvathāsamarthāḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2619: atha kāryasyaivāyamaparādho yadidaṃ samarthe kāraṇe satyapi kadācinnopapadyata iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:2622: svatantraṃ kāryamevaṃ syānna tatkāryaṃ tathā sati //
XXbsa075_u:2627: yadi hi svayaṃ bhavan bhāvayedeva hetuḥ svakāryam, tadā tadabhāvaprayukto 'syābhāva iti pratītiḥ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:2628: no ced yathā kāraṇe satyapi kārya svātantryānna bhavati, tathā tadabhāve 'pi svātantryādeva na bhūtamiti śaṅkā kena nivāryeta /
XXbsa075_u:2629: yad bhāṣyam tadbhāve 'pi na bhāvaścedabhāve 'bhāvitā kutaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2631: tasmād yathaiva tadabhāve niyamena na bhavati tathaiva tadbhāve niyamena bhavedeva /
XXbsa075_u:2634: yaccoktaṃ prathamakāryotpādanakāle hi uttarakāryotpādanasvabhāvaḥ, ataḥ prathamakāla evāśeṣāṇi kāryāṇi kuryāditi /
XXbsa075_u:2636: yo hi uttarakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ sa kathamādau kāryaṃ kuryāt /
XXbsa075_u:2640: sthirasvabhāvatve hi bhāvasyottarakālamevedaṃ kāryaṃ na pūrvakālamiti kuta etat /
XXbsa075_u:2645: sthiratve 'pyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva karotīti cet /
XXbsa075_u:2647: dhūmādatrāgnirityatrāpi svabhāva evāsya yadidānīmatra niragnirapi dhūma iti vaktuṃ śakyatvāt
XXbsa075_u:2650: tasmād yadi kāraṇasyottarakāryakārakatvamabhyupagamya kāryasya prathamakṣaṇabhāvitvamāsajyate, syāt svavacanavirodhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2651: yadā tu kāraṇasya sthiratve kāryasyottarakālatvamevāsaṅgatamataḥ kāraṇasyāpyuttarakāryajanakatvaṃ vastuto 'sambhavi tadā prasaṅgasādhanamidam /
XXbsa075_u:2653: uttarakāryajananavyavahāragocaratvaṃ ca tvadabhyupagamāt prathamakāryakaraṇakāla eva ghaṭe dharmiṇi siddham /
XXbsa075_u:2656: na hi nīlakārake 'pi pītakārakatvārope pītasaṃbhavaprasaṅgaḥ svavacanavirodho nāma /
XXbsa075_u:2661: tathā hi bījamaṅkurādikaṃkurvad yadi yenaiva svabhāvenāṅkurādikaṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikaṃ tadā kṣityādīnāmapyaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2662: nānāsvabhāvatvena tu kārakatve svabhāvānāmanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāritvādekatra bhāvābhavau parasparaviruddhau syātāmityekamapi bījaṃ bhidyeta /
XXbsa075_u:2666: teṣāṃ ca svabhāvānāmanyo 'nyābhāvāvyabhicārādviruddhānāṃ yoge pradīpādikaṃ bhidyeta /
XXbsa075_u:2670: tathā bījasyāṅkuraṃ prati kārakatvaṃ gardabhādikaṃ pratyakārakatvamiti kārakatvākārakatve api viruddho dharmau
XXbsa075_u:2672: tadevamekatra bīje pradīpe rūpe ca vipakṣe paridṛśyamānaḥ śaktāśaktatvādirviruddhadharmādhyāso na ghaṭāderbhedaka iti /
XXbsa075_u:2674: bhavatu tāvad bījādīnāmanekakāryakāritvāddharmabhūtānekasvabhāvabhedaḥ, tathāpi kaḥ prastāvo viruddhadharmādhyāsasya /
XXbsa075_u:2675: svabhāvānāṃ hyanyonyābhāvāvyabhicāre bhedaḥ prāptāvasaro na virodhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2676: virodhastu yadvidhāne yanniṣedho yanniṣedhe ca yadvidhānaṃ tayorekatra dharmiṇi parasparaparihārasthitatayā syāt /
XXbsa075_u:2677: tadatraikaḥ svabhāvaḥ svābhāvena viruddho yukto bhāvābhāvavat /
XXbsa075_u:2680: pratyakṣavyāpāraścātra yathā nānādharmairadhyāsitaṃ bhāvamabhinnaṃ vyavasthāpayati tathā tatkāryakāriṇaṃ kāryāntarākāriṇaṃ ca /
XXbsa075_u:2681: tad yadi pratiyogitvābhāvādanyonyābhāvāvyabhiocāriṇāvapi svabhāvāvaviruddhau tatkārakatvānyākārakatve vāviṣayabhedādaviruddhe tat kimāyātamekakāryaṃ prati śaktāśaktatvayoḥ parasparapratiyoginorviruddhayordharmayīḥ etayorapi punaravirodhe virodho nāma dattajalāñjaliḥ //
XXbsa075_u:2683: kevalaṃ yathā tadeva kāryaṃ prati kvaciddeśe śaktirdeśāntare cāśaktiriti deśabhedādaviruddhe śaktyaśaktī tathaikatraiva kāryakālabhedādapyaviruddhe
XXbsa075_u:2684: / yathā pūrvaṃ niṣkriyaḥ sphaṭikaḥ sa eva paścāt sakriya iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:2686: / na hi vayaṃ paribhāṣāmātrādekatra kārye deśabhedādaviruddhe śaktyaśaktī
XXbsa075_u:2696: sa ca sākṣātparasparapratyanīkatayā bhāvābhāvavad vā bhavet, ekasya vā niyamena
XXbsa075_u:2697: pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanānnityatvasattvavad vā bhavediti na kaścidarthabhedaḥ
XXbsa075_u:2698: / tadatraikadharmiṇi tatkālatat kāryakāritvādhāre kālāntare tatkāryākāritvasyānyakāryakāritvasya vā niyamena pramāṇāntareṇa bādhanādvirodhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2699: tathā hio yatraiva dharmiṇi tatkālakāryakāritvamupalabdhaṃ na tatraiva kālāntare ( Nibandh
XXbsa075_u:2706: na caivaṃ samānakālakāryāṇāṃ deśabhede 'pi dharmibhedo yukto bhedaprasādhakapramāṇābhāvāt
XXbsa075_u:2711: vipratipannaṃ prati tu viruddhadharmādhyāsād bhedavyavahāraḥ sādhyate //
XXbsa075_u:2713: yathā hīdaṃ kramākramanivṛttāvakṣaṇikānnivṛttaṃ tathā sāpekṣatvānapekṣatvayorekatvānekatvayorapi vyāpakayornivṛttau kṣaṇikādapi
XXbsa075_u:2714: / tathā hi upasarpaṇapratyayena devadattakarapallavādinā sahacaro bījakṣaṇaḥ pūrvasmādeva puñjāt samartho jāto 'napekṣa ādyātiśayasya janaka iṣyate /
XXbsa075_u:2715: tatra ca samānakuśūlajanmasu bahuṣu bījasantāneṣu kasmāt kiñcideva bījaṃ paramparayāṅkurotpādānuguṇamupajanayati vījakṣaṇaṃ nānye bījakṣaṇā bhinnasantānāntaḥ pātinaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2716: na hi upasarpaṇapratyayāt prāgeva teṣāṃ samānāsamānasantānavartināṃ bījakṣaṇānāṃ kaścit paramparātiśayaḥ
XXbsa075_u:2720: hanta tarhi tadabhāve satyutpanno 'pi na janayedeva /
XXbsa075_u:2721: tathā ca kevalānāṃ vyabhicārasaṃbhavādādyātiśayotpādakamaṅkuraṃ vā pratikṣityādīnāṃ parasparāpekṣāṇāmevotpādakatvamakāmenāpi svīkarttavyam /
XXbsa075_u:2726: kurvan yadi yenaiva rūpeṇāṅkuraṃ karoti tenaiva kṣityādikaṃ tadā kṣityādīnāmapyaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattirabhinnakāraṇatvāditi na tāvadekatvasaṃbhavaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:2730: yadyevaṃ sahakāritvopādānatve kimekaṃ tattvaṃ nānā vā /
XXbsa075_u:2731: ( Nibandh 80.) ekaṃ cet kathaṃ rūpāntareṇa janakam /
XXbsa075_u:2734: abhede vā kathaṃ bījasya na nānātvaṃ
XXbsa075_u:2736: yadyucyeta kṣityādau janayitavye tadupādānaṃ pūrvameva kṣityādibījasya rūpāntaramiti /
XXbsa075_u:2737: na tarhi bījaṃ tadanapekṣaṃ kṣityādīnāṃ janakam /
XXbsa075_u:2746: kariṣyate ca kramavatsahakārivaśaḥ krameṇa kāryāṇīti vyāpakānupalabdherasiddheḥ sandigdhavyatirekamanaikāntikaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatva siddhāviti /
XXbsa075_u:2750: atha pūrvāvasthitasyaiva bījādeḥ sahakāriṇā saha saṃbhūyakaraṇam /
XXbsa075_u:2757: tatastādṛksvabhāvasaṃbhave 'yakaraṇaṃ sahakāriṇi nirapekṣatāṃ na kṣamata iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:2760: sa cādyātiśayajanakatvalakṣaṇaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣo na samānāsamānasantānavartiṣu bījakṣaṇeṣu sarveṣveva saṃbhavī /
XXbsa075_u:2762: nanvekatra kṣetre niṣpattilavanādipūrvakamānīyaikatra kuśūle kṣiptāni sarvāṇyeva bījāni sādhāraṇarūpāṇyeva pratīyante /
XXbsa075_u:2765: kāraṇaṃ khalu sarvatra kārye dvividham - dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ ( Nibandh 81.) ceti sarvāstikaprasiddhametat
XXbsa075_u:2767: tato bhavedapi kāraṇasāmagrīśaktibhedāttādṛśaḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ keṣāñcideva bījakṣaṇānāṃ yena ta eva bījakṣaṇā ādyātiśayamaṅkuraṃ vā paramparayā janayeyuḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2769: nanu yeṣūpasarpaṇapratyayasahacareṣu svakāraṇaśaktibhedādādyātiśayajanakatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣaḥ saṃbhāvyate sa tatrāvaśyamastīti kuto labhyamiti cet /
XXbsa075_u:2774: tadayamarthaḥ pāṇisparśavataḥ kṣaṇasya na bhidā bhinnānyakālakṣaṇād bhedo veti matadvaye mitibalaṃ yasyāstvasau jitvaraḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2775: tatraikasya balaṃ nimittavirahaḥ kāryāṅgamanyasya vā sāmagrī tu na sarvathekṣaṇasahā kāryaṃ tu mānānugam // iti //
XXbsa075_u:2778: atha saṃbhūyakaraṇamapekṣārthaḥ, tadā yadi pūrvasthitasyeti viśeṣaṇāpekṣā tadā kṣaṇikasya naivaṃ kadācidityanapekṣaivākṣīṇā /
XXbsa075_u:2785: yacca bījasyaikenaiva svabhāvena kārakatve kṣityādīnāmaṅkurasvābhāvyāpattiranyathā kāraṇābhede 'pi kāryabhede 'pi
XXbsa075_u:2790: yacca kāraṇābhede kāryābheda ityuktaṃ tatra sāmagrīsvarūpaṃ kāraṇamabhipretam /
XXbsa075_u:2792: na punaḥ sāmagrīmadhyagatenaikenānekaṃ kāryaṃ na kartavyaṃ nāma,
XXbsa075_u:2796: dṛśyamarthadvayamekamevopalambhayatīti kvacidupalabdham yena tatrāpi bhede śaṅkā syāt /
XXbsa075_u:2800: tadetau dvāvapi vyāpakānupalambhāvasiddhau na kṣaṇikāt sattvaṃ nivartayata iti nāyamasādhāraṇo hetuḥ //
XXbsa075_u:2801: api ca vidyamāno bhāvaḥ sādhyetarayoraniścitānvayavyatireko gandhavattādivadasādhāraṇo yuktaḥ
XXbsa075_u:2804: tadevaṃ śaktasya kṣepāyogāt samarthavyavahāragocaratvaṃ jananena vyāptamiti prasaṅgaviparyayayoḥ satve hetorapi nānaikāntikatvam /
XXbsa075_u:2818: na tāvadasyāsiddhiḥ saṃbhavati, yathāyogaṃ pratyakṣānumānapramāṇapratīte dharmiṇi sattvaśabdenābhipretasyārthakriyākāritvalakṣaṇasya
XXbsa075_u:2820: na ca viruddhānaikāntikate, vyāpakānupalambhātmanā viparyaye bādhakapramāṇena vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt
XXbsa075_u:2821: yasya kramākramau na vidyete na tasyārthakriyāsāmarthyam /
XXbsa075_u:2824: na tāvadayamasiddho hetuḥ, akṣaṇike dharmiṇi kramākramasadbhāvāyogāt /
XXbsa075_u:2829: abhede hi prathama eva kṣaṇe śaktatvād bhāvino 'pi kāryasya karaṇaprasaṅge kathaṃ kāryāntarakaraṇe kramāntarāvakāśaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2840: yenaiva hi pratyakṣātmanā pramāṇenāparaprakārābhāvādvidhibhūtābhyāṃ kramākramābhyāṃ vidhibhūtasyārthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptiḥ prasādhitā,
XXbsa075_u:2842: na hi dahanādinā dhūmādervyāptisādhakapramāṇādaparaṃ dhūmādyabhāvena dahanādyabhāvasya vyāptisādhakaṃ kiñcit pramāṇaṃ śaraṇabhūtamasti /
XXbsa075_u:2843: tasmādvidhyoreva vyāptisādhakaṃ pramāṇamabhāvayorapi vyāptisādhakamiti nyāyasya duratikramatvāt sattvābhāvena kramākramābhāvo vyāpta eveti nānaikāntika ityanavadyo vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2844: tadayamakṣaṇikād vinivartamānaḥ svavyāpyaṃ sattvaṃ nivartyaṃ kṣaṇike viśrāmayatīti sattvahetoḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhirapyanavadyā /
XXbsa075_u:2848: tathā hi na tāvadayaṃ prasaṅgo hetuḥ,
XXbsa075_u:2855: prathamapakṣadvaye sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulasādhāraṇo hetuḥ vyāpakānulambhaśca svarūpāsiddhaḥ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:2859: api ca, tat kalpanājñānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vā syāt, liṅgajanma vā,
XXbsa075_u:2860: saṃskārajaṃ vā, sandigdhavastukaṃ vā, avastukaṃ vā /
XXbsa075_u:2863: tṛtīye tu na sarvadākṣaṇikasattāniṣedhaḥ, tadarpitasaṃskārābhāve tatsmaraṇāyogāt /
XXbsa075_u:2865: pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvat pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati, akṣaṇikātmanaḥ sarvadaiva tvanmate 'pratyakṣatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:2874: na ca tayorāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyāṃ tadvataḥ kācit kṣatiḥ, tasya tābhyāmanyatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:2879: yasmāt dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijamāgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantaram, tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavatsahakārinānātvādapi kramavatkāryanānātvopapatteraśakyaṃ bhāvānāṃ
XXbsa075_u:2883: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśeṣāṇi kāryāṇi kuryāditi cet /
XXbsa075_u:2885: yo hi uttarakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ sa ( Nibandh 86.) kathamādau tat kāryaṃ
XXbsa075_u:2891: taccāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣviva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe saditi tadāpi
XXbsa075_u:2893: akurvan vā tṛtīyādiṣvapi na kurvīta, tasya tādavasthyāt /
XXbsa075_u:2896: satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryaṃ janayati na tu tenaiva /
XXbsa075_u:2902: ye hi kāryamutpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣāsteṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kārye 'nuvartamāneṣvapi teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthādūnā sāmagrī jāyate /
XXbsa075_u:2904: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva kartāro yenāmī niṣpatterārabhya kāryaṃ vidadhyuḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2908: kiṃ ca kramākramābhāvaśca bhaviṣyati na ca sattvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatireko 'pyayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ
XXbsa075_u:2909: na hi kramākramābhyāmanyasya prakārasyābhāvaḥ siddhaḥ, viśeṣaniṣedhasya śeṣābhyanujñāviṣayatvāt
XXbsa075_u:2911: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇāmiti na kramākramābhyāmarthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisiddhiḥ
XXbsa075_u:2913: kiṃ ca dṛśyādṛśyasahakāripratyayasākalyavataḥ kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvamapi parokṣameveti na tāvatpratibandhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
XXbsa075_u:2919: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptamiti tu bruvatā vyāpterevābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati
XXbsa075_u:2920: / na hi bhavati dhūmo vahnibhāvābhāvābhyāṃ vyāpta iti /
XXbsa075_u:2922: api ca kimidaṃ bādhakamakṣaṇikānāmasattāṃ sādhayati, utasvidakṣaṇikāt sattvasya vyatirekam, atha sattvakṣaṇikatvayoḥ pratibandham /
XXbsa075_u:2923: na pūrvo vikalpaḥ, ( Nibandh 87.) uktakrameṇa hetorāśrayāsiddhatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:2926: / sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā taddhetuḥ syāditi sattvamanaikāntikam /
XXbsa075_u:2928: atha sā vikalpyate tadā pūrvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpo dūṣaṇīyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2929: ata eva na tṛtīyo 'pi vikalpaḥ, vyatirekāsiddhau sambandhāsiddheḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2930: kiṃ ca na bhūtalavadatrākṣaṇiko dharmī dṛśyate /
XXbsa075_u:2931: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasyacit dṛśyasya pratipattimantareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakyata iti /
XXbsa075_u:2939: pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sanneva syāt, ajanakasyāprameyatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:2946: tatra kiṃ virodho vāstavaḥ, kālpaniko vā /
XXbsa075_u:2948: atha virodho 'pi kālpanikaḥ na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthika iti kṣaṇabhaṅgo dattajalāñjaliriti /
XXbsa075_u:2949: ayameva codyaprabandho 'smadgurubhiḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ nityaṃ nāsti na vā pratītiviṣayastenāśrayāsiddhatā
XXbsa075_u:2950: hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
XXbsa075_u:2951: śūnyaśca dvitayena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasiddhirasatā śakyā kramāderapi // iti //
XXbsa075_u:2953: iha vastunyapi dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā gavi gotvam,
XXbsa075_u:2955: avastunyapi dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo bandhyāputre vaktṛtvābhāvo gaganāravinde gandhābhāva ( Nibandh 88.) ityādi /
XXbsa075_u:2956: tatrāvastuni dharmitvaṃ nāstīti kiṃ vastudharmeṇa dharmitvaṃ nāsti,
XXbsa075_u:2960: yadāhurguravaḥ dharmasya kasyacidavastuni mānasiddhā bādhāvidhivyavahṛtiḥ kimihāsti no vā kvāpyasti cet kathamiyanti na dūṣaṇāni nāstyeva cet svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ //
XXbsa075_u:2962: yenaiva hi vacanenāvastuno dharmitvaṃ pratiṣidhyate, tenaivāvastuno dharmitvābhāvena dharmeṇa dharmitvamabhyupagatam /
XXbsa075_u:2964: tathā hyavastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanena dharmitvābhāvaḥ kimavastuni vidhīyate, anyatra vā, na vā kvacidapīti
XXbsa075_u:2966: prathamapakṣe 'vastuno na dharmitvaniṣedhaḥ, dharmitvābhāvasya dharmasya tatraiva vidhānāt
XXbsa075_u:2968: tṛtīyastu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvāditi kathamavastuno dharmitvaniṣedhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2969: tasmādyathā pramāṇopanyāsaḥ prameyasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptaḥ, vācakaśabdopanyāso vā vācyasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptastathāvastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanopanyāso 'vastuno dharmitvasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2971: tad yadi vacanopanyāso vyāpyadharmastadāvastuno dharmitvasvīkāro 'pi vyāpakadharmo durvāraḥ
XXbsa075_u:2972: atha na vyāpakadharmaḥ tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsaṃbhava iti mūkataivātra balādāyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2974: bruvan vā doṣamimaṃ parihartumiti mahati saṃkaṭe praveśaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2975: avastuprastāve sahṛdayānāṃ mūkataiva yujyata iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:2977: avastuprastāve svayameva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāṣayā niḥsartumicchati
XXbsa075_u:2978: na cāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamardanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣeddhaṃ śakyate
XXbsa075_u:2979: tataśvātrāpi kramākramabhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastvātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmitvaṃ kena pratiṣidhyate /
XXbsa075_u:2987: svavacanasyānupanyāsaprasaṅgādityakṣaṇikasyābhāve sandehe 'pi vā vastudharmeṇa dharmitvamavyāhatamiti nāyamāśrayāsiddho vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:2988: akṣaṇikāpratītā vāśrayāsiddho heturiti yuktamuktam, tadapratītau tadvyavahārāyogāt /
XXbsa075_u:2993: vastuno hi vastubalabhāvinī pratītiryathā sākṣātpratyakṣam, paramparayā tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī vikalpo
XXbsa075_u:2997: na hyabhāvaḥ kaścidvigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkartavyo 'pi tu vyavahartavyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3002: tataścākṣaṇikasya vikalpamātrasiddhatve yaduktam, na kaściddheturanāśrayaḥ vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra sulabhatvāditi tadasaṅgatam /
XXbsa075_u:3003: vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra saṃbhave 'pi vastudharmeṇa dharmitvāyogāt /
XXbsa075_u:3017: na caiṣa svarūpāsiddhaḥ, akṣaṇike dharmiṇi kramākramayorvyāpakayorayogāt /
XXbsa075_u:3018: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇasāmarthyamasti tadā ( Nibandh
XXbsa075_u:3023: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti, sahakārisahitādeva tataḥ kāryotpattidarśanāditi cet /
XXbsa075_u:3024: yadā tāvadamī militāḥ santaḥ kāryaṃ kurvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvameṣāmastu, ko niṣeddhāḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3025: militaireva tu tatkāryaṃ karttavyamiti kuto labhyate /
XXbsa075_u:3027: tasmāt sāmagrī janikā, naikaṃ janakamiti sthiravādināṃ
XXbsa075_u:3031: paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭād bhāvāt kāryotpattiranyasmādeva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇāditi vivādapadametat /
XXbsa075_u:3032: tatra prāgapi saṃbhave sarvadaiva kāryotpattirna vā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya tata eva kāryotpattiriti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhati /
XXbsa075_u:3033: na ca pratyabhijñānādevaikatvasiddhiḥ, tatpauruṣasya lūnapunarjātakeśakuśakadalīstambādau nirdalanāt /
XXbsa075_u:3034: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñādūṣaṇamasmābhiḥ sthirasiddhidūṣaṇe pratipāditamiti tata evāvadhāryam
XXbsa075_u:3037: yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijamāgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantarama, tato
XXbsa075_u:3040: tathāpi tat prātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam /
XXbsa075_u:3044: na ca kāryaṃ sahakāriṇo 'pekṣata iti yuktam, tasyāsattvāt /
XXbsa075_u:3045: hetuśca sannapi yadi svakāryaṃ na karoti, tadā tatkāryameva tanna syāt,
XXbsa075_u:3047: yaccoktam - yo hi uttarakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ sa kathamādau kāryaṃ kuryāt,
XXbsa075_u:3048: (atha kuryāt) na tarhi tatkāryakaraṇasvabhāvaḥ, na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ
XXbsa075_u:3050: sthirasvabhāvatve bhāvasyottarakālamevedaṃ na pūrvakālamiti kuta etat /
XXbsa075_u:3052: kiṃ kurmaḥ, uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet /
XXbsa075_u:3054: sthiratve 'pyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva kāryaṃ karotīti ( Nibandh 91.) cet /
XXbsa075_u:3059: kāryeniṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvādūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayediti cet /
XXbsa075_u:3061: sāmagrīsaṃbhavāsaṃbhavayorapi sadyaḥ kriyākārakasvarūpasaṃbhave janakatvamavāryamiti prāgeva pratipādanāt /
XXbsa075_u:3062: kāryasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ kartumaśakyatvameva kāraṇamasamarthamāvedayati /
XXbsa075_u:3064: na ca kramākramābhyāmaparaprakārasaṃbhavo yena tābhyāmavyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt
XXbsa075_u:3070: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo 'dṛśyatve 'pyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya dṛśyasyaiva sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣādeva sidhyati /
XXbsa075_u:3071: evaṃ kramākramābhyāmarthakriyākāritvaṃ vyāptamiti kramākramayoranyonyavyavacchedena sthitatvādetatprakāradvayaparihāreṇārthakriyākāritvamanyatra na gatamityarthaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3075: na hyabhāvaḥ kaścidvigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ, api tu vikalpādeva
XXbsa075_u:3079: evaṃ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpādeva pratipattiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3082: tadayaṃ vyāpakānupalambho 'kṣaṇikasyāsattvam sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiṃ
XXbsa075_u:3084: nanu vyāpakānupalabdhiriti yadyanupalabdhimātraṃ tadā na tasya sādhyabuddhijanakatvamavastutvāt
XXbsa075_u:3088: yathā hi neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvādityatra vṛkṣāpekṣayākevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhirvṛkṣānupalabdhiḥ
XXbsa075_u:3089: śiṃśapāpekṣayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhireva rśiśapāyā abhāvopalabdhiriti svabhāvahetuparyavasāyivyāpāro ( Nibandh 92.) vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3090: tathā nityasya dharmiṇo vikalpabuddhyavasitasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇādeva kramikāritvākramikāritvānupalambhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3091: artha kriyāpekṣayā ca kevalapratītirevārthakriyāyogapratītiriti vyāpakānupalambhāntarādasya na kaścidviśeṣaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:3092: adhyavasāyāpekṣayā va bāhye 'kṣaṇike vastuni vyāpakābhāvād vyāpyābhāvasiddhivyavahāraḥ
XXbsa075_u:3100: ayaṃ ca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmiṇi tathāvastubhūte
XXbsa075_u:3103: yathā ca hariṇaśirasi tenaikajñānasaṃsargi śṛṅgamupalabdhaṃ śaśaśirasyapi tena sahaikajñānasaṃsargitvasaṃbhāvanayaiva śṛṅgaṃ niṣidhyate, tathā nīlādāvapariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmiṇā sārdhamekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau, yadi nitye bhavataḥ, nityagrāhijñāne svadharmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātāmiti saṃbhāvanayā
XXbsa075_u:3105: kathaṃ punaretasminnityajñāne kramākramayorasphuraṇamiti yāvatā kramākramakroḍīkṛtameva nityaṃ vikalpayāma iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:3106: ata eva bādhakāvatāro viparītāropa mantareṇa tasya vaiyarthyāt /
XXbsa075_u:3109: tato nityatvasya kramākramikāryaśakteśca parasparaparihārasthiti lakṣaṇatayā durvāro virodha iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayorantarbhāvaḥ anantarbhāvācca śuddhanityavikalpena dūrīkṛtakramākramasamāropeṇa kathamullekhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3111: 'pi vikalpyamāne ekajñāna saṃsargilakṣaṇaprāpte nityopalabdhireva nityaviruddhasyānupalabhyamānasya kramākramasyānupalabdhiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3114: na tvetadavastu dharmitvopayogivastva dhiṣṭhānatvāt pramāṇavyavasthāyā iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:3123: na cāntimo 'pi vikalpaḥ kalpyate, tasyaiva nityavikalpasya vastuno dharmibhūtasya kramākramavadbāhyanityopādānaśūnyatvenārthakriyāvad bāhyanityopādānaśūnyatve prasādhanāt /
XXbsa075_u:3124: paryudāsavṛttyā buddhisvabhāvabhūtākṣaṇikākāre vastubhūte dharmiṇi pratibaddhatvasaṃbhavāt ayameva nyāyo na vaktā bandhyāsutaścaitanyābhāvādityādau yojyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3125: etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādirantarbhāvayituṃ śakyate na tathāyamiti trilocano 'pi
XXbsa075_u:3127: na ca kramādyabhāvastrayīṃ doṣajātiṃ nātikrāmati, abhāvadharmatve 'pi
XXbsa075_u:3129: yattvanena pramāṇāntarānnityānāmasattvasiddhau kramādivirahasyābhāvadharmatā sidhyatītyuktam, tadvālasyāpi durabhidhānam /
XXbsa075_u:3134: tacca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāptisiddhau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatītyabhāvadharmatvaṃ prāgeva vidhyorvyāptisādhanāt pratyakṣādanumānādekasmādvā pramāṇāntarāt siddhamiti netaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3135: na ca sattāyāmivāsattāyāmapi tulyaḥ prasaṅgo bhinnanyāyatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:3136: vastubhūtaṃ hi tatra sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca /
XXbsa075_u:3140: asattāsādhane tvavastudharmo heturavastu vikalpamātrasiddhe dharmiṇi nāśrayāsiddhidoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3143: vikalpollikhita ścāsya svabhāvo nāpara ityapi vyavahartavyam /
XXbsa075_u:3147: ato yathā pramāṇābhāve 'pi vikalpasiddhasya ( Nibandh 94.) bandhyāsutādeḥ saundaryādiniṣedho 'nurūpastathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇikarūpasya tata eva pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:3148: yadi cākṣaṇikānubhavābhāvād virodhapratiṣedhastarhi bandhyāputrādyanubhavābhāvādeva saundaryādiniṣedho 'pi mā bhūt //
XXbsa075_u:3151: na hi virodho nāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcidubhayakoṭidattapādasaṃbandhābhidhānamiṣyate asmābhirūpapadyate vā yenaikasaṃbandhino vastutvābhāve 'pāramārthikaṃ syāt
XXbsa075_u:3156: na bhāvo 'bhāvarūpamāviśati, nāpyabhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo
XXbsa075_u:3162: nanu nityatvaṃ kramayaugapadyavattvaṃ ca viruddhau dharmau vidhūya nāparo virodho nāma, kasya bāstavatvamiti cet /
XXbsa075_u:3164: na hi dharmāntarasya saṃbhavena virodhasya pāramārthikatvaṃ brūmaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3167: yadi na viruddhau dharmau kva pāramārthikavirodhasaṃbhavaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3168: viruddhauceddhamau tāvataiva tāttviko virodhavyavahāraḥ kimapareṇa pratijñāmātrasiddhena virodhanāmnā vastvantareṇa /
XXbsa075_u:3169: tadayaṃ pūrvapakṣasaṃkṣepaḥ nityaṃ nāsti na vā pratītiviṣayastenāśrayāsiddhatā hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
XXbsa075_u:3170: śanyaśya dvitayena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasiddhirasatā śakyā kramāderapi // iti //
XXbsa075_u:3171: atra siddhāntasaṃkṣepaḥ dharmasya kasyacidavastuni mānasiddhā bādhāvidhivyavahṛtiḥ kimihāsti no vā /
XXbsa075_u:3172: kvāpyasti cet kathamiyanti na dūṣaṇāni nāstyeva cet svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ //
XXbsa075_u:3176: tataśca kṣaṇikākṣaṇikaparihāreṇa rāśyantarābhāvādakṣaṇikānnivartamānamidaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇika eva viśrāmyattena vyāptaṃ sidhyatīti sattvāt kṣaṇikatvasiddhiravirodhinī //
XXbsa075_u:3184: iha khalu pramāṇamātre na kecid vipratipadyante /
XXbsa075_u:3186: pramāṇamātrocchedavādī ca tattadāṅśakya pratividhānādasmadgurubhiravajñātaḥ pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ ced vicārāvasaro hataḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3187: bruvatā niyataṃ kiñcit sādhyaṃ vā bādhyameva vā //
XXbsa075_u:3192: sādhyaṃ na kiñciditi ced bādhāyā api sādhyatā /
XXbsa075_u:3193: sāpi neti vaco vyarthaṃ praśnamātre 'pi kiṃ phalam //
XXbsa075_u:3197: saṃvṛtāvapi neṣṭaṃ ced vadan jetā yathā tathā //
XXbsa075_u:3198: saṃvṛtiśca vinā mānaṃ vāṅmātreṇa na sidhyati /
XXbsa075_u:3202: bhāvābhāvavyavasthāṃ kaḥ kartuṃ tena vinā prabhuḥ //
XXbsa075_u:3209: tacchāstre hi pratyakṣetarasāmānyayoḥ pramāṇetaravidhānaṃ lakṣaṇapraṇayanato vidhātavyam /
XXbsa075_u:3210: tacca lakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣe dharmiṇi lakṣye prāmāṇye pratyetavye svabhāvo hetuḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3220: nanvastu prāpaṇe śaktiḥ prāmāṇyam, paramasaunārthādutpatteḥ, api
XXbsa075_u:3225: prathamapakṣe nīlatvavad dṛśyatvasyāpi sādhāraṇatvādekagocaro 'rthaḥ sarvagocaraḥ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:3227: dvitīyapakṣe tu kathamanyasmin jñānasvabhāve draṣṭṛtve satyanyasyāsamba(ddha)syārthasya
XXbsa075_u:3231: anabhyupagame draṣṭṛtvaṃ dṛśyatvaṃ ca na saṃbhavatīti kiṃ kenākṣipyatām /
XXbsa075_u:3232: bhavatu vā prakārāntareṇāpi draṣṭṛdṛśyabhāvastathāpi bhede satyavyabhicārastadutpattireva prāptinimittam /
XXbsa075_u:3233: sā ca prāpaṇaśaktiḥ pratyakṣānumānayoraviśiṣṭeti pramāṇe eva /
XXbsa075_u:3235: tathā hi śabdāccodanārūpādasannikṛṣṭe 'rthe svargādau yajjñānamutpadyate tadapi
XXbsa075_u:3241: tatra yadā śabdasamutthaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadopādānādibuddhiḥ phalam /
XXbsa075_u:3242: yadā tu śabdastadā tadālambanaṃ jñānaṃ phalamiti /
XXbsa075_u:3243: naiyāyikasya punaḥ āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ iti śabdapramāṇalakṣaṇasūtram /
XXbsa075_u:3248: / āptaśca ( Nibandh 98.) sākṣātkṛtaheyopādeyatattvo yathādṛṣṭasya cārthasyācikhyāsayā prayukta upadeṣṭā abhidhīyate /
XXbsa075_u:3259: tenāyamarthaḥ - yathā gavaye dṛśyamānaṃ sādṛśyaṃ gāṃ smarato manuṣyasya etatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭo 'sau gauriti buddhimutpādayatīti /
XXbsa075_u:3260: na cedamupamānaṃ smaraṇaṃ kartavyam, gavayasādṛśyaviśiṣṭasya gorgoviśiṣṭasya ca sādṛśyasya prameyatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:3262: yadāha bhaṭṭaḥ pratyakṣe 'pi yathā deśe smaryamāṇe ca pāvake /
XXbsa075_u:3264: pratyakṣeṇāvabuddhe ca sādṛśye gavi ca smṛte /
XXbsa075_u:3271: prasiddhaṃ sādharmyaṃ yasya tasmād gavayādeḥ sādhyasya saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhasya sādhanaṃ siddhistadupamānaphalam
XXbsa075_u:3274: yaḥ pratipattā gāṃ jānāti na gavayam, ādiṣṭaśca svāminā gacchāraṇyam
XXbsa075_u:3275: gavayamānayāsmāditi, gavayaśabdavācyamarthama jānāno vanecaramanyaṃ vā tajjñaṃ pṛṣṭavān, bhrātaḥ kīdṛśo gavaya iti /
XXbsa075_u:3276: tena cādiṣṭaṃ yathā gaustathā gavaya iti /
XXbsa075_u:3277: tasya śrutātideśavākyasya kasyāñcidaraṇyānyāmupagatasyātideśavākyārthasmaraṇasahakāri yad gavayasārūpyajñānaṃ tatprathamata evāsau gavayaśabdavācyo 'rtha iti pratipattiṃ prastuvānamupamānaṃ pramāṇamiti /
XXbsa075_u:3280: arthāpattirapi dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vārtho 'nyathā nopadyamāno yadarthāntaraṃ parikalpayati /
XXbsa075_u:3282: yathā jīvati devadatte gṛhābhāvadarśanena bahirbhāvasyārthasya parikalpanā
XXbsa075_u:3285: sa yena vinā na yujyate tasyārthasya kalpanamarthāpattiriti /
XXbsa075_u:3298: prayogaḥ - yasya yatra pratibandho nāsti na tasya tatra prāmāṇyam /
XXbsa075_u:3300: apratibaddhāśca bahirarthe vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3304: na ca sā nirnibandhanā, sarveṣāṃ sarvatra pratibaddhasvabhāvatāprasaṅgāt /
XXbsa075_u:3308: nāpi śabdā bahirarthādupajāyante, arthamantareṇāpi puruṣasyecchāpratibaddhavṛtteḥ śabdasyotpādadarśanāt
XXbsa075_u:3312: tathaivaite vaidikāḥ śabdāstādātmyatadutpattiviyuktā api yogyatāmātreṇātīndriyamarthaṃ bodhayiṣyanti tatkathaṃ tādātmyatadutpattivirahamātreṇāpratibandho yenaivaṃ vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ sidhyatīti naiṣa doṣaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3313: yataścakṣurindriyamapi rasādiparihāreṇa rūpa eva prakāśakatvena pratiniyataṃ tatkāryatvāt
XXbsa075_u:3315: na sattāmātreṇa cakṣū rūpaṃ prakāśayati, vyavahitasyāpi rūpopalabdhiprasaṅgāt /
XXbsa075_u:3316: tasmād rūpād yogyadeśasannihitāt tajjñānajananayogyatāmāsādya cakṣū rūpajñānamutpādayattatkāryamiti vyaktamavasīyate /
XXbsa075_u:3320: ayameva tarhi niyamaḥ kuto yad rūpeṇaiva cakṣurūpakartavyam, na rasādineti /
XXbsa075_u:3321: yadi vastuvaśādeva rūpamupakaroti na rasādikam, hanta tarhi yathopakāryatvaṃ prati niyamaścakṣuṣo rūpeṇa, tathā śabdānāmapi svābhāvika evāstu bahirarthapratyāyananiyama iti /
XXbsa075_u:3323: na cakṣuṣaḥ svābhāviko rūpopakāryatāniyamaḥ, kasyacid vastunaḥ svābhāvikatvānupapatteḥ
XXbsa075_u:3324: tathā hi svābhāvikatvaṃ vastudharmasyānujānānaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ - kiṃ svābhāvika iti svato bhavati, āhosvit parataḥ,
XXbsa075_u:3326: yadi svato bhavati, tadasaṅgatam, svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
XXbsa075_u:3329: kiṃnibandhanastarhi svahetupratibaddha iti, brūmaḥ - cakṣūḥ khalu svahetunā janyamānaṃ tādṛśameva janitam
XXbsa075_u:3332: śabdānāmapi sa svabhāvaḥ svahetupratibaddho yenaite bāhyārthāvyabhicāriṇa iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:3338: yathā cakṣuḥ svaheto rūpaprakāśakamutpannaṃ sat prakāśayatyeva rūpamasaṅketavido 'pi,
XXbsa075_u:3339: na ca śabdāduccaritāt prāgapratītasamayasyāpi viśeṣāvagamaḥ samasti /
XXbsa075_u:3341: atha svahetubhirevāyamīdṛśasteṣāṃ svabhāvo datto yena te saṃketaviśeṣasahāyā eva kamapyarthamavabodhayanti
XXbsa075_u:3343: yadi hyayamagnihotraśabdaḥ saṃketāpekṣo yāgaviśeṣapratipādakaḥ, kathaṃ saṅketānyatvenārthāntaraṃ pratipādayati /
XXbsa075_u:3344: na hi kṣityādyapekṣeṇa bījena svahetoraṅkurajananasvabhāvenotpannena rāsabhaḥ śakyo janayitum, tathā śabdo 'pi yadarthapratipādananiyatastameva prakāśayet //
XXbsa075_u:3348: yadā hi saṅketenāpuruṣārtha pratipādanamapi saṃbhāvyata eva, tadā na śakyamupakalpayituṃ kimayamabhimatasyaivārthasya dyotako na veti /
XXbsa075_u:3350: tathā cāha vācyavācakasaṃbandhāḥ santi yadyapi vāstavāḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3362: na hi viruddhasya sādharmyavati dharmiṇi sadbhāvo
XXbsa075_u:3368: na ca tasmin pratibandhābhāvalakṣaṇo heturasti, svaviruddhena pratibandhena vyāptatvāt
XXbsa075_u:3369: / na khalvayaṃ prādeśikaḥ pramāṇaśabdo jñāneṣu nirnibandhana eva,
XXbsa075_u:3373: ataḥ pramāṇe dharmiṇi vipakṣe prāmāṇyasya viruddhavyāptasyopalambhena vipakṣe vyavacchedasiddhernānaikāntiko hetuḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3375: tasmānnirastāśeṣadoṣeṇa hetunā yat prasiddhaṃ tadupādeyameva satām (iti) paṇḍitaśrījitāripādaireva vedāprāmāṇye darśitam
XXbsa075_u:3376: evaṃ ca vaidikaśabdānāṃ pramāṇye niraste tadutthaṃ jñānamapyapramāṇameva /
XXbsa075_u:3377: āptapraṇītasya punarvacanasyārthāvyabhicāre tajjanmano jñānasyāvyabhicārasaṃbhave 'pi na prāmāṇyamupagantuṃ
XXbsa075_u:3380: yad yena rūpeṇa na niścitaṃ na tat tena rūpeṇa vyavahriyate /
XXbsa075_u:3386: tau ca kāyavāgvyavahārau buddhipūrvamanyathāpi kartuṃ śakyete /
XXbsa075_u:3393: ato yadetasya prāmāṇyaprasiddhyarthaṃ vācaspatiprabhṛtīnāṃ valgitaṃ tadaprāptāvasarameva /
XXbsa075_u:3394: evaṃ pratyayoditamapi bhaṭṭābhimataṃ śābdaṃ pramāṇyaṃ vyastamiti boddhavyam /
XXbsa075_u:3395: tasmāt sthitametat na śābdaṃ bahirarthe pramāṇamastīti /
XXbsa075_u:3397: mīmāṃsakoktaṃ tāvadupamānaṃ mānameva na bhavati, nirviṣayatvādasya /
XXbsa075_u:3399: yasya na viṣayavattvaṃ na tasya prāmāṇyam /
XXbsa075_u:3403: tathā hi sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛśyamupamānasya viṣayo varṇyate /
XXbsa075_u:3407: yadāha sādṛśyasya ca vastutvaṃ na śakyamapavādhitum /
XXbsa075_u:3411: yadi sadṛśātiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vastu dṛśyaṃ syāt, tadā
XXbsa075_u:3416: sādṛśyapratyayastu svahetostathotpannena sadṛśavastunāpi kriyamāṇoghaṭata eva iti na sādṛśyamupasthāpayituṃ prabhavati /
XXbsa075_u:3420: tataśca sādṛśyasyāsiddherna tadviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛśyamupamānasya viṣayaḥ
XXbsa075_u:3424: tathā hi prāmāṇyābhāve sādhye pramāṇyameva vipakṣaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3426: tadayaṃ viruddhavyāptopalabdhyā vipakṣānnivartamāno viṣayavattvābhāvalakṣaṇo hetuḥ prāmāṇyābhāvalakṣaṇa eva viśrāmyatīti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3438: na ca yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśāntaramantareṇa prakāśate tathā saṃbandho 'pi
XXbsa075_u:3440: pramāṇasiddhe hi vasturūpe 'yamasya svabhāva iti varṇyate /
XXbsa075_u:3443: tatka evaṃ jānātvayamasya svabhāva iti, yadvā nāstyevāyamiti /
XXbsa075_u:3444: ayamanayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbaddhāvetāviti tu buddhiḥ svahetubalāt saṃbaddhavastudvayādapi saṃbhāvyamānā na saṃbandhamākṣeptuṃ prabhavati /
XXbsa075_u:3446: athābhinnaḥ tadā saṃbandhināveva kevalāviati na samākhyāsaṃbandho nāma, yaḥ kaścidupamānasya viṣayaḥ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:3448: bhede ca sa eva sambandhaḥ, nāmni paraṃ vivādaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3449: athābhinnam, tadā yathā saṃbaddhapadārthasya svabhāvaḥ sarvapadārthasādhāraṇastathā tadapi rūpaṃ tadavyatibhinnaṃ sarvapadārthasādhāraṇamiti sa padārtho
XXbsa075_u:3453: tathā hi saṃbaddhaṃ svayameva cennanu yathā taṃ tasya saṃbandhinaṃ pratyātmā jagatīmapi prati tathā tatkena yogo 'sya na /
XXbsa075_u:3454: saṃbandhe parato 'pi tulyamakhilaṃ tenaiva cet saṃyamo hetuḥ kiṃ na niyāmakaḥ sa ca kathaṃ yogaḥ kvacinnāpare //
XXbsa075_u:3456: tasmāt saṃbandhābhāvāt pūrvoktena nyāyena sārūpyābhāvāccāsiddhaṃ naiyāyikasyāpi nirviṣayamupamānaṃ pramāṇamato 'nantareṇaiva
XXbsa075_u:3459: yadetat sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣādipratīto yo 'rthaḥ sa yena vinā nopapadyate tasyārthasya
XXbsa075_u:3461: yasyārthasya darśanād yo 'rthaḥ parikalpyate tayoryadi pratibandho 'stitadārthāpattiranumānameva
XXbsa075_u:3463: tathā hi pramāṇaparidṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ kenacidvinā nopapadyata iti kuto labhyate, yadi paridṛśyamānaparikalpyamānayoḥ
XXbsa075_u:3465: anyathā tena vinā nopapadyata ityahrīkādanyo na brūyāt,
XXbsa075_u:3467: sa ca sambandhaḥ kvacit pūrvamavaśyaṃ pratyakṣānupalambhataḥ kvacidadṛśyatve 'pi viparyayabādhakapramāṇabalādvā niścetavyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3470: caivam, ekaṃ saṃbandhinaṃ dṛṣṭvā yatrasthena vinā tatrasthaṃ nopapadyate,
XXbsa075_u:3475: tasmāt paridṛśyamānaparikalpyamānayoḥ sati pratibandhe nārthāpattiḥ pramāṇāntaramiti /
XXbsa075_u:3476: atha tayorna pratibandhaḥ, tadārthāpattiḥ pramāṇameva na bhavatīti mantavyam, sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca saṃbandhābhāvāt /
XXbsa075_u:3477: yasya yatra pratibandho nāsti na tasya tatra prāmāṇyamityādirveda nirākaraṇārtha yaḥ pūrvamupanyastaḥ sa evāsyā api prāmāṇyanirākaraṇāya draṣṭavyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3478: sāmānyenaivārthāpattau nirākṛtāyāṃ pratyakṣādipūrvakatvalakṣaṇastatprapañco nirasto bhavatyeveti tadarthaṃ na prabandho 'bhidhīyate, gavi nirākṛte śāvaleyanirākṛtivat /
XXbsa075_u:3480: tathā abhāvapramāṇasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ nopapadyate, tasyāpi nirviṣayatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:3481: tataśca mīmāṃsakopavalgitopamānanirākaraṇārthamupanyasto yo viṣayavattvābhāvalakṣaṇo 'nupalambhaḥ sa evāsyāpi nirāsārthamupanyasitavyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3483: tathā hi yadi ghaṭābhāvo vāstavaḥ prameyabhūto na syāt, tadā nāstīha ghaṭa iti pratyayaḥ kathamutpadyata iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:3485: nanu yadi kaivalyaṃ praveśasvarūpaṃ tattarhi saghaṭe 'pi pradeśe vidyata iti
XXbsa075_u:3489: kaivalyaṃ tadviviktatvamasaṅkīrṇatvamityādibhiḥ padaiḥ pradeśasya ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvasya svahetuta utpannasya ghaṭapradeśādanya evātmābhidhīyate /
XXbsa075_u:3490: sa eva cābhāvapratyayaṃ janayatīti kimapareṇābhāvena kartavyam /
XXbsa075_u:3491: nanu ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvasya pradeśasyeti ghaṭābhāvayuktasya pradeśasyetyuktaṃ bhavatīti cet /
XXbsa075_u:3492: tarhi ghaṭābhāvo 'pi ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvaḥ kimabhāvāntareṇa svarūpeṇaiva vā /
XXbsa075_u:3497: paryudāsavṛttyā ghaṭābhāvarūpatvādabhāvaṃ vinaiva ghaṭaṃ pratyanāpannādhārabhāvo yukta iti kimakāṇḍamāhopuruṣikayā mithyāpralāpenābodhaviklavaṃ śiṣyapudgalamākulayasi /
XXbsa075_u:3505: kaḥpunaḥ pramāṇābhāvātmābhimato bhavatām, kiṃ prasajyavṛttyā pramāṇānutpattimātram, atha vā paryudāsavṛttyā bhāvāntaram /
XXbsa075_u:3510: yacca na kiñcit tatkathamabhāvaṃ paricchindyāt, tadviṣayaṃ vā jñānaṃ janayet, pratītaṃ vā tatkathamiti sarvamandhakāranartanam /
XXbsa075_u:3512: na hyabhāvaḥ kasyacit pratipattiḥ pratipattiheturvā tasyāpi kathaṃ pratipattiriti /
XXbsa075_u:3515: nāpi jñānamātrasvabhāvo 'bhāvo vaktavyaḥ, deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭasyāpi tato 'bhāvaprasaṅgāt, tadapekṣayāpi jñānamātratvāt tasya /
XXbsa075_u:3523: tasmāt sthitametat, pramāṇasya sato 'traivāntarbhāvāt pramāṇe eva //
XXbsa075_u:3531: pradeśe dhūmasya bhūyodarśanaṃ tadviyukte ca tathaivādarśanamityanvayavyatirekitvaṃ kalpayāmbabhūvuḥ
XXbsa075_u:3532: nanu bhūyasāpi pravṛtte darśanādarśane ghaṭakulaṭādāvupalabdho vyabhicāra iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:3533: kimetāvatā tatrāpyanumānamastu, tadvadvā dhūmādāvapi bhā bhūt /
XXbsa075_u:3537: tasmādagnidhūmayoravyabhicārasyāsaṃbhave śatamapi tadupapattayaḥ tatprasādhakaviśiṣṭapratyakṣānupalambhā vā nānumānopayoginaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3538: saṃbhave vā kiṃ tadutpattyā tadupayoginā viśiṣṭapratyakṣānupalambhena,
XXbsa075_u:3540: tathā ca kāśikākāraḥ prācīnānekadarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyenacarameṇa cetasā dhūmasyāgniniyatatvaṃ gṛhyata iti //
XXbsa075_u:3549: atha pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvī vikalpo dṛṣṭe bhede 'bhedamadhyavasyati, tadeva sāmānyam /
XXbsa075_u:3553: vastu tu teṣāṃ parokṣameveti, kathaṃ tenāpi sambandhagrahaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3554: asmākaṃ tu bhūyodarśanasahāyena manasā tajjātīyānāṃ saṃbandho gṛhīto bhavati /
XXbsa075_u:3556: tadvyabhicāre dhūma upādhirahitaṃ saṃbandhamatikrāmediti hetovipakṣaśaṅkānivartakaṃ pramāṇamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptopādhivirahaheturanupalambhākhyaṃ pratyakṣameva /
XXbsa075_u:3559: tathā hi dhumādīnāṃ vahnyādibhiḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3570: darśanānarhatayā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvena sagdihyamāna upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatvaṃ pratibadhnātīti yuktam /
XXbsa075_u:3571: avaśyaṃ śaṅkayā bhāvyaṃ niyāmakamapaśyatām iti tu dattāvakāśā laukikamaryādātikrameṇa śaṅkāpiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstīti nāyaṃ kvacit pravarteta /
XXbsa075_u:3581: tasmādupādhiṃ prayatnenānviṣyanto 'nupalabhamānā nāstītyavagamya svābhāvikatvaṃ saṃbandhasya niścinumaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3583: anyasyānyena sahākāraṇena cet svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho bhavet,
XXbsa075_u:3586: athānyasya cedanyat kāryaṃ kasmāt sarvaṃ sarvasmānna bhavati,
XXbsa075_u:3590: paryanuyojyāḥ, tasmādanyatvāviśeṣe 'pi kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca kiñciditi /
XXbsa075_u:3591: nanveṣa svabhāvānāmanuyogo bhinnānāmakāryakāraṇabhūtānāmapi svabhāvapratibandhe tulya eva
XXbsa075_u:3593: kena punaḥ pramāṇenaiṣa svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyate /
XXbsa075_u:3595: tathā hi abhijāatamaṇibhedatattvavad bhūyodarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyamindriyameva dhūmādīnāṃ vahnyādibhiḥ svābhāvikāsaṃbandhagrāhīti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3596: evaṃ mānāntaraviditasaṃbandheṣu mānāntarāṇyeva yathāsvaṃ bhūyodarśanasahāyāni svābhāvikasaṃbandhagrahaṇe pramāṇānyunnetavyāni /
XXbsa075_u:3597: svabhāvataśca pratibaddhā hetavaḥ svasādhyena yadi ( Nibandh 108.) sādhyamantareṇa
XXbsa075_u:3602: na cāsāvanyo vā svata evāvinābhāvalakṣaṇaḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho bhūyodarśanamātrataḥ sidhyati
XXbsa075_u:3603: tathā hi, kiṃ yatra bhūyodarśanapravṛttistatra niyatatvavyavasthā, yatra vā niyatatvamasti tatraiva bhūyodarśanapravṛttiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3604: prathamapakṣe ghaṭādapi kulaṭā, pārthivatvādapi lohalekhyatvaṃ sidhyet, bhūyodarśanasaṃbhave
XXbsa075_u:3607: kasya punarvyabhicāradarśanam yasya kasyacit śāstrakārasya, pratipatturvā /
XXbsa075_u:3608: prathamapakṣe pratipattuḥ kimāyātaṃ yato nānumānamayaṃ kuryāt /
XXbsa075_u:3609: anyathānyasya tadviṣayapratyakṣīkāreṇaiva so 'pi kṛtārtha iti kimavaśyamanumānamanveṣate
XXbsa075_u:3612: śāstrakāraṃ ca pṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭasaṃbandho 'pi dhṛmādagnimanumāsyata ityalaukikam /
XXbsa075_u:3614: na hi yatra vyabhicārastatraiva tāvati kāle deśe vāvaśyaṃ pratītimavatarati /
XXbsa075_u:3619: tadaiva krameṇa vā vyabhicāraṃ paśyediti cet /
XXbsa075_u:3620: yadi tāvadasau kathañcit pravartate, pravṛtto 'pi vā sāmagryabhāvāvyabhicāraṃ na paśyet /
XXbsa075_u:3622: vyaktaṃ tasya tāvat tadapyamānamāpannamiti mahat pāṇḍityam /
XXbsa075_u:3624: tathā adarśanamātreṇa vyabhicārābhāvo na sidhyati, yogyānupalabdhereva sarvatrābhāvasādhane 'dhikārāt /
XXbsa075_u:3625: tato bahulaṃ sahacāramātreṇa na vyabhicārī na vāvyabhicārī niścita iti śaṅkāvakāśaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:3629: atha kadācit pratipattā pravṛtto vyabhicāraṃ paśyati /
XXbsa075_u:3634: yadyevaṃ dvicandrādau cakṣurādipratyakṣaṃ malinapauruṣamupalabdhamiti ghaṭādikamapi nopasthāpayediti cet /
XXbsa075_u:3640: na caivaṃ dhūmādau pārthivatvādau ca vyāptigrāhakasya bhūyodarśanasya lakṣaṇabhedo yenaikatrāśvāsaḥ syāt //
XXbsa075_u:3643: ghaṭādijñānasya hyarthakāryatvavivāde pramāṇāntarato 'rthakriyālābhato vā niścayaḥ, na pratijñāmātreṇa
XXbsa075_u:3645: suhṛddvayasyeva sātyayo gṛhīta iti saṃśaye sadātanasahacāraprasādhakapramāṇāntarasaṅgatirasti, tatkāryaṃ vā kiñcidupalabhyate /
XXbsa075_u:3646: tarhi bādhyamānatvābādhyamānatvalakṣaṇo lakṣaṇabhedo bhaviṣyatītyapi na vaktavyam, avyabhicāragrāhakasya bhūyodarśanasya bādhitatvāsiddheḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3648: pramāṇāntarasaṅgatirarthakriyālābho vā paryudāsaścāsiddha iti na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3650: niyatatvābhāve 'pi pārthivatvādau bhūyodarśanasaṃbhavāditi na bhūyodarśanagamyā vyāptiḥ //
XXbsa075_u:3654: yadvi yatra jñāne pratibhāsate tad grāhyam /
XXbsa075_u:3660: tataśca sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇāpekṣayā rūparasagandhasparśasamudāyātmakasya ghaṭasya rūpabhedamātragrahaṇe 'pi pratyakṣataḥ samudāyasiddhivyavasthā /
XXbsa075_u:3667: na ca manasā tajjātīyānāṃ vyāptigrahaḥ śakyaḥ, manaso bahirasvātantryāt /
XXbsa075_u:3669: na ca vahnivyabhicāre dhūma upādhirahitaṃ āṃbandhamatikrāmediti vaktumucitam,
XXbsa075_u:3671: yadapi vācaspatijalpitam, yo yatropādhinā niyatastatra tasya svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3674: yasyādarśanataḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho vyavasthāpanīyaḥ, sa khalu dhūmasvarūpādarthāntaramupādhirvaktavyo yathā dahanādindhanam /
XXbsa075_u:3675: arthāntaraṃ ca kiñcid dṛśyamadṛśyaṃ ca kiñcit, na tu sarvameva
XXbsa075_u:3677: tataśca dhūmasyāpi hutāśane syādupādhiḥ, na copalabhyate ityupādhimātrānupalabdhiranaikāntikī
XXbsa075_u:3682: vyabhicārasya sarvadeśakālayoḥ saṃbhave 'pi dṛśyatve 'pi sarvadā sarvatra sarveṇa
XXbsa075_u:3685: nanu yadi dhūmasyāpekṣaṇīyamarthāntaramupādhiḥ syāt kathaṃ dhūma ityeva pāvakasattāniyama iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:3686: nanvidameva cintyate kiṃ dhūme satyavaśyamagniḥ saṃbhavīna veti /
XXbsa075_u:3687: kadācidarthāntaramupādhimapekṣya dhūmo 'pi syānnāgniriti kimatra niṣṭabdhaṃ kāraṇam /
XXbsa075_u:3688: tasmāt pāvakaparādhīnodayo dhūmaḥ pariniṣṭhitaḥ kathaṃ tadabhāve bhāvaṃ svīkuryādityeva sādhu
XXbsa075_u:3689: atha vyaktau jātau vā vahnivyabhicāro na dṛṣṭaḥ, kathaṃ tatra śaṅkayata
XXbsa075_u:3691: tat kiṃ sthāṇuvyaktau jātau vā puruṣatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yena sthāṇau śaṅkayate /
XXbsa075_u:3693: ihāpyanyatra bhūyaḥ sahacāriṇi pārthivatvādau dṛṣṭa eva vyabhicāraḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3694: yatraiva tu yat saṃśayyate tatraiva tasya darśanamapekṣyata ityalaukikam /
XXbsa075_u:3695: yadi dhūmavyaktau vyabhicāro dṛṣṭastadā dhūmasāmānyaṃ vyāptau bahirbhūtameva,
XXbsa075_u:3697: atha jātau dṛṣṭastadāpi vyabhicāraniścaya eva, kathaṃ saṃśayaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3698: ato dhūmajātāvadṛśyamāno 'pi vyabhicāra upādhirvā darśanāyogyatayā niṣeddhumaśakya iti saṃśayo durvāraprasaraḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3699: sa cedānīmupādhervyabhicārasya vā saṃśayaḥ svābhāvikatvasaṃśayasvabhāvaḥ svābhāvikatvaniścayaṃ tāvadavaśyaṃ pratibadhnāti /
XXbsa075_u:3700: tasmāt svābhāvikatvaniścayapratibandha evārthataḥ, niścayamantareṇa gamakasya svayamakiñcitkaratvāt
XXbsa075_u:3701: tadevamupādhyanupalabdhirvyabhicārasyānupalabdhirvānaikāntikī na tayorabhāvaṃ sādhayati, yataḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatvasiddhiḥ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:3703: yathā dahano nendhanena vinā dhūmena saṃbadhyate tathā dhūmo 'pi na tena vināgninā saṃbadhyata iti samānamupādhitvamindhanasyobhayatra /
XXbsa075_u:3705: asiddhasya tu dhūmasya tannimittātmalābhatayāvyabhicārāt svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha iti vyavasthā pyata iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:3711: yasya tu sakṛttadutpattipratītireva sarvatrāvyabhicārapratītistasya nāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3714: bhūya ityapariniṣṭhitavārasaṃkhyatvāt kiyatā darśanena lakṣaṇānusārī nirvṛtimāsādayet /
XXbsa075_u:3716: yadāhuḥ prāgadṛṣṭau kramāt paśyan vetti hetuphalasthitim /
XXbsa075_u:3721: na hi dṛśyamāno ghaṭaḥ kalpita ucyate /
XXbsa075_u:3722: na ca sandihyamāna upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatvaṃ pratibadhnātīti yuktam, sādhakabādhakābhāva eva saṃśayasya
XXbsa075_u:3726: pramāṇaviṣaye 'pi śaṅkā kartuṃ śakyata iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:3728: svīkṛtapramāṇasya hi niścayaphalatvāt pramāṇasyāvipratipannapramāṇaviṣaye niścayasvīkāranāntarīyaka eva tatsvīkāraḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3732: na ca prāmāṇikalolayātrākṣatiḥ, prāmāṇikaireva pramāṇābhāve saṃśayasya
XXbsa075_u:3734: yathādarśanamāśaṅkanīyamityādyapi siddhasādhanam, anyatra dṛṣṭasyaivopādhervyabhicārasya vā śaṅkitatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:3741: yatra tadutpattisāmagrīṃ hṛdayena dūrīkṛtyānyataḥ sahacaritadvayād viśeṣaṃṇa pratītau pratyupāya eva devīyān /
XXbsa075_u:3744: kena punaḥ pramāṇena eṣa svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyata ityādistadgrahaṇaprakāraḥ pūrvameva nirākṛtaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3745: tathā svābhāvikatvāsiddhau svabhāvataśca pratibaddhā hetava ityādyupasaṃhāropi manorājyamātram
XXbsa075_u:3747: tadevaṃ svābhāvikavādena hṛdayānulepanamaśucineva parihāryaṃ dūrata iti /
XXbsa075_u:3756: tathā hi sa evāyaṃ ghaṭasphaṭikādiriti pratyabhijñākhyaṃ pratyakṣamudīyamānaṃ sthairyamutthāpayati
XXbsa075_u:3758: aprāmāṇyaṃ hi bhavadaprāmāṇyakāraṇopapattyā vā bhavet, prāmāṇyalakṣaṇavirahād vā /
XXbsa075_u:3759: yadyādyaḥ pakṣaḥ kimaprāmāṇyakāraṇam, mithyātvamajñānaṃ saṃśayo vā /
XXbsa075_u:3761: mithyātvaṃ hi tadviṣaye bādhakapratyayād vā hetūtthadoṣato vā saṃbhāvyeta /
XXbsa075_u:3764: na cānavagatāpi bādhā kadācidapi bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkā yuktimatī, nirbījaśaṅkānupapatteḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3766: iti dattāvakāśā saṃśayapiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstīti nāyaṃ kvacitpravarteta /
XXbsa075_u:3771: bṛhaṭṭīkāyāmapi utprekṣeta hi yo mohādajñātamapi bādhakam /
XXbsa075_u:3782: nanu pratyakṣe 'pi bādhake kasmānna bhavati parasparapratibandhena dvayorapyapratyakṣatā /
XXbsa075_u:3791: na hi tadevedaṃ syād vā na veti sphaṭikādiṣūdayati matiḥ,kiṃ tu tadevedaṃ sphaṭikādikamiti
XXbsa075_u:3795: yadeva hi utpannamasandigdhamaduṣṭakāraṇajanyaṃ deśakālanarāntareṣvabādhitaṃ ca tadeva pramāṇamiti naḥ siddhāntaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3796: taduktam tasmād dṛḍhaṃ yadutpannaṃ na visaṃvādamṛcchati /
XXbsa075_u:3804: tathā hi sa iti saṃskārakāryam, ayamiti cendriyakāryam /
XXbsa075_u:3806: tathā satyapi sphaṭikaḥ sphaṭika iti vyapadeśābhede pūrvadeśakālasaṃbandhāparadeśakālasaṃbandhābhyāṃ viruddhadharmābhyāṃ yogāt sphaṭikaḥ pūrvāparakālayorbhidyata iti viṣayabhedo vaktavyaḥ tathā sa iti parokṣam, ayamiti sākṣātkāraḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3807: na cānayoḥ svabhāvaviruddhayordahanatuhinayoriva śakyā śakreṇāpyekatā āpādayitum, trailokasyaikyaprasaṅgāt
XXbsa075_u:3810: tasmāt pratyabhijñā ekatvaṃ sthāpayati bhāvānāmiti manorathamātram //
XXbsa075_u:3814: kevalamasamartham, yadyapi saṃskāramātram, saṃskārasadhrīcīnaṃ tu indriyaṃ
XXbsa075_u:3816: na hi nājījanad bījamātramaṅkuramiti mṛdādisahitamapi na janayati /
XXbsa075_u:3818: parasparanānātvam, na tadavacchinnasya padmarāgasya, tasya tābhyāṃ tatsaṃsargābhyāṃ cānyatvāt
XXbsa075_u:3828: tattedantādhikaraṇamekamābhyāmanuraktaṃ sphaṭikaṃ gocarayadabhinnaṃ nānubhūyate nāvasīyate vā /
XXbsa075_u:3831: na ca sa iti pūrvadeśakālasaṃsargo 'yamiti ca sannihitadeśakālasaṃsargaṃ ekasya
XXbsa075_u:3832: virudhyate, yato yuktaṃ yatpadmarāgasya svarūpe paricchidyamāne tadabhāvo
XXbsa075_u:3833: vyavacchidyata iti tadavyavacchede tatsvarūpāparicchedāt svapracyutivyavacchedyasvabhāvatvāt padmarāgabhāvasya tadanavacchede tatparicchedānupapatteḥ //
XXbsa075_u:3838: yatra tarhi tatastādātmyapratītiḥ, na tatra tadavinābhāvaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3840: padmarāga iti deśakālāvasthānugatamekaṃ padmarāgamavabhāsayantī sākṣātkāravatī pratītiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3845: atha keśakuśakadalīstambādau satyapi bhede pratyabhijñānamutpannamiti cet
XXbsa075_u:3856: saṃśayamātraṃ tu vyavahārocchedakatvānnāśrayaṇīyamevati pratipāditamiti na tṛtīyo 'pio pakṣaḥ
XXbsa075_u:3857: kiṃ ca keśādau yadi pratyabhijñā vyabhicāriṇo, kāryakāraṇapratītiḥ kiṃ na
XXbsa075_u:3859: yā vyabhicāriṇo sā kāryakāraṇapratītireva na bhavatīti cet
XXbsa075_u:3860: / yadyevaṃ yā visaṃvādinī sā pratyabhijñaiva na bhavati tadābhāsatvāditi samānam /
XXbsa075_u:3864: tadiyaṃ pratyabhijñā anekadeśakālāvasthāsaṃbaddhamekaṃ sphaṭikādikaṃ gocarayantī sthairyaṃ vyavasthāpayati //
XXbsa075_u:3878: yathā yastvayā dṛṣṭo nīlo 'rthaḥ sa eva mayā dṛṣṭa iti nīlo 'rthaḥ
XXbsa075_u:3882: pūrvaṃ pratyayasya dharmitā, adhunā bhāvānāmiti viśeṣaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3885: vivādāspadībhūtā bhāvā yathāsvaṃ vināśahetusannidheḥ prāṅ na vināśinaḥ,
XXbsa075_u:3891: sahetukavināśatvaṃ ca ghaṭasyāgnidhūmayoriva pratyakṣānupalambhato mudgaravināśayorapi kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau siddham /
XXbsa075_u:3901: kāraṇavattvasya sādhyaviparyaye vṛttiśaṅkā vināśasya sahetukatvameva nivartayatīti prasiddhavyāptikāt kāraṇavattvādakṣaṇikatvasiddhiriti //
XXbsa075_u:3907: na khalu kṣaṇikatve kasyacitprameyatvaṃ sidhyati, kṣaṇasthitidharmaṇaḥ pramāṇakāle 'pātāt
XXbsa075_u:3919: tadaiva bhāvo 'sti na pūrvaṃ na praścādityapi śabdaḥ kṣaṇikaparyāyatveneṣyamāṇaḥ
XXbsa075_u:3920: kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ sattvāvicchedopajananamantareṇa nārthavān devairapi śakyaḥ parikalpayitum /
XXbsa075_u:3926: nivṛttiparityāge ca janmino bhāvā nityā iti durnivāraḥ prasaṅgaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3931: yasmādarthaṃ kañcit prāpayat pratyakṣaṃ tena pratyāsannatvātprāpayati /
XXbsa075_u:3935: sā ca niyatavastupratibhāsākṣiptā kāryakāraṇabhāvalakṣaṇā pratyāsattistulyakālaṃ pramāṇaprameyayoranupapannā,
XXbsa075_u:3940: 'nupapannamiti vyāpakānupalabdhyā vipakṣāt kṣaṇikatvād vyāvartamānaṃ prameyatvamakṣaṇikatvena vyāpyata iti asandigdho vyatirekaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3943: tathā hi kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇaṃ kramayaugapadyagrahaṇasmaraṇam abhilāṣaḥ svayaṃnihitapratyanumārgaṇaṃ duṣṭārthakutūhalaviramaṇaṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhaḥ saṃśayapūrvakanirṇayaḥ bandhamokṣaḥ mokṣaprayatnaḥ śubhodarke karmaṇi pravṛttiḥ pratyabhijñā kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ upādānopādeyabhāvaprabhṛtayaḥ sthirasattāmantareṇānupapadyamānāḥ sthairya sādhayanti /
XXbsa075_u:3944: pratikṣaṇaṃ bhede satyanubhaviturvinaṣṭatve 'nyasya kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇādyanupapatteriti kathaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaśaṅkāpi //
XXbsa075_u:3946: apramāṇamevāyaṃ pratyabhijñākhyo vikalpo mithyātvaṃ ca sadviṣayatvabādhakapratyayāt /
XXbsa075_u:3950: saṃvādaśaithilye tu bādhakapratyakṣavadanumānamapi prāptāvakāśam, pramāṇasyaiva siddhibādhayoradhikārāt
XXbsa075_u:3951: tathā hi māyākāraḥ śirasi nimajjitaṃ golakamāsyena niḥsārayatīti pratyabhijñā śirasi cchidraprasaṅgasaṅgatenānumānena bādhyamānā pratītaiva /
XXbsa075_u:3953: yathāvanatākāśapratibhāsaḥ sarvasaṃpratipattāvapi bādhya eva tadvadekatāgrahaḥ sarvasaṃpratipattāvapi bādhyo 'stu /
XXbsa075_u:3960: nanūktaṃ yā vyabhicāriṇī sā na pratyabhijñetyādi /
XXbsa075_u:3964: tathā yadi pratyabhijñāne 'pi lakṣaṇabhedo darśitaḥ syāt, darśayituṃ ( Nibandh 117.) vā śakyo vyabhicārāvyabhicāropayogī, tadā bhavatu pratyabhijñātadābhāsayorvivekaḥ
XXbsa075_u:3965: na tvevamasti, sarvatrātyantasadṛśe vastuni pṛthagjanapratyabhijñāyā ekarasatvāt //
XXbsa075_u:3968: aliṅgasya hi vikalpasya saṃvādo nāma pramāṇāntarasaṅgatirarthakriyāprāptirvā /
XXbsa075_u:3970: pakṣaḥ, paścādapi sa evāyamiti svatantraikādhyavasāyamātrādaparasya pramāṇagandhasyāpyabhāvāt
XXbsa075_u:3972: na hi pūrvāparakālayorekavastupratibaddhā siddhā kācidarthakriyāḥ, bhinnenāpi tatsamānaśaktinā tādṛgarthakriyāyāḥ karaṇāvirodhāt /
XXbsa075_u:3973: tathā hi yathaiko ghaṭo vāri dhārayatīti tatkālabhāvino 'pyanyasya deśāntaravartino na vāridhāraṇavāraṇam tathā dvitīyādikṣaṇopyanyo yadi vāri dhārayati, kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:3976: nanu yadyekaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ bisaṃvādi dṛṣṭamiti sarvameva pratyabhijñānaṃ visaṃvādi śaṅkyate, tadaikamindriyajñānaṃ keśoṇḍukadvicandrādau visaṃvādyupalabdhamiti ghaṭādiṣvapi sarvameva pratyakṣaṃ visaṃvādi saṃbhāvyatām, indriyajanyatvasyaikalakṣaṇasya sarvatra saṃbhavāditi cet /
XXbsa075_u:3982: dvicandrādau tvarthavinākṛtena timirādiviplutacakṣuirmātreṇa tajjñānaṃ janitamiti pratyakṣābhāsameva
XXbsa075_u:3983: dvicandrādyarthābhāvastu deśakālanarāntarairdvicandrāderarthasya bādhitatvādavyāhata iti pratyakṣābhāsaparihāre 'pi pratyakṣeṣu ka āścāsavirodhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3986: yathā hi pūrvaṃ pāvakādau pākādikriyā pratibaddhā siddhā paścādanubhūyamānā dahanajñānasya saṃvādamāvedayati, anyathā bāhyārthocchedānnirīhaṃ jagajjāyate, na tathā prathamacaramakālayorekīmāvapratibaddhā kācidarthakriyā upalabdhigocarā
XXbsa075_u:3989: tadiyamanumānabādhitatvād vyabhicāraśaṅkākalaṅkitatvāccana pratyakṣamanumānaṃ veti kathamataḥ sthairyasiddhiranumānapratihatirvā //
XXbsa075_u:3990: yat punarvācaspatirūvāca saṃskārendriyayormilitayoreva pratyabhijñānaṃ prati kāraṇatvamiti, tadayuktam, bhinnasāmagrīprasūtatvādanayorjñānayoḥ /
XXbsa075_u:3991: tathā hi nimīlite cakṣuṣi sa ityatrendriyavinākṛtasyaiva saṃskārasya sāmarthyamupalabdham
XXbsa075_u:3995: bījakṣityādyostu pṛthak sāmarthyaṃ na dṛṣṭamityekaiva sāmagrītyaṅkuro
XXbsa075_u:3998: viruddhayordharmayoḥ padmarāgādanyatve 'pi viruddhadharmayogāt padmarāgasya bhedaḥ kathamapahnayate, trailokyaikatvaprasaṅgasya durvāratvāt /
XXbsa075_u:3999: na hi dharmadharmiṇoranyatve 'pi brāhmaṇatvacāṇḍālatve ekādhāre bhavitumarhata iti padmarāgasya bhedo duratikramaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4006: sa e vāyamiti tu pratyabhijñānasya sa ityaspaṣṭākārayogitvam, ayamiti spaṣṭākārayogitvamiti viruddhadharmadvayaṃ bhedakam //
XXbsa075_u:4007: na caivaṃ vaktavyam tattedantāpekṣayā pratyabhijñānasyāpyekasyaiva pārokṣyāpārokṣyamaviruddhamiti
XXbsa075_u:4010: yāvadatītārthākārānukāro vartamānārthānukāraśca svadharmo na bhavati tāvattadarthagocarataiva nāsti /
XXbsa075_u:4014: yatpunaratroktam sahetukavināśatvaṃ ghaṭasyāgnidhūmayoriva pratyakṣānupalambhato mudgaraghaṭavināśayorapi kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau siddhamiti, tadasaṅgatam,
XXbsa075_u:4015: agnidhūmayordvayorapi dṛśyatvāt, pratyakṣānupalambhato dhūmasya vahnikāryatā sidhyatu /
XXbsa075_u:4018: yadāhurguravaḥ dṛṣṭastāvadayaṃ ghaṭo 'tra ca patan dṛṣṭastathā mudgaro dṛṣṭā karparasaṃhatiḥ paramato nāśo na dṛṣṭaḥ paraḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4019: tenābhāva iti śrutiḥ kva nihitā kiṃ vātra tatkāraṇaṃ svādhīnā palighasya kevalamiyaṃ dṛṣṭā kapālāvaliḥ //
XXbsa075_u:4021: yatpunarasminnadṛśyamāne 'pi dṛśyata iti vāgjālaṃ sā bhaṇḍavidyā /
XXbsa075_u:4023: tathā hi kasyacit pratibhāsena sādhyate 'pratibhāsi yat /
XXbsa075_u:4026: athaivaṃ vaktavyam kimanyena dhvaṃsena, karparameva ghaṭadhvaṃso 'stu,
XXbsa075_u:4027: tathā ca sati mudgarādyabhāve karparābhāvāt ghaṭasthairyamavyāhatamiti /
XXbsa075_u:4029: tathā hi yathā nāśaśabdena karparamucyate tathā yadyabhāvaśabdenāpi karparamevocyate tadaikatra pradeśe ghaṭamekamapanīya ghaṭāntaranyāse tatrāpanītaghaṭasyābhāvavyavahāro na syāt,
XXbsa075_u:4033: pracyutimātrāpekṣayaiva pratikṣaṇamanyānyatvavyavahāro ghaṭasya sidhyatīti kutaḥ sthairyasiddhiḥ
XXbsa075_u:4036: yadāhurguravaḥ āstāṃ karparapaṃktireva kalaśadhvaṃso na ceyaṃ purā tena sthairyamapi prasidhyatu tato bhinnena nāśena kim /
XXbsa075_u:4038: nāśaḥ saiva yathocyate yadi tathābhāvo 'pi kumbhāntar anyāse 'bhāvavacaḥ kathaṃ matamataḥ sidhyatyabhāvo 'pi na //
XXbsa075_u:4040: nanu yadi svahetujanito nāśo nāsti, kathaṃ kvacideva deśe kāle ghaṭo naṣṭa
XXbsa075_u:4042: na ca mudgarādanyo nāśasya heturvaktavyaḥ, prāgapi nāśasaṃbhave naṣṭaghaṭabuddhisaṃbhavaprasaṅgāt
XXbsa075_u:4043: yadāhuḥ nāśo nāsti yadi svahetuniyataḥ kiṃ deśakāle kvacit kumbho naṣṭa iti pratītiniyamastenāsti kāryaśca saḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4044: nāpyanyat kila kāraṇaṃ rayavato daṇḍātpurāpyanyathā nāśoktā na kṛtā vinaṣṭaghaṭadhīḥ kenoddhurā vāryate //
XXbsa075_u:4047: tathā ca sati dhūmāgnivat pratyakṣataḥ pradhvaṃsasya mudgarādikāryatvaṃ siddhamityutphullagallamullapitaṃ vyāluptam //
XXbsa075_u:4048: na cārthāpattito 'pi tatsiddhiḥ saṃdyapate, kumbho naṣṭa iti
XXbsa075_u:4050: vināśaṃ vināpi hi ghaṭadarśanavato mudgarakṛtakapālānubhava evanaṣṭaghaṭāvasāyasādhanaḥ, kimapareṇa nāśena kartavyam, ghaṭo naṣṭa iti
XXbsa075_u:4053: mudgarābhāve karparapaṃkterevābhāvāt kathaṃ prāgapi naṣṭaghaṭabuddhiprasaṅgaḥ saṃgato nāma
XXbsa075_u:4057: sāmagryāmiha nāśanāma na kimapyaṅgaṃ na cāsyāmapi syādeṣā na kadāpi nāpi ca purāpyeṣā samagrā sthitiḥ //
XXbsa075_u:4058: arthāpattirato gatā kṣayamiyaṃ na dhvaṃsasiddhau prabhuḥ // iti //
XXbsa075_u:4059: yadi nāśānubhavo nāsti kapālānubhavāt kapālakalpanaiva syāt, na naṣṭaghaṭabuddhiriti cet /
XXbsa075_u:4065: tadasat, yataḥ svabuddhyā rajyate yena viśeṣyaṃ tadviśeṣaṇam /
XXbsa075_u:4077: nanu na dhvaṃsena vinā vinaśyati jagad bhāvena sārdhaṃ sacet saccāsacca kimastu vastuniyataṃ bhāvānujo 'sau tataḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4078: bhāvāt tena tu bhinnakāraṇatayā tatkāraṇāsaṃbhave 'bhāvāttena kṛtānyatāpi galitā bhaṅgaḥ kuto 'nukṣaṇam //
XXbsa075_u:4084: tadā kaḥ punarbhāvasya pradveṣo yena pradhvaṃsākhye vastuni svahetorutpanne nivartate nāma
XXbsa075_u:4085: yatpunaretaducyate - nābhāvasyotpāde bhāvasyāparā nivṛttiḥ, kiṃ tvabhāvotpattireva tannivṛttiriti
XXbsa075_u:4087: atra svabhāvabhedairuttaraṃ vācyam ye parasparaparihārasthitayaḥ svahetubhyo jāyante /
XXbsa075_u:4088: na hi svato 'nyasyāṅkurasya vahnirna kāraṇamityanyatvāviśeṣād bhasmano 'pi na kāraṇam /
XXbsa075_u:4090: yathā cotpādasya purastādakhilasāmarthyarahitasyāṅkuraprāgabhāvasyāpakāraṃ kañcidakurvanto 'pi bījādayo 'ṅkuramārabhamāṇāḥ prāgabhāvaṃ nivartayanti,
XXbsa075_u:4095: taducitaṃ syād yadi kāryakāraṇayorivāsyā pyātmā pramāṇapratītaḥ syāt, kevalaṃ dṛśyānupalambhagraste 'pyetasminnupalabhyata iti pralāpo vyaktamiyaṃ
XXbsa075_u:4097: arthāpattirapi kṣīṇetyapi prāgabhāvasya ca dṛṣṭāntatvenopanyāso bhaṇḍālekhyanyāyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4098: kiṃ ca kaḥ punaratra virodhaḥ sahasthānābhāvo yadi tava virodho 'rthavipadoḥ
XXbsa075_u:4100: sa ca dhvaṃso dhvaṃsāntaramupanayan saṃprati bhaved virodhī so 'pyanyaṃ kṣayamiti na nāśaḥ kathamapi //
XXbsa075_u:4101: anyathā siddhasattāmātreṇa virodhitve sarvaṃ sarveṇa viruddhaṃ prasajyeta
XXbsa075_u:4103: athānyonyābhāvaprakṛtikatayārthe sato tadā kṣayasyaivābhāvaḥ saha bhavatu vā hetubalataḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4104: anena dhvaṃse ca prakṛtahatirasya tvanudaye balīyānevārthaḥ svayamapacaye 'nyena kimiha //
XXbsa075_u:4105: saccāsacca kimastu vastviti tu prasaṅgaḥ trilocanaprastāve nirākaraṇīyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4106: ata evātra prastāve bhuvanaikagurūn bhagavataḥ kīrtipādānavamanyamānaḥ śaṅkaraḥ paśorapipaśuriti kṛpāpātramevaiṣa jālmaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4108: yā hi tasya prāktanī kācidavasthā bhavadbhirarthakriyānirvartanayogyā dṛṣṭā saiva yadyuttarakālamapyanuvartate tarhi svarūpeṇaiva nivṛtto bhāvaḥ kathamavasthāpyate /
XXbsa075_u:4109: tadānīmayaṃ naṣṭo nāma yadi svahetupratilabdhasvarūpavyatirekiṇī tasya kācidavasthotpadyeta, utpattau saiva tasyātmāntaraṃ jātamityatādavasthyamevāsya vināśaṃ brūmaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4110: tādavasthye tādātmye ca svarūpeṇa nivṛtto bhāva ityasya śabdasya satyamarthaṃ na vidmaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4111: svarūpanivṛttiḥ khalviyaṃ bhavantī bhāva eva syāt, bhāvādanyā vā /
XXbsa075_u:4118: tathā hi svakāraṇādeva yathānyadeśavicchinnarūpaḥ samudeti bhāvaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4122: yathā hi deśāntaraparāvṛttamanīlādiparāvṛttaṃ ca svahetorutpannaṃ vastu tathā dvitīyakṣaṇāntaraparāvṛttamapi
XXbsa075_u:4123: yathā cānyadeśānavasthāyitvaṃ taddeśāvasthāyitvenāviruddham, viruddhaṃ ca deśāntarāvasthāyitvenaiva
XXbsa075_u:4131: paramārthatastu dharmidharmayostādātmyaṃ vyāvṛttikṛto bhedavyavahāra iti apohasiddhau prasādhitam
XXbsa075_u:4133: etāvati tu tattve vākchalamātrapravṛttā dveṣaviṣajvalitātmānaḥ kṣudrāḥ pralapantīti kimatra brūmaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4134: tataśca vyatiriktanivṛttyutpattimantareṇa svarūpanivṛtterupapatteḥ kathaṃ kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ prāktanasattāvasthitiḥ
XXbsa075_u:4136: naṣṭavyavahāramātramastu, na tvasyānyat kiñcij jāyeta, bhāvasya tādavasthyaprasaṅgāt /
XXbsa075_u:4140: nanu keyaṃ vācoyuktiḥ, abhāvavyavahāramātramiṣyate paścānnābhāva iti /
XXbsa075_u:4142: abhāvaśca mithyeti bhāva eva pratiṣedhyasya syāt /
XXbsa075_u:4143: sa cābhāvaḥ paścā(d) bhavatīti sphuṭataramasya kādācitkatvātsahetukatvam, vastutvaṃ ceti /
XXbsa075_u:4147: na ca vastvantare pratipādite pratīte vā ghaṭādi vastubhūtamiti pratipāditaṃ pratītaṃ ( Nibandh 123.) vā bhavati /
XXbsa075_u:4148: evaṃ vastvantarameva nāśa iti asmin mate yad dūṣaṇamuktaṃ tat svayameva parihṛtaṃ syāditi, tadapyasaṃbaddham, kevalaṃ hi bhūtalamasya viṣaya iti kathaṃ na ghaṭāderabhūtatvabodhaḥ yaiva hi ghaṭādyapekṣayā kaivalyāvasthā pradeśasya sa eva ghaṭavirahaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4151: na ceha ghaṭo nāstīti pratyayasya ghaṭavatyapi pradeśe prasaṅgaḥ,
XXbsa075_u:4153: na ca pratyabhijñānataḥ saghaṭāghaṭapradeśayorekatvam, pūrvamasya nirākaraṇāt /
XXbsa075_u:4157: siddhe ceyaṃ cintā, yadi hetornityo 'nityo vārtho jātaḥ kiṃ nāśakāraṇeneti hetupuraskāreṇaiva pravṛtteḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4168: yo hi naśvarasvabhāvaḥ sa eva nāśoḥ, naśyatīti bahulādhikārāt kartari ghañaḥ prasādhanāt, taṃ nāśaṃ bhāvasvabhāvamicchāmaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4169: naśanaṃ nāśa iti tu prasajyātmā dvidhā kartavyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4170: tattvatastāvad vastutvavirahāt tattvānyatvavirahita evāsau bhāvo na bhavatīti tadbhāvaniṣedhamātrapātaṃ tu bhavati kharaśṛṅgādivat /
XXbsa075_u:4171: saṃvṛtau tu yathā kālabhedena vikalpyamānaḥ kādācitka iva pratibhāti tathā sarvopākhyāviraharūpatayā bhāvādbhinna iva pratibhātīti nāvastutvopalakṣaṇabhedākhyānavirodhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4172: evaṃ ca sati saṃvṛttyā lakṣaṇabhede bhāvābhāvayorbhedasyeṣṭatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:4173: tatvena ca lakṣaṇaikatāvirahe bhāvasya tenaikyaniṣedhāt kathamadvaitaprasaṅgopālambhaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:4178: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo hi saṅkalpāruḍhe rūpe bāhyārthasparśe vikalpaśabdaliṅgāntarāṇāṃ vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāditi śāstre vistareṇa pratipādanāt /
XXbsa075_u:4180: yathā śilāputrakasya śarīram, śarīre karaṇādayaḥ, lambakarṇo devadatta ityādi /
XXbsa075_u:4182: abhinne 'pi bhāve bhedavivakṣāpekṣo bhedavyavahāraḥ kathaṃ bhedaniyatamātmānamātanotu //
XXbsa075_u:4183: skhaladgatirayaṃ rāhoḥ śira ityādinirdeśa iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:4184: yadi satyametat, tadā śiro 'tiriktasya rāhoriva kṣmātalāderatiriktasya vivekasya
XXbsa075_u:4185: dṛśyānupalambhabādhitatvādayamapi nirdeśaḥ skhaladgatireva, tathāpi neti koṣapānaṃ pramāṇam
XXbsa075_u:4186: tasmātsaghaṭāt ( Nibandh 124.) pradeśāntarāt pradeśa evāyamanyo ghaṭaviviktaḥ svahetorutpanno na tu ghaṭavivekena viśeṣitaḥ, svahetorutpannasya viviktasyābhāve vivekasyābhāvāt /
XXbsa075_u:4187: kiṃ ca vyāptaṃ bhidā yadi viśeṣyaviśeṣa(ṇa)tvaṃ bhedātyayānnanu tadā tadabhāva
XXbsa075_u:4189: deśo viśiṣṭa iti cāsti yathā tathedamapyasti dṛśyamatabhedadṛgasti neti //
XXbsa075_u:4191: tadevaṃ sahetukavināśatvāditi hetuḥ svarūpāsiddha iti sthitam //
XXbsa075_u:4194: na cāsya viparyaye vṛttiśaṅkā nāśasya sahetukatvameva nivartayati, uktakrameṇa nāśasyaivābhāvāditi
XXbsa075_u:4202: tataśca kāraṇatvād yadi nāma prameyatvasya pūrvakālasattvena vyāptistathāpi prameyatvavat pūrvakālasattvamapi kṣaṇike 'viruddhamiti prameyatvākṣaṇikatvayorvyāptisādhano vyāpakānupalambho 'siddhaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4208: iyaṃ ca pratyāsattiranantarātīte 'pi kṣaṇe 'kṣīṇeti na dvitīyakṣaṇānuvṛtteranurodha ityuktam
XXbsa075_u:4218: idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vedamityadhyavasāyo yatrārthe sa viṣaya iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:4221: sa cedupavarṇayituṃ na śakyate, vyavahāro 'pi tvanmate niyato na syāditi brūmaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4228: ādye pakṣe sarvaṃ sarvasya vedanaṃ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:4230: kiṃ ca sārūpyādarthavedane 'nantaraṃ jñānaṃ tulyaviṣayaṃ viṣayaḥ syāditi cet /
XXbsa075_u:4233: ata eva sthūlagataṃ paramāṇugataṃ vā sārūpyaṃ na cintyate /
XXbsa075_u:4237: na cātra sarvavedanaprasaṅgaḥ, sarveṣāṃ jñānaṃ pratyajanakatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:4249: tathā hi upādānopādeyabhāvasthitacittasantatimapyāśrityeyaṃ vyavasthā sustheti kathamātmānaṃ pratyujjīvayatu /
XXbsa075_u:4251: tathāpi prāgbhāvivastuniścayajñānasyopādeyabhūtena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa paścādbhāvivastujñānenāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti niścayo janyate /
XXbsa075_u:4252: tathā prāgbhāvivastvapekṣayā kevalabhūtalaniścāyakajñānopādeyabhūtena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa paścādbhāvivastvapekṣayā kevalabhūtalaniścāyakajñānenāsminnasatīdaṃ na
XXbsa075_u:4256: ata eva devadattenāgnau pratīte yajñadattena ca dhūme pratīte na kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇaṃ tajjñānayorupādānopādeyabhāvābhāvāt /
XXbsa075_u:4258: anyathā satyapi nityātmani pratisandhātari kāryakāraṇabhāvādīnāmapratītireva syāt /
XXbsa075_u:4259: tathā hi ātmanaḥ sakāśāt pratisandheyabuddhīnāmabhedo bhedo vā bhedābhedo vā /
XXbsa075_u:4260: prathamapakṣe ātmaiva syāt pratisandhātā, buddhya eva vā syuḥ pratisandheyā iti kaḥ pratisandhānārthaḥ
XXbsa075_u:4261: bhedapakṣa 'pi buddhibhyo bhidyamānasya jaḍasyātmanaḥ kaḥ pratisandhānārtha iti na vidmaḥ
XXbsa075_u:4263: buddhi reva tarhi draṣṭī pratisandhātrī cetī niyamasvīkāre tadyogādasya tathātvamiti kimanena yācitakamaṇḍanena /
XXbsa075_u:4266: yadi hi buddhirhetoḥ phalasya vā draṣṭrī syāt tadānantaryapratiniyamasya cānusandhātrī kalpitā
XXbsa075_u:4267: tadyogād draṣṭṛtvaṃ pratisandhātṛtvaṃ cocyata iti syādapi prativiṣayamalabdhaviśeṣāyāṃ ca buddhau saṃbandho 'pi na viśeṣaṃ vyavahārayitumīśaḥ - adhunā nibandhanādhigantā, adhunā phalasya, idānīṃ pratisandhāteti /
XXbsa075_u:4273: tathā hi nedamidamantareṇa yaducyate tat khalvanyatra pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ sāmarthyāvadhāraṇe sati yujyate vahneriva dhūme, cakṣurādivadvā dṛṣṭakāraṇāntarasāmagryā kāryādarśane paścād darśane ca
XXbsa075_u:4277: na hi kāraṇabuddhisamanantaraṃ kāryabuddhau satyāṃ niścayapravṛttasyedamasyānantaraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ mayeti pratisandhānamadṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kadācit yato 'nyasya sāmarthyaparikalpanaṃ syādityudasya vyāmohamuktakrameṇaiva kāryakāraṇagrahaṇavyavasthā svīkartavyā /
XXbsa075_u:4279: tataśca yadbhinnaṃ bhinnamevābhinnaṃ cābhinnamiti naikasya bhedābhedau /tathāpyabhede
XXbsa075_u:4281: evaṃ kramivastugrāhakaiḥ kramijñānairupādānopādeyabhūtaiḥ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa krameṇāmī jāyanta iti niścayo janyate /
XXbsa075_u:4282: aikakālikānekavastugrāhakaireva tajjñānairekopādānatvāt sakṛdimāni jātānīti vikalpaḥ kriyata iti kramākramagrahaṇamapyanavadyam /
XXbsa075_u:4286: na bhinnasaṃkhyā phalahetubādhinī na cānyasantānabhavā ivākṣamāḥ //
XXbsa075_u:4287: yadapyuktaṃ śaṅkareṇa pūrvottarakṣaṇayoḥ saṃvittīḥ, tābhyāṃ vāsanā, tayā hetuphalabhāvādhyavasāyī vikalpa iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:4301: tathā phalāvalokane 'pi tatkāryatā gṛhītaiva vikalpenānusandhīyata iti gṛhītānusandhānarūpa evāyaṃ vikalpa iti
XXbsa075_u:4303: yadāha mahābhāṣyālaṅkāraḥ yadi nāmaikamadhyakṣaṃ na pūrvāparavittimat /
XXbsa075_u:4306: dṛṣṭārthakutūhalaviramaṇam, karmaphalasaṃbandhaḥ, saṃśayapūrvakanirṇayaśca pūrvapūrvānubhavaikopādānakāraṇaiḥ samarpitasaṃskāragatairuttarottarārthānubhavaivopādeyabhūtairjanyamāno yujyata iti kimadhikenātmanā parikalpitena /
XXbsa075_u:4307: upādānopādeyabhāvaniyamādeva ca na santānāntare smaraṇādiprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4311: yathā mṛtsantānanivṛttyotpadyamānasya kumbhasya mṛdupādānamiti śāstre prapañcitam /
XXbsa075_u:4323: yataḥ satyapyātmanyahameva mukto bhaviṣyāmi sukhī cetyātmagrahaṇakṣaṇādadhyavasāyāt pravartate
XXbsa075_u:4325: / sa cānādyavidyāparamparāyātaḥ pūrvāparayorekatvāropako mithyāsaṅkalpo bādhite 'pyātmanyavyāhataprasara iti kathamapravṛttiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4333: jñātavatopyapratikriyaputrādimaraṇe sorastāḍamākrando maraṇādau ca yatnaḥ śokodrekāt evamavidyodrekādeva nairātmyaṃ jānannapi pravartate, na sukhamāsta iti kimatra kriyatām, avidyāyāḥ pravartanaśakteravāryatvāt pratyabhijñā ca pūrvameva dhvastā /
XXbsa075_u:4336: upādānopādeyatā ca kramisvasaṃvedanajñānadvayena sākṣātkṛtā tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā niścīyata iti,
XXbsa075_u:4337: asatyapyātmani pratisandhātari kāryakāraṇagrahaṇādaya upapadyamānā nātmānamupasthāpayituṃ prabhavanti /
XXbsa075_u:4338: ato 'rthāpattirati na kṣameti bhāgyahīnamanorājyamiva sthirasiddhirviśīryata eva /
XXbsa075_u:4346: iha khalu sakalajaḍapadārtharāśau pratyākhyāte nirākṛte ca nirākāravijñānavāde pratihate cālīkākārayogini pāramārthikaprakāśamātre samyagunmūlite ca sākāravijñānālīkatvasamārope pratisantānaṃ ca svapnavadabādhitadehabhogapratiṣṭhādyākāraprakāśamātrātmake jagati vyavasthite yasya yadā yāvadākāracakrapratibhāsaṃ yadvijñānaṃ parisphurati tasya tadā tāvadākāracakraparikaritaṃ tadvijñānaṃ citrādvaitamiti sthitiḥ
XXbsa075_u:4348: atra ca vipratipattirnāma kiṃ citratāyāmadvaite vijñānatve sarvatraiveti vikalpāḥ //
XXbsa075_u:4355: ata eva sarvatrāpi vimatirasaṅgatā, sākāravijñānasiddhāveva citrādvaitavādāvatārāt /
XXbsa075_u:4356: tasmāccitrateyamadvaitavirodhinīti vyāmohādekatva eva vipratiprattiriti tatra prasādhanaṃ sādhanamidamucyate //
XXbsa075_u:4360: na tāvadasyāsiddhirabhidhātuṃ śakyate, pratyakṣapramāṇaprasiddhasadbhāve vijñānātmakanīlādyākāracakre dharmiṇi prakāśamānatāyāḥ pratyakṣasiddhatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:4362: vicitrākāramadhyavartini nīlākāre dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi prakāśamānatālakṣaṇasya sādhanasya dṛṣṭatvāt
XXbsa075_u:4363: nanu caikatve sādhye yadaparamekatvādhikaraṇaṃ tadiha dṛṣṭāntīkartumucitam /
XXbsa075_u:4367: tataśca yathā citritākāracakrasyākārabhedato bhedastathā nīlākārasyāpi deśabhedato bhedaḥ
XXbsa075_u:4368: tadayaṃ sādhyaśūnyo dṛṣṭānto hetuśca vipakṣe paridṛśyamāno yadi tatraiva niyatastadā viruddhaḥ tatrāpi saṃbhave 'naikānta iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:4370: yadi deśabhedato vijñānātmakasthūlanīlākārasya bhedastadāsya pratiparamāṇudeśabhede bhedasaṃbhavātu paramāṇupracayamātrātmako vijñānātmakasthūlanīlākāraḥ syāt
XXbsa075_u:4374: na caivaṃ vaktavyam paramāṇūnāṃ svarūpanimagnatve 'pyekopādānatayā puñjātmaiva sthūlaḥ sthūlamātmānaṃ jñāsyatīti, satyapyekopādānatve svasvarūpanimagnatvādeva sthūlavyavasthāpakasya bhinnasyātmano 'nyonyaṃ vā grāhyagrāhakabhāvasyāyogāt /
XXbsa075_u:4377: na ca yathā bāhyārthavāde sthūlaikākārajñānapratibhāsa eva bāhyaparamāṇupracayapratibhāsavyavasthā gatyantarābhāvāt, tathā
XXbsa075_u:4381: tasmād yāvad yāvat pratibhāsastāvattāvat sthūlatayaiva vyāptaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4382: asthūle paramāṇau sthūlanivṛttimātre ca pratibhāsasya dṛśyānupalambhabādhitatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:4383: yathā prasiddhānumāne sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaṃ kramākramakāritvenāpi, kṣaṇikatvābhāvācca karmākramanivṛttau nivartamānaṃ kṣaṇikatve niyataṃ sidhyati, tathātrāpi prakāśamānatvaṃ sādhanamekatvenāpi sthaulyenāpi, ekatvābhāvācca vipakṣāt paramāṇupuñjātmana ekatvanivṛttimātrātmanaśca svaviruddhopalambhāt
XXbsa075_u:4384: sthaulyasya vyāpakasya nivṛttau nivartamānamekatvaṃ niyataṃ sidhyati /
XXbsa075_u:4385: tataśca yathā bahirvyāptipakṣe ghaṭe dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi viparyayabādhakapramāṇabalāt sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatvaniyatamavadhārya sattvāt pakṣe kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhiḥ, ta(thā) trāpi nīlākāre dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi
XXbsa075_u:4386: viparyayabādhakapramāṇabalādeva prakāśamānatvamekatvaniyatamavagamya prakāśamānatvād vicitrākāracakre sādhyadharmiṇyekatvasiddhiriti na dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyaśūnyatvam /
XXbsa075_u:4389: nanvekatve sādhye tatpracyutirdvitvaṃ ca vipakṣaḥ, tasmācca vipakṣāddhetuvyatirekapratipattyavasare kiṃ vipakṣātmā prakāśate na vā /
XXbsa075_u:4399: tatrāsarvajñe 'numātarisakalavipakṣapratibhāsābhāvānna grāhyatayā vipakṣo viṣayo vaktavyaḥ, sarvānumānocchedaprasaṅgāt, sarvatra sakalavipakṣapratibhāsābhāvāt tato vyatirekāsiddheḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4400: pratibhāse ca deśakālasvabhāvāntaritasakalavipakṣa sākṣātkāre sādhyātmāpi varākaḥ sutarāṃ pratīyata ityanumānavaiyarthyam /
XXbsa075_u:4405: na syāttadā vyatireko na niścīyata iti yuktam,
XXbsa075_u:4407: nanvasmanmate vastvavastvātmakasakalavipakṣapratipattisaṃbhavāt tato hetuvyatirekaḥ saṃpratyetuṃ śakyata eva /
XXbsa075_u:4414: / tathā hi dhūmādiravahnyādervipakṣād vyāvṛtto vahnyādiniyataḥ sidhyati,
XXbsa075_u:4415: tasya ca vastvavastvātmakasakalavipakṣapadārtharāśeḥ svarūpanirbhāsa iti kiṃ nirvikalpakajñāne kalpanāyāṃ vā /
XXbsa075_u:4418: kiṃ nirākāre jñāne sakalavipakṣādisvarūpasya sākṣāt sphuraṇam,
XXbsa075_u:4421: na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣo yuktaḥ, deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭānāṃ padārthānāmarvācīne jane nirākāre ca jñāne sphuraṇāyogādityasyārthasya śāstre eva vistareṇa prasādhanāt /
XXbsa075_u:4424: na ca tṛtīyaḥ saṅgataḥ, sādṛśyasaṃbhave 'pi samanantarabalādevāyātasya bāhyena saha pratyāsatterabhāvāt
XXbsa075_u:4425: na caturtho 'pi prakāra saṃbhavati, asatprakāśayorvirodhāt, sphurato
XXbsa075_u:4428: bhāsamāno vā ākāro 'san, san vā na kaścit khyātīti vivakṣitam /
XXbsa075_u:4429: tatra yasya padārthasya svarūpaparinirbhāsaḥ sa kathamasanniti prāṇadhāribhirabhidhātavyaḥ
XXbsa075_u:4431: bāhyarūpatayā bādhyatve 'pi jñānarūpatayārthatvasya ācāryeṇa pratipāditatvāt grāhakābhimatanirākāraprakāśasyāpyasattvābhidhānaprasaṅgāt pratibhāse 'pi bādhanādasatyatvamiti cet /
XXbsa075_u:4435: kathamanyatra bādhake svarūpāntaraprakāśa eva nirvṛttistatpūrvakamanumānaṃ ca sutarāmaviśvāsabhājanamiti na bādhakavārtāpi /
XXbsa075_u:4446: tathā hi buddhyākārasya nirbhāso bādhā bāhyasya vastunaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4448: etena bhāsamāno vā ākāro 'sanniti dvitīyo 'pi pakṣaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ,
XXbsa075_u:4450: tathā san vā kaścinna khyātīti tṛtīyasaṅkalpo 'pi vyākulaḥ,
XXbsa075_u:4453: nanu prakāśo nāmaḥ vastunaḥ sattāsādhakaṃ pramāṇam /
XXbsa075_u:4462: sarvathā bahirabhāve tu jñānasya prakāśāvyabhicārāttāvataiva sattve kimarthakriyayā /
XXbsa075_u:4464: nārthakriyāpi sarvasmai kvacicced bhāsanaṃ na kim //
XXbsa075_u:4466: nirvikalpe tāvat svasaṃvedanasiddhasvākāramantareṇa vipakṣādayo na parisphuranti /
XXbsa075_u:4467: athāmī vikalpe pratibhāsanta iti dvitīyaḥ saṅkalpo
XXbsa075_u:4471: tadāpi teṣāṃ svarūpasya nirbhāso 'sti na vā /
XXbsa075_u:4480: tat kathaṃ tatsiddhasya pratyakṣāntarānumānābhyāṃ bādhābhidhānam, tayorapi svarūpāntaraprakāśapauruṣatvāt
XXbsa075_u:4484: prakāśata iti vācā svarūpasākṣātkāritvaṃ kathitamiti mātā me bandhyeti vṛttāntaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4485: iṣyate ca tvayā vipakṣādisvarūpasākṣātkāritvaṃ bikalpasyeti pratyakṣatānatikramaḥ, apratyakṣatve vastusvarūpasphuraṇāyogāt /
XXbsa075_u:4486: tataśca tatpratibhāsino 'pi rūpasya sata eva khyātirnāsatkhyātiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4487: na ca tadeva vikalpe parisphuradrūpamasatāmīśvarādīnāṃ svarūpam,
XXbsa075_u:4491: tato yat sākāravāde jalpitam nityādayaḥ santa eva syuḥ iti tadātmana eva patitam /
XXbsa075_u:4494: yadi nādhyakṣatā tasya rūpanirbhāsa eva na /
