XXbsa075_u:4496: yadi tu pratibhāseta rūpamasya sadeva tat /
XXbsa075_u:4504: yadi vā svākāre bāhyāropaḥ, bāhye vā svākārāropaḥ, svākārabāhyayoryojanā, tayorekīkaraṇamekapratipattirabhedena pratipattiḥ bhedāgraho 'dhyavasāyārtha iti vikalpāḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4511: astu svagrāhye tannirvikalpakam, bāhye tu adhyavaseye ( Nibandh 134.) adhyavasāya iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:4517: tathā hi jñānaṃ kenacidākāreṇa satyenālīkena vopajātaṃ nāma /
XXbsa075_u:4519: tatkṛtatve na tāvat tatkāla eva vyāpārāntaramanubhūyata iti kutastadāropaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4520: kālāntare ca svayamevāsat kasya vyāpāraḥ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:4521: dvitīyapakṣe jñānāntaramapi nākārāroparāgasaṅginīmutpattimantareṇa vyāpārāntareṇa kvacit kiñcitkaraṃ nāma /
XXbsa075_u:4524: vyāpāraḥ, śabdākārasyāpi svarūpa evāntarbhāvāditi nākārādanyo jñānavyāpāraḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4526: tatra buddhau yadi svarūpeṇa sphurati satyapratītirevāsau, ka āropaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4527: atha na parisphurati tathāpi ka āropaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4532: na hi marīcisphuraṇameva jalasphuraṇamiti na svākāre bāhyāropaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4533: ata eva bāhye svākārāropo nāsti, āropaviṣayasya bāhyasyāsphuraṇāt /
XXbsa075_u:4549: bhedena pratītiniṣedhamātre 'pi na bāhyasya pratītirukteti kutastadadhyavasāyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4550: yadi hi bāhyaṃ prakāśeta ekatvenānekatvena vā satā asatā vā pratītiriti yuktam /
XXbsa075_u:4559: tathā hi kiṃ bāhye gṛhyamāṇe 'gṛhyamāṇe vā /
XXbsa075_u:4560: na ca prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ, bāhyagrahaṇasya pratikṣiptatvāt /
XXbsa075_u:4562: agṛhyamāṇe tu bāhye pravṛttiniyamo na syāt, anyeṣāmapi tadānīmagrahaṇādanyatrāpi pravṛttiprasaṅgāt
XXbsa075_u:4566: grahaṇam, ahosvit karaṇam, uta yojanā, atha samāropaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4567: tatra svābhāsamanarthamartha kathaṃ gṛhṇīyāt, kuryād vā vikalpaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4568: na hi nīlaṃ pītaṃ śakyaṃ grahītuṃ kartuṃ vā śilpakuśalenāpi /
XXbsa075_u:4573: tatra kiṃ gṛhītvā āropayati, atha yadaiva svākāraṃ gṛhṇāti tadaivāropayati /
XXbsa075_u:4575: / na hi kṣaṇikaṃ vikalpavijñānaṃ kramavantau grahaṇasamāropau kartumarhati
XXbsa075_u:4577: samāropyamāṇo vikalpena svagocaro na śakyo 'bhinnaḥ pratipattum /
XXbsa075_u:4578: nāpi bāhyasvalakṣaṇakatvena śakyaḥ pratipattum, vikalpākāre svalakṣaṇasya bāhyasyāpratibhāsanāditi
XXbsa075_u:4581: nanvayamāropayatīti kiṃ vikalpasya svarūpānubhava evāropaḥ, uta vyāpārāntaraṃ svarūpānubhavāt
XXbsa075_u:4582: na tāvat pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ, anubhavasamāropayorvikalpāvikalparūpatayā dravakaṭhinavattādātmyānupapatteḥ
XXbsa075_u:4584: na tāvat kramaḥ, kṣaṇikasya vijñānasya kramavadvyāpārāyogāt /
XXbsa075_u:4588: ātmā svabhāvasthita eva vedyaḥ, parabhāvena vedane svarūpavedanānupapatteḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4591: na tvātmā vedyamānaḥ samāropito nārthaḥ samāropyamāṇaḥ pratyakṣavedyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4592: sa ca samāropaḥ sato 'sato vā grahaṇameva /
XXbsa075_u:4594: svapratibhāsasya bāhyādbhedāgraho bāhyasamāropastato bāhye vṛttiriti cet /
XXbsa075_u:4595: sa kiṃ gṛhyamāṇe bāhye na vā /
XXbsa075_u:4598: agṛhyamāṇe tu bhedāgrahe na pravṛttiniyamaḥ syāt, anyeṣāmapi tadānīmagrahādanyatrāpi pravṛttiprasaṅgāditi
XXbsa075_u:4599: tasmād yathā yathāyamadhyavasāyaścintyate tathā tathā viśīryata eva /
XXbsa075_u:4600: tathā vikalpāropābhimānagrahaniścayādayo 'pyadhyavasāyavat svākāraparyavasitā eva sphuranto bāhyasya vārtāmātramapi na ( Nibandh 136.)
XXbsa075_u:4604: / vikalpa ityadhyavasāyaityāropa ityabhimāna iti graha iti niścaya ityādikaṃ śāstre pratipadaṃ pratipāditam, tatsiddhaṃ ca bahirarthādikamabhyupagatamityācāryavirodhaḥ, nyāyavirodhaśca tathā hi savareva prakārairaviparītasvarūpasaṃvedanād bhrānteratyantamabhāvaḥ syāt
XXbsa075_u:4608: prakāśamāno vā kathamasau tasyāṃ na prakāśate /
XXbsa075_u:4610: asati cārthe sārasyāt abhūnmāndhātā, bhaviṣyati śaṅkho 'styātmā, nityaḥ śabda iti sarvātmanā ca niścayaḥ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:4611: gauriti spaṣṭena ca svena lakṣaṇena prakāśeta /
XXbsa075_u:4612: svalakṣaṇe ca saṅketāyogāt vikalpikaiva sā buddhirna syāt /
XXbsa075_u:4613: tasmādaśeṣagovyaktisādhāraṇena gotvena gobuddhiralīkena sābhilāpena viplavāt prakhyātīti tathā prakāśanamasyā gavārthāvasāya ityeṣṭavyam /
XXbsa075_u:4614: evaṃ hyete doṣā na syuḥ, apratibhāsamānasyāpi svalakṣaṇasya bhrāntyāvasāyāditi //
XXbsa075_u:4618: tathā hi kā punariyaṃ bhrāntirasatkhyātiratasmiṃstadgraho vā yadabhāvādidānīmeva muktirāsajyate
XXbsa075_u:4620: yadāhurguravaḥ yasya svarūpanirbhāso bādhakād yadi tanna sat /
XXbsa075_u:4626: nānyā va bhāvinītyatra pramāṇaṃ kiñcidasti vaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4633: tāmayaṃ samarthayitumasamarthaḥ svātantryeṇālīkasphuraṇaṃ bhrāntiriti kāvyaṃ viracayya vistārayati
XXbsa075_u:4634: nanvatasmiṃstadgraho 'pi bhramaḥ svākāraparyavasitajñānādatirikto bahubhirbahudhā vicāryaṃ pratyākhyātaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4635: tat kathaṃ tasminnapi pakṣe na bhrāntikṣatiryenedānīmeva muktiprasaṅgo na syāditi cet /
XXbsa075_u:4639: na cāsau pūrvoktavāgjālaiḥ pratihantuṃ śakyaḥ, sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṃ pratyātmaviditatvāt,
XXbsa075_u:4641: ayameva ca saṃsārastatkṣayo mokṣa iti kvedānīmeva tadvārtāpi /
XXbsa075_u:4642: tathā hi vicitrānādivāsanāvaśāt prabodhakapratyayaviśeṣāpekṣayā vikalpaḥ kenacidākāreṇopajāyamāna eva bahirmukhapravṛttyanukūlamarthakriyāsmaraṇābhilāṣādiprabandhamādhatte /
XXbsa075_u:4648: yathā candrādijñānasya bhrāntasyābhrāntasya vā taddarśanāvasāyajananameva grahaṇavyāpāraḥ
XXbsa075_u:4651: yathā ca nirvikalpadvicandrādyākārataiva tathāvasāyasādhanī, evamavasāyasyāpi tādṛśākārataiva viṣayāntaravimukhapravṛttisādhanī //
XXbsa075_u:4652: nanu tathā ca tacca tena pratipādyate na ca tajjñāne tat prakāśata iti śapathenāpi na saṃpratyaya iti cet /
XXbsa075_u:4654: na hyadhyavasāyād bāhyasya paṭādervastuno bādhakāvatārāt pūrvasandigdhavastubhāvasya kṣaṇikāderavastuno vā śaśaviṣāṇāderasphuraṇe 'pi siddhipratibandho brahmaṇāpi pratividhātuṃ śakyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4659: tataśca tena ca tat pratipādyate na ca jñāne tatprakāśa iti saṅgatirastyeva,
XXbsa075_u:4663: nanu yadi nādhyavaseyapratītistadāgṛhīte 'pi svalakṣaṇādau pravṛttiriti sarvatrāviśeṣeṇa prasajyeta, sarvatrāgṛhītatvena viśeṣābhāvāt, tataśca prāptirapi nābhimatasya niyamenetyanumānamapi viplutam /
XXbsa075_u:4665: yadyadhyavaseyamagṛhītaṃ viśvamapyagṛhītam, tathāpi niyataviṣayaiva pravṛttirna sarvatra, tathābhūtasamanantarapratyayabalāyātaniyatākāratayā niyataśaktitvādvikalpasya /
XXbsa075_u:4668: asadutpattivat sarvatrāsattve 'pi hi bījādaṅkurasyaivotpattiḥ, tatraiva tasya śakteḥ pramāṇena nirūpaṇāt /
XXbsa075_u:4669: tathehāpi hutavahākārasya vikalpasya dāhapākādyarthakriyārthinastatsmaraṇavato hutavahaviṣayāyāmeva pravṛttau sāmarthyaṃ pramāṇapratītaṃ kathamatiprasaṅgabhāgi /
XXbsa075_u:4670: pratyāsatticintāyāṃ ca tāttvikasyāpi vahnerjvaladbhāsvarākāratvaṃ vikalpollikhitasyāpīti, tāvatā tatraiva pravartanaśaktirjvalanavikalpasya na jalādau //
XXbsa075_u:4671: nanu ca sādṛśyāropeṇa kiṃ svākārasya bāhye svākāre vā bāhyasyāropaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4674: kiṃ tarhi, svavāsanāparipākavaśādupajāyamānaiva sā buddhirapaśyantyapi bāhayaṃ bāhaye pravṛttimātanotīti viplutaiva saṃsārātmikā ca /
XXbsa075_u:4675: yat śāstraṃ na jñāne tulyamutpattito dhiyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4681: sa ca niyamo yathā darśanād vastupratibandhakṛtaḥ, tathā vikalpaviśeṣādapi pāramparyeṇa vastuprativastupratibandhakṛta ityadarśane 'pi adhyavasāyāt pravṛttiryujyata iti nānumānamanavasthitam etena tacca na pratīyate,
XXbsa075_u:4688: tato yadyapi tattvena nāropo nāma kasyacit /
XXbsa075_u:4691: bhrama eva hi saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ tattvasaṃsthitiḥ //
XXbsa075_u:4693: tataśca yāvanna vicārasaṃbhavo bhavo 'yamanyaḥ śama ityayaṃ nayaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4694: vicāralīlālalite tu mānase bhavaḥ śamo vā ka iheti kathyatām //
XXbsa075_u:4695: tathā āryamaitreyanāthapādā api na cāntaraṃ kiṃcana vidyate 'nayoḥ sadarthavṛttyā śamajanmanoriha
XXbsa075_u:4696: tathāpi janmakṣayato vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇām //
XXbsa075_u:4697: āryanāgārjunapādāśca nirvāṇaṃ ca bhavaścaiva dvayameva na vidyate /
XXbsa075_u:4701: yadapyuktaṃ vikalpasyāviṣayaśca bāhyam grahaṇaṃ cāsya śabdena saṃyojyeti vikalpatvamapi duryojam, ātmani ca śabdayojanā nāstīti vikalpo nāma
XXbsa075_u:4704: ihāgniratretyadhyavasāyo yathā kāyikīṃ vṛttiṃ prasūte tathāgnirmayā pratīyata iti vācikīmapi prasūte, etadākārānuvyavasāyarūpāṃ mānasīmapi prasavati /
XXbsa075_u:4705: evaṃ ca sati yathā vikalpenāyamartho gṛhīta iti niścayaḥ,
XXbsa075_u:4706: tathā śabdena saṃyojya gṛhīta ityapi, arthākāraleśavacchabdākārasyāpi sphuraṇāt /
XXbsa075_u:4708: yadāhurguravaḥ na śabdaiḥ saṃsargaḥ kvacidapi bahirvā manasi vā-
XXbsa075_u:4710: ubhāvapyākārau yadapi dhiya evādhyavasitir vidhatte tau bāhye vacasi ca vikalpasthitirataḥ
XXbsa075_u:4711: abhāne pratibhāne vā na cāropo 'pi kasyacit /
XXbsa075_u:4716: saṅketaḥ kṛta ityāsthā tādṛk śabdaśrutau punaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4719: tasmād vastu vā ghaṭapaṭādi sandigdhavastu vā sādhakabādhakātikrāntam,
XXbsa075_u:4725: duṣpariharaḥ, tadā viṣayiviṣayabhāvo 'pi labdha ityadhyavasāyamātreṇa viṣayaviṣayitvamuktamiti yuktam /
XXbsa075_u:4726: yadāha alaṅkārakāraḥ kathaṃ tadviṣayatvaṃ tatra pravartanāditi /
XXbsa075_u:4727: etena yaduktam kathamavasīyamānastayātmārtho na prakāśyata ityādi,
XXbsa075_u:4729: asati cārthe sā na syādityapyayuktam, ātmāderadhyavaseyasya pratibhāsapratikṣepe buddhyā saha tādātmyābhāvāt /
XXbsa075_u:4731: / sarvākāraniścayo hi sarveṣvākāreṣu pravṛttikārakatvātmā niruktaḥ, na caikākārollekhino vikalpasyākārāntare pravartanaśaktiranubhavaviṣaya iti kutaḥ śabdapramāṇāntarānapekṣeti yuktam /
XXbsa075_u:4734: yathā ca bāhye sati kvacid bhramavyavasthā tathāntarnaye 'pi sarvatra /
XXbsa075_u:4735: kevalaṃ bahirmukhapravṛtyapekṣayā kriyamāṇo nātmani kaścid bhrama ityuktaṃ bhavati /
XXbsa075_u:4736: na ca gosvalakṣaṇaprakāśāvakāśaḥ, svākārasyaiva sphuraṇāt, svalakṣaṇe ca saṃketāyogāt /
XXbsa075_u:4737: vikalpikaiva na syāditi tu svarūpāpekṣayā siddhasādhanam /
XXbsa075_u:4739: tasmādaśeṣagovyaktisādhāraṇena gotvena gobuddhiralīkena sābhilāpena viplavāt prakhyātīti tathā prakhyānamasyā gavāvasāya ityeṣṭavyamityapi
XXbsa075_u:4745: apratibhāsamānasyāpi svalakṣaṇasya bhrāntyāvasāyāditi tu na budhyāmahe /
XXbsa075_u:4765: yadāhurguravaḥ bhāsate yattadekaṃ tadyathā citre sitākṛtiḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4777: tannāstu sādhyo dṛṣṭānto na ca śaṅkāviparyaye /
XXbsa075_u:4779: saṃgrahaślokaśca ekatvena yathāptimānabhimato bhāsastathā vyāpyate sthaulyenāpyaṇuśo na hi kvacididaṃ svapne 'pi nirbhāsanam /
XXbsa075_u:4780: tena pratyaṇubhedanetyuparataṃ tadvyāpakasyātyayād ekatvena parītamākṛticayaścāyaṃ vinirbhāsate
XXbsa075_u:4785: yadetat pratyakṣaṃ bhedasādhakamupanīyate, tat kiṃ nīlādīnāmanātmabhūtamātmabhūtaṃ ( Nibandh
XXbsa075_u:4787: prathamapakṣe, āstāṃ tāvadeṣāmato bhedasiddhiḥ, sattāmātramapi na sidhyet /
XXbsa075_u:4788: sa hi nīlādiko 'rtho jaḍo vijñānāntarātmālīkasvabhāvo vā
XXbsa075_u:4791: tathā hi jñānasya prakāśakatvaṃ nāma kiṃ vidyamānatvaṃ vyāpārāveśo vā /
XXbsa075_u:4795: atha jñānatve sati vidyamānatvamiti saviśeṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇamucyate /
XXbsa075_u:4796: tat kiṃ nīlādīnāmajñānatve kośapānamāyuṣmatā kartavyam, yena sattāmātreṇa samasamayaṃ sphuratorvijñānanīlādyoḥ
XXbsa075_u:4798: atha dvitīyastadā sa kiṃ vyāpāraḥ pratyakṣasyātmā jñānāntaram,
XXbsa075_u:4801: dvitīyapakṣe jñānāntaraṃ yadyanyaviṣayam arthasya na kiñcit /
XXbsa075_u:4802: tadviṣayatvaṃ cādyāpi na siddham, tatpratyāsattereva cintyamānatvāt //
XXbsa075_u:4803: tṛtīye punaḥ saṅkalpe nīlādikaṃ kṛtameva syāt, na prakāśitam,
XXbsa075_u:4807: caturthe tu vikalpe arthāntare kṛte nīlādikaṃ tadavasthameva /
XXbsa075_u:4808: na cānātmaprakāśanasāmarthyaṃ jñānasya svīkartumucitam, vyāpāravat prakāśanasyāpyevaṃ nirākartavyatvāt
XXbsa075_u:4809: na cāgnidhūmayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva iva jñānajñeyayorapi svābhāviko grāhyagrāhakabhāvo vaktavyaḥ,
XXbsa075_u:4810: pramāṇasiddhakāryakāraṇabhāvavad grāhyagrāhakasvarūpayoradyāpi nirvaktumaśakyatvāditi kva nīlādivārtāpi yadbhedasiddhipratyāśā pratyakṣataḥ sampadyate //
XXbsa075_u:4811: athātmabhūtaṃ tat pratyakṣamiti dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ, tadātmasvasaṃvedanameva bhedasādhakamabhyupagataṃ bhavet /
XXbsa075_u:4812: tacca yadi pratyākāraṃ bhinnaṃ tadā sarveṣāṃ svasvarūpanimagnatvāccitraprakāśapraṇāśaprasaṅga ityuktam /
XXbsa075_u:4818: jñānānyabhinnāni sahopalabdheḥ, pūrvāparatvaṃ tu na vedyameva // iti /
XXbsa075_u:4821: ata eva svasaṃvedanapratyakṣādanumānācca ekatvasiddhau na pratyakṣāntaram /
XXbsa075_u:4824: nanu brūyānnāma kiñcit, tathāpi pratibhāsabhedād bheda eva, na hi dṛṣṭe
XXbsa075_u:4828: tatra yadi prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ, tadā bāhye 'rthe pratyetavye buddhyākāraḥ pramāṇam /
XXbsa075_u:4831: yadā punarākāracakrameva prameyam svasaṃvedanaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ tadā tenaiva nīlādīnāṃ svabhāvabhūtenākhaṇḍātmanā ekīkṛtānāṃ kathamapramādī bhedamācakṣīta /
XXbsa075_u:4833: tathāpi kathaṃ bhedastasmād yathordhvamindriyapratyakṣataḥ kṣaṇabhede pratīte 'pyavidyāvaśādekatvādhyavasāyaḥ tathā tiryaksvasaṃvedanapratyakṣeṇākārābhede 'dhigate 'pyavidyāvaśādeva
XXbsa075_u:4835: yadyevaṃ viruddhadharmādhyāsato vijñānākāracakravad vyāpto 'pi na bhidyeteti cet /
XXbsa075_u:4840: tasmād vijñānatve satīti hetuviśeṣaṇaṃ kartavyam yena bāhyasyaiva bhedaḥ sidhyati //
XXbsa075_u:4841: nanu yadi vijñānātmakaṃ vicitrākāracakramekaṃ tadā nīlākāra eva pītādyākāravṛndaṃ praviśet
XXbsa075_u:4842: tathā prakāśākāracakrayorabhedo vyaktisāmānyavat prakāśa eva, ākāracakrameva vā syāditi cet
XXbsa075_u:4844: tathā hi dvayorapyanayoḥ prasaṅgaviparyayayoḥ bhedaḥ, sa ca bāhyārthavāda
XXbsa075_u:4849: kiṃ ca evaṃ sthūlanīlādyākāro 'pi paramāṇumātre praviśedityapratibhāsaṃjagadāpadyeta /
XXbsa075_u:4854: tathā kṛtakatvasyānityatvavastutvādibhirabhede kṛtakatvamevānityatvameva vā syādityapi prasaṅgo vaktavya āpadyeta, sāmānyavyaktyoriva tayorvastuto 'bhedo 'khaṇḍātmatvāt //
XXbsa075_u:4860: buddhistu naśyati bhidaiva vidaiva sattvāccitrāpyato na bhidameti kimatra kurmaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:4865: buddheḥ svavittiniṣṭhāyāḥ yaḥ parastasya kā gatiḥ //
XXbsa075_u:4866: hanta tathāpi nīlādivattadekaṃ ca kathametat sametu cet /
XXbsa075_u:4868: neṣṭaṃ tadapi cet tarhi kvāṇvantarbhidi bhāsanam /
XXbsa075_u:4869: na parīkṣākṣamaṃ cāṇuḥ kutastasya tadā bhidā //
XXbsa075_u:4881: vastuvyavasthā śaraṇaṃ kiṃ tu mānena saṅgatam //
XXbsa075_u:4883: yasya rāśiranekaṃ syānnāpi vastu ca kiñcina //
XXbsa075_u:4887: grāhayaṃ na tasya grahaṇaṃ (na) tena jñānāntaragrāhayatāpi śūnyaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4888: tathāpi ca jñānamayaḥ prakāśaḥ pratyakṣapakṣastu tavāvirāsīt //
XXbsa075_u:4891: atheha prakāśasahopalambhādisādhanabalena jaḍapadārtharāśāvapāste nīlapītādyaśeṣapadārthajāte ca svacittapratibhāsātmani svapnamāyādivadadvayarūpe siddhe santānāntarasadasattānirūpaṇārthamidamārabhyate evaṃ hi kecidāhuḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4893: tathā hīcchācittasamanantaravyāhāravyavahārābhāsasya darśanāt tadabhāve cādarśanādupalambhānupalambhasādhanamanvayavyatirekaśarīramicchācittena saha vyāhārādyābhāsasya kāryakāraṇabhāvamātmasantāne
XXbsa075_u:4908: icchācittaṃ hi svasaṃbaddhamevānumāturdarśanayogyam, tasya ca deśādiviprakarṣa
XXbsa075_u:4914: na cecchāmātrasya svaparasantānasādhāraṇasya svasaṃvedanenānyena vābhāvaḥ śakyāvagamaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4915: yathā hi vahnimātrasya deśakālavyavahitasyāpi dhūmotpādadeśakālayoryadi syādupalabhyetaiva mayeti saṃbhāvitasyānumātṛpuruṣendriyapratyakṣeṇa ( Nibandh 146.) dhūmotpādāt prāgabhāve 'vadhāryamāṇastadutpattisiddhimadhyāsayatīti
XXbsa075_u:4918: tathātrāpīcchācittaṃ parasantānasādhāraṇamapi yāvadyadīya syādupalabhyetaiva mayeti yadi saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyeta tadā tadvyatirekasiddhidvāreṇa kāraṇatayāvadhāryate /
XXbsa075_u:4920: na ca paracittaṃ kālaviprakṛṣṭaṃ vartamānatvādasya, atītānāgatayoreva kālaviprakṛṣṭatvena vyavahārāt /
XXbsa075_u:4921: nāpi deśaviprakṛṣṭam, yasminneva hi śuklaśaṅkhādideśe svacittaṃ śuklākārapratibhāsi svasaṃvedanena vedyate taddeśavartyeva pītākārapratibhāsi parasantānabhāvi cittaṃ na vedyate /
XXbsa075_u:4924: na hyagnirapyeko yenaivendriyavijñānena dṛśyate tenaivānyo 'pi dṛśyam /
XXbsa075_u:4925: tatra yathā cakṣurvijñānamātrāpekṣayā agnimātraṃ dṛśyamiti vyavasthāpyate tathātrāpi svasaṃvedanamātrāpekṣayā icchācittamātraṃ svaparasantānasādhāraṇamapi dṛśyameveti /
XXbsa075_u:4927: kimatra mātraśabdenānumātṛpuruṣasaṃbandhāsaṃbandhābhyāmaviśeṣitaṃ yasya kasyacit puruṣasyendriyajñānaṃ vastuviṣayīkurvāṇamasya dṛśyatāsaṃbhave
XXbsa075_u:4930: so 'pi hi kasyacit puṃso yogyādeḥ svajātīyasya vā piśācāntarasya bhavatyevendriyajñānagocara iti na kaścit svabhāvaviprakṛṣṭaḥ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:4931: tasmādanumātṛpuruṣasaṃbandhitvamanapāsya vijñānasya svalakṣaṇādibhedanirāsapara eva mātraśabdo yuktaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4935: tenaivaṃ dṛśyatāsaṃbhāvanā yadīha deśe kāle vā syād
XXbsa075_u:4938: yadīha paracittaṃ syāt niyamena madīyasya svasaṃveda(na) mātrasya viṣayi syāditi //
XXbsa075_u:4943: tasmādicchācittamātrasya svaparasantānasādhāraṇasya dṛśyatayā saṃbhāvayitumaśakyatvāt vyahārādyutpādāt prāganupalambhe 'pyabhāvasiddhau
XXbsa075_u:4944: na tadabhāvaprayukto vyāhārādyabhāvaḥ pratīyata iti kathaṃ kāraṇatvasiddhiryataḥ kāryahetudvāreṇānumīyeta
XXbsa075_u:4946: kiṃ tu tasya dṛśyānupalambhājjijñāsitaviśeṣe dharmiṇi bādhitasya kathamanumānamityuktameva
XXbsa075_u:4951: tadā pakṣīkṛte dharmiṇi tatheti sa eva doṣaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4952: atha na pratīyate tadā sandigdhavyatireko hetvābhāso vyāhārādiriti sthitam /
XXbsa075_u:4953: evaṃ tarhi santānāntarasādhakasyābhāvād bādhakasyāpi kasyacidadarśanādbhavatu tatra sandeha eveti kecit /
XXbsa075_u:4955: yadi hi santānāntaraṃ saṃbhavet tadā tato bhedena svasantānasyāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam /
XXbsa075_u:4956: anyathā svasantānādapi prakāśamānāttasya parasantānābhimatasya bhedo na syāt /
XXbsa075_u:4957: na cābhedastayoriti svasantānād bhedābhedābhyāmabādhyasya parasantānasya sāmānyaśaśaviṣāṇādivadabhāva evāyāta iti kathaṃ sandehaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4959: sa ca bhedaḥ santānasya svabhāvaḥ svasantāne pratibhāsamāne niyamena pratibhāseta /
XXbsa075_u:4963: bhedapratibhāse hi upagamyamāne tadavadhibhūtasyāpi parasantānasya pratibhāso durapahnavaḥ syāt /
XXbsa075_u:4965: sāvadherasya bhāsaḥ syānna vā grāhyaṃ tadātmanā //
XXbsa075_u:4968: yathā hi svasantānamātre parisphurati śaśaviṣāṇādasphurato na bhedaḥ pratibhāti tathā parasantānādapi sphuraṇavirahiṇo na bhātyeva bhedaḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4969: na hi parasantānāpekṣayā kaścid viśeṣaleśaḥ svasantānasya parisphurati yo nāsti śaśaviṣāṇāpekṣayā
XXbsa075_u:4970: na ca śaśaviṣāṇaparasantānāvapekṣya samāne svasantānapratibhāse śaśaviṣāṇāpekṣayā na bhedo nāpyabhedaḥ pratibhāti /
XXbsa075_u:4971: parasantānāpekṣayā tu bheda eva bhātītyevamavasthāpayituṃ śakyam /
XXbsa075_u:4972: bhedābhedayorabhāvaparihāreṇa hi yathā bhedo vyavasthitaḥ tadvad bhedapratibhāso 'pi bhedābhedābhāvapratibhāsavilakṣaṇa evocito bhavitum,
XXbsa075_u:4979: śakyaṃ hi tatrāpi sandehamavatārayitum, na bahirarthaḥ kasyacidābhāsate,
XXbsa075_u:4980: parasantānastu parasya pratibhāsata eva, tataścātraiva sandeho na
XXbsa075_u:4983: na hyavaśyaṃ parasantānaḥ parasyābhāsate, kadācidasau nāstyeva na cāsāvavabhāsata ityapi vaktuṃ śakteḥ /
XXbsa075_u:4984: kiṃ ca mā nāma bhāsīṣṭa bahirarthaḥ kasyacidapi tathāpi kathaṃ tadabhāvasiddhirbhedapratibhāsābhyupagamavādina itīyanmātramiha vivakṣitam
XXbsa075_u:4986: tasmād bahirarthena sādhāraṇaṃ santānāntaramiti kathaṃ vijñaptivādināmapi saṃmataṃ bhaviṣyati
XXbsa075_u:4989: pūrvabhāvinī hi saṃvittiḥ parasaṃvittyapekṣayā bhedaṃ pūrvatvaṃ cātmano gṛhṇātyevāvadhipratibhāsavigame 'pi //
XXbsa075_u:4990: parabhāvinyapi saṃvittiḥ pūrvasaṃvittyapekṣayā bhedaṃ paratvaṃ cātmano
XXbsa075_u:4991: 'dhigacchatyeva santānāntaravaditi niyatapūrvāparabhāvalakṣaṇe kāryakāraṇabhāve 'vabhāsamāne 'vasīyamāne ca nīlādicitrākāravat katham
XXbsa075_u:4992: saṃvṛttyāstu yathā tathā iti bhagavato vārtikakārasya vacanena phalitamatra mate /
XXbsa075_u:4993: api ca citrākāracakre dharmiṇyadvaitasādhanārthamupanyastasya prakāśamānatvādihetorbhedagrāhakapratyakṣāpahṛtaviṣayatvamudbhāvayataḥ prativādino bhedagrahaṇamanumanyamānena santānāntarasandehaṃ ca vinā
XXbsa075_u:4996: na tāvat pratyakṣeṇa, tasya vidhiviṣayasya pratiṣedhasādhanātadhikārāt /
XXbsa075_u:5001: yathā ca yadupalabhyamānaṃ yenaṃ rūpeṇa na bhāsate na tat tena rūpeṇa sadvyavahārayogyaṃ yathā nīlaṃ pītarūpeṇa /
XXbsa075_u:5005: avadhyapratibhāse tu bhedapratibhāsābhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇabhedapratibhāsābhāvavat siddha eva /
XXbsa075_u:5006: evamanena pramāṇena santānāntarasya svacittāpekṣayā bhede pratikṣipte abhede ca svayamevāsaṃbhavini bhedābhedābhyāmavācyatvaṃ siddham /
XXbsa075_u:5008: vastutāpahatiriti, kathaṃ ( Nibandh 149.) bādhakābhāvāt santānāntare sandeho 'bhidhīyate
XXbsa075_u:5011: api ca santānāntare tāvadarvāgdṛśāṃ sandeho bhavadbhiranumanyate /
XXbsa075_u:5014: vidyamānameva kadācit santānāntaraṃ bhagavatā nāvadhāryate tathāpyasau sarvajña iti kathametat
XXbsa075_u:5017: pratyakṣeṇa paracittapratītau grāhyagrāhakabhāvo 'pi paracittasya bhagavaccittena sahāyāta iti bahirarthavāda eva mukhāntareṇopagataḥ syāt, kathamayaṃ vañcayati vādaḥ //
XXbsa075_u:5018: asmadīyamatena tu paracittaṃ nāstyeveti tadavadhāraṇakṛto(na) bhagavataḥ sarvajñatākṣatidoṣaḥ
XXbsa075_u:5019: yāvacca bhedagrahaṇābhimānarūpā saṃvṛsttitāvat santānāntare sandehāttadavabodhanārthaṃ vacanādirapi pravartata iti svavacanavirodho 'pi na saṃbhavatyeva /
XXbsa075_u:5020: na khalu santānāntaraviṣayaḥ sarvathā sandeho nāstyevetyabhimatamasmākam, api tu paramārthagatiriyamupadarśitā
XXbsa075_u:5021: idaṃ hi santānāntarābhāvasādhanamadvayasādhanena sādhāraṇamiti naikaniyataḥ svavacanādivirodhastatparihāro vā /
XXbsa075_u:5023: tathā ca ātmā sa tasyānubhavaḥ sa ca nānyasya kasyacit ityādivārtikavyākhyānabhāṣyam /
XXbsa075_u:5025: na citrākārasaṃvedanāt ityādi dveṣavikaluṣāśeṣā eva tuṣākāro 'pi vedāntasiddhānta iti alakṣita
XXbsa075_u:5026: tadgranthānutthāpayantī santānāntarāpekṣayā paṭhitavatītyavasthā (?) sarvā saṃvṛtisatyāntaḥ pātinī hyevāpai(tī) ti sakalamanākulamiti //
